original: bya rog rnams las zho srungs shig ces pa ji lta ba bzhin no zhes sems na /

analyzed: yod tsam zhes pa la sogs pas sgrub par byed pa snga ma kho na gsal bar byed do //

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /

original: yod pa ma yin pa la de mi 'jug go zhes pas 'di yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa la de mi 'jug go zhes pas 'di yod pa ma yin no //

analyzed: de ltar ni yod pa ma yin pa smig rgyu la sogs pa rnams kyi yang yang dag par sbyor ba mthong la /

original: de las kyang gtan tshigs ma grub pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de las kyang gtan tshigs ma grub pa'o zhe na /

original: gsungs pa / gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: de nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin pa rnams so //

analyzed: de'i phyir yang de dgag pa'i chad du yod pa smos pa rigs pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so, but

analyzed: de'i phyir de bzlog pa'i ched du yod pa smos pa'o zhe na /

original: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /

original: gal te de lta na de rnams dang @76b yang dag par phrad pa ma yin pa de ci ltar chu la sogs par snang ba'i rnam par shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de rnams dang @76b yang dag par phrad pa ma yin pa de ci ltar chu la sogs par snang ba'i rnam par shes pa yin zhe na /

original: yul gyi khyad par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yul gyi khyad par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: mya nga ma dang tsha sgo can la sogs pa'i yul gyi khyad par du'o //

original: der yang dus thams cad du ma yin gyi /
analyzed: der yang dus thams cad du ma yin gyi /

analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag par gdungs par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyur 'gyur gyi gzhan gyi tshe ma yin no //

analyzed: gang gsungs pa nyi ma'i gdung ba las zhes pa'o //

analyzed: bstan par bya ba ma yin pa zhes pas rang gi mtshan nyid ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: rim gyis zhes pa sngar dbang po'i shes pa ste /

analyzed: de nas 'dra ba nyid du nges par byed pa'i yid rnam par rtog pa'o //

analyzed: de nas chu la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i dngos po dran pa'o //

original: de'i bar ma chad par de kho na 'di'o zhes pa'i 'khrul pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa spyi la dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i bar ma chad par de kho na 'di'o zhes pa'i 'khrul pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa spyi la dmigs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: don de med par yang zhes pa chu la sogs par brtags pa'o //

analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi khyad par kho nas skye ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa'i khyad par du byas pa kho na bye brag tu byas pa las yang dag par rten pas bshad do zhes ston par byed do //

analyzed: yang na gang gang gi zhes pa legs pa la yang sat kyi sgra 'jug ste /

translated: It would not be of the others.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin rna ba yang bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ga las bya ba yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin rna ba yang bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ga las bya ba yin /
translated: And the ear, which has the nature of space, is also without activity. So how could it be active?

original: phrad pa smos pa yang don med pa ste /
analyzed: phrad pa smos pa yang don med pa ste /
translated: The mention of contact is also meaningless,

original: gang gi phyir blo skye ba la byed pa rnams kyi bya bas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'os pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir blo skye ba la byed pa rnams kyi bya bas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'os pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is proper that the activity of the causes of the arising of cognition should necessarily occur.

original: 'jig rten na phrad pa'i sgra'i bya ba'i don can du grags pa yang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten na phrad pa'i sgra'i bya ba'i don can du grags pa yang ma yin zhing /
translated: And the word contact is not known in the world to mean the activity of the object.

original: rab tu grags pa'i don smos pa yang mdor khas blangs pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu grags pa'i don smos pa yang mdor khas blangs pa ste /
translated: And the mention of the well-known meaning is also accepted in brief.

original: des na phyogs 'di shin tu mi rigs so zhes pa phrad pa'i phyogs kho na brten par bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na phyogs 'di shin tu mi rigs so zhes pa phrad pa'i phyogs kho na brten par bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, this position is quite unreasonable.

original: de las kyang ji skad bshad pa'i mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang ji skad bshad pa'i mi 'dod par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: And from that, the undesirable consequence explained above would follow.

original: 'grel pa byed pas ni gang yang blo skye ba zhes pa rgyan dang bcas pa'i ngag brjod do zhes pa de'i phyir /üîΩ'di gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'grel pa byed pas ni gang yang blo skye ba zhes pa rgyan dang bcas pa'i ngag brjod do zhes pa de'i phyir / 'di gsungs pa /
translated: He says this because he wants to say that the collection of causes of cognition is the subject.

original: blo yi rgyu yi tshogs pa na //
analyzed: blo yi rgyu yi tshogs pa na //
translated: The collection of causes of cognition

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩde zhes pa yon tan du gyur kyang blo la snyeg gi /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste / de zhes pa yon tan du gyur kyang blo la snyeg gi /
translated: and so on.

original: tshogs pa la ma yin te de la med pa'i bud med kyi rtags nye bar bkod pa'i phyir dang 'grel bar yang de ltar rnam par bshad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'dus byas pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa dag ga ma /
analyzed: tshogs pa la ma yin te de la med pa'i bud med kyi rtags nye bar bkod pa'i phyir dang 'grel bar yang de ltar rnam par bshad pa'i phyir ro // 'dus byas pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa dag ga ma /
translated: Although it is a quality, it is not the collection of causes of cognition, because the sign of a woman is adduced as nonexistent in that collection, and because the commentary explains it that way.

original: bdag gi yon tan shes pa las skyes pa shes pa'i rgyu ste /üîΩ'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis shes pa'i khyad @78a * //
analyzed: bdag gi yon tan shes pa las skyes pa shes pa'i rgyu ste / 'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis shes pa'i khyad @78a * //
translated: The collection of causes of cognition is the cause of the cognition that arises from the knowledge of the qualities of the self.

original: par skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the difference in cognition arises from the difference in the collection of causes of cognition.

original: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: The author of the commentary says, ‚ÄúThe cognition of the qualities of the self‚Äù and so on.üîΩHe says this because he wants to say that the cognition of the qualities of the self is the subject.

original: gang yod pa ma yin pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yod pa ma yin pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of the qualities of the self is not a direct perception, because it is not a direct perception.

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin tshogs pa la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i rgyu yang de lta bu'o zhes khyab par byed pa med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin tshogs pa la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i rgyu yang de lta bu'o zhes khyab par byed pa med pa gsungs so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe arising of cognition‚Äù is also a reason that is contradictory to the pervasion.üîΩWhat is the point of saying ‚Äúalso‚Äù?

original: blo skye ba zhes pas yang ci bya zhes pa 'dis kyang gang don med pa de bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: blo skye ba zhes pas yang ci bya zhes pa 'dis kyang gang don med pa de bya ba ma yin te /
translated: This is saying that if something is pointless, then it should not be done,

original: de las gzhan pa'i don med ba can bzhin /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i don med ba can bzhin /
translated: like something that has no purpose other than that.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe arising of cognition‚Äù is also like that.

original: blo skye ba smos pa yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa 'gal ba'o //üîΩde ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: blo skye ba smos pa yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa 'gal ba'o // de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is a reason that is contradictory to the pervasion.

original: de med na blo skye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa'i yang dag par phrad pa yang mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med na blo skye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa'i yang dag par phrad pa yang mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThat may be so, but if there is no contact, then something that is not a cause of the arising of cognition would be a direct percept.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir yang dag par phrad ba'i khyad par gyi don du de bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang dag par phrad ba'i khyad par gyi don du de bya'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the point of contact is to make something that is a cause of the arising of cognition.

original: 'di na yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di na yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case.

original: gang phyir phrad pa ni blo skye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang phyir phrad pa ni blo skye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid srid pa ma yin te /
translated: This is because it is not possible for contact not to be a cause of the arising of cognition.

original: 'bras bu ni de'i yod pa nyid rjes su dpog pas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de'i yod pa nyid rjes su dpog pas so //
translated: This is because the existence of the effect is inferred from it.

original: de med na de'i rtogs pa ga las yin /
analyzed: de med na de'i rtogs pa ga las yin /
translated: If that does not exist, how could there be the realization of that?

original: bya ba'i khyad par yang blo'i 'bras bur nges par bya ste /
analyzed: bya ba'i khyad par yang blo'i 'bras bur nges par bya ste /
translated: Also, the particular action is to be ascertained as the effect of the cognition.

original: de ltar ni re zhig dngos po gzhan rnams kyang rgyal dpog gi slob ma rnams kyis bya bas rjes su dpag par byar 'dod de /
analyzed: de ltar ni re zhig dngos po gzhan rnams kyang rgyal dpog gi slob ma rnams kyis bya bas rjes su dpag par byar 'dod de /
translated: In this way, first, other things also are asserted to be inferred by the action of the disciples of Jaimini.

original: dbang po las 'das pa rnams dbang po rnams lta ci smos /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa rnams dbang po rnams lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention that which is beyond the senses?

original: yang ci ltar rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa'i khyad par ni gzhi mtshungs pa can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang ci ltar rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa'i khyad par ni gzhi mtshungs pa can du 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, how could the particularity of the different divisions be the same basis?

original: yang dag par phrad pa na blo skye ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par phrad pa na blo skye ba zhes pa'o //
translated: When there is perfect contact, cognition arises.

original: ci ste gzhi mthun pa dang bral ba'i khyad par skyes bu'i rgyal po lta bu yin na /
analyzed: ci ste gzhi mthun pa dang bral ba'i khyad par skyes bu'i rgyal po lta bu yin na /
translated: But if the particularity that is free from the common basis is like the king of persons,

original: de'i tshe yang dag par phrad pa kho na blo skye ba'i khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang dag par phrad pa kho na blo skye ba'i khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di snying po med pa'o //
translated: then at that time, the particular arising of cognition is only perfect contact. This is pointless.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: gang dbang po'i ngor 'jug ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dbang po'i ngor 'jug ba ma yin te /
translated: That which does not engage in the form of the senses,

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i mngon sum ma yin pa bzhin /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i mngon sum ma yin pa bzhin /
translated: like the non-perception of what is desired.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i tshogs pa yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i tshogs pa yang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa gsungs so //
translated: The collection as it has been explained is like that.

original: 'du byed ldan zhes pa 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ldan zhes pa 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The possession of compositional activity is the possession of composition.

original: yid dang dbang po phrad pa dang dbang po dang don phrad pa dbang po'i ngor 'jug go zhes pa de'i phyir de brjod ces gsungs so //
analyzed: yid dang dbang po phrad pa dang dbang po dang don phrad pa dbang po'i ngor 'jug go zhes pa de'i phyir de brjod ces gsungs so //
translated: The contact of the mental faculty and the sense faculty, and the contact of the sense faculty and the object, are the engagement in the aspect of the sense faculty. Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúbecause of that, it is said.‚Äù

original: gang yang rtogs pa zhes pa /
analyzed: gang yang rtogs pa zhes pa /
translated: Also, what is called ‚Äúrealization‚Äù

original: de'i bsam pa ni /
analyzed: de'i bsam pa ni /
translated: is the intention

original: dbang po dang phrad pa kho na shes pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: dbang po dang phrad pa kho na shes pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: that the contact of the sense faculty is the uncommon cause of consciousness.

original: de'i phyir de kho na gang las blo skye ba zhes pas 'dir ming thams cad pa'i rgyu nyid kyi mchog tu snyeg pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na gang las blo skye ba zhes pas 'dir ming thams cad pa'i rgyu nyid kyi mchog tu snyeg pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúbecause of that, it is said,‚Äù and here, the supreme pursuit of the cause of all names is ‚Äúthat from which the mind arises.‚Äù

original: de yang dbang po'i ngor 'jug pa'i phyir mngon sum du bstan par rigs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dbang po'i ngor 'jug pa'i phyir mngon sum du bstan par rigs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Also, because of the engagement in the aspect of the sense faculty, it is reasonable to teach it as perception.

original: @78b de yang gnyis la gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes pa dbang po dang don la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis la gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: @78b de yang gnyis la gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes pa dbang po dang don la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis la gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Because it exists in two, i.e., because it engages both the sense faculty and the object.

original: des kyang dbang po kho na 'di'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: des kyang dbang po kho na 'di'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: This shows that the sense faculty is not its unique cause.

original: de ltar ni de gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir /üîΩji ltar dbang po gzhan de'i rgyu ma yin pa de ltar yul gzhan yang ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni de gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir / ji ltar dbang po gzhan de'i rgyu ma yin pa de ltar yul gzhan yang ste /
translated: Because it exists in both,üîΩjust as the sense faculty is not the cause of that, so too the object is not.üîΩJust as the object is connected with another sense faculty, so too the sense faculty is connected with another object.

original: ji ltar yang yul ni dbang po ma yin pa gzhan gyis kyang sbyor ba yin pa de ltar dbang po yang yul ma yin pa gzhan gyis kyang ngo zhes pas bye brag med do //
analyzed: ji ltar yang yul ni dbang po ma yin pa gzhan gyis kyang sbyor ba yin pa de ltar dbang po yang yul ma yin pa gzhan gyis kyang ngo zhes pas bye brag med do //
translated: There is no difference.

original: thun mong ma yin pas kyang 'jig rten na tha snyad byed pa mthong zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pas kyang 'jig rten na tha snyad byed pa mthong zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: And it has been explained previously that the world uses conventions based on the unique.

original: de'i phyir dbang po kho nas tha snyad du bya ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po kho nas tha snyad du bya ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is not to be conventionally designated by the sense faculty alone.

original: 'di ni brtag bya ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni brtag bya ma yin no //
translated: This is not to be investigated.

original: zhes pa'o // gang las gang nges pa zhes pa la sogs pa gang las blo skye ba de mngon sum mo zhes pa 'di'i 'di bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // gang las gang nges pa zhes pa la sogs pa gang las blo skye ba de mngon sum mo zhes pa 'di'i 'di bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the verse that begins with ‚ÄúFrom which, which ascertainment?‚Äù

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: dbang po la sogs pa phrad pa gang las 'di ba lang kho na'o zhes pa la sogs pa nges pa'i shes pa skye ba de mngon sum mo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa phrad pa gang las 'di ba lang kho na'o zhes pa la sogs pa nges pa'i shes pa skye ba de mngon sum mo zhes pa'o //
translated: That from which ascertainment arises, such as ‚ÄúThis is a cow,‚Äù is direct perception.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te zhes pa rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes pa na dbang po la sogs pa yang dag par phrad pa las yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te zhes pa rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes pa na dbang po la sogs pa yang dag par phrad pa las yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not reasonable, because a cognition of this kind does not arise from the correct contact of the sense faculties and so on.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / ba lang la sogs sbyor las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / ba lang la sogs sbyor las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the connection with a cow and so on‚Äù and so forth.

original: yang gi sgra ni rgyu'i don la'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni rgyu'i don la'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of a reason.

original: gang gi phyir ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par dang 'brel ba las don la ba lang nyid la sogs par nges par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par dang 'brel ba las don la ba lang nyid la sogs par nges par bya ba yin na /
translated: Because the ascertainment of an object as a cow and so on is made from the connection with the particularities of a cow and so on,

original: dbang po'i blo la /
analyzed: dbang po'i blo la /
translated: in the cognition of the sense faculties,

original: khyad par dang khyad par can dag sbyor bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par can dag sbyor bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it possible to connect the specific and the general.

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid mi srid pa'o zhes pas mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid mi srid pa'o zhes pas mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, since the characteristics are impossible, it is illogical.

original: khyod kyi lugs kyi zhes pa gang gi phyir pha rol pos pa lang nyid la sogs pa rnams dang / de'i rten rdzas kyang dngos po nyid du khas blangs te /
analyzed: khyod kyi lugs kyi zhes pa gang gi phyir pha rol pos pa lang nyid la sogs pa rnams dang / de'i rten rdzas kyang dngos po nyid du khas blangs te /
translated: In your system, since the opponent accepts that cowness and so on and also the substance that is their basis are things,

original: de'i phyir de'i yul can nyid du dbang po'i blo dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i yul can nyid du dbang po'i blo dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: therefore the cognition of the sense faculty that has them as its object is asserted.

original: rjes su mtshams sbyor ba la ni khyad par dang khyad par can dngos por gyur pa dag la yang dbang po'i blos nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su mtshams sbyor ba la ni khyad par dang khyad par can dngos por gyur pa dag la yang dbang po'i blos nus pa ma yin no //
translated: However, in the connection of the subsequent moment, the sense consciousness is not able to connect the specific and the general that have become things.

original: de ltar ni pha rol po'i lugs kyis dri gzugs can gyi dbang po'i yul dang rdzas kyang yin pa de lta na yang de dag phan tshun rjes su mtshams sbyor ba na /
analyzed: de ltar ni pha rol po'i lugs kyis dri gzugs can gyi dbang po'i yul dang rdzas kyang yin pa de lta na yang de dag phan tshun rjes su mtshams sbyor ba na /
translated: In that way, in the system of the opponent, even though smell is the object of the nose sense faculty and is also a substance, when they are connected in the subsequent moment,

original: de'i nus pa khas blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i nus pa khas blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: their potency is not to be accepted.

original: dri bzang po rdzas @79a * //
analyzed: dri bzang po rdzas @79a * //
translated: Good smell is a substance.

original: so zhes pa 'di gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa yin na dri'i yul can ma yin zhing /
analyzed: so zhes pa 'di gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa yin na dri'i yul can ma yin zhing /
translated: If this ‚Äúeye‚Äù is the eye consciousness, it is not a subject of smell.

original: de ste sna'i rnam par shes pa yin na rdzas kyi yul can nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ste sna'i rnam par shes pa yin na rdzas kyi yul can nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the nose consciousness, it is not tenable that it is a subject of a substance.

original: rang gi lugs kyis ni rigs dang rdzas dag kyang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rang gi lugs kyis ni rigs dang rdzas dag kyang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: In our system, neither type nor substance exists.

original: yod pa ma yin pa kun nas lta ba'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du khyod kyi lugs kyis zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa kun nas lta ba'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du khyod kyi lugs kyis zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach that, ‚ÄúYou see what does not exist,‚Äù he says, ‚ÄúIn your system.‚ÄùüîΩNow, in the Examination of the Skeptic, this point

original: 'o na gzegs zan brtag par don 'di /
analyzed: 'o na gzegs zan brtag par don 'di /
translated: is explained:

original: yul la lta don can nyid phyir //
analyzed: yul la lta don can nyid phyir //
translated: Because the object of seeing is the object of the sense faculties,

original: khyad par rnams kyis mtshams sbyor min //
analyzed: khyad par rnams kyis mtshams sbyor min //
translated: the particulars are not connected.

original: zhes pa bshad zin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: zhes pa bshad zin pa kho na ste /
translated: This is exactly what has been explained.

original: de slar yang brjod pa ci zhe na /üîΩde kho na rang gis rig bya zhes pa la sogs pas bar ma chad par chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas /
analyzed: de slar yang brjod pa ci zhe na / de kho na rang gis rig bya zhes pa la sogs pas bar ma chad par chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas /
translated: What is the point of saying it again?

original: shin tu gsal bar byas pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: shin tu gsal bar byas pa'i don du'o //
translated: The point is to make it very clear by means of the argument that begins with ‚ÄúThat which is to be known by itself‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: Well, that may be so.

original: mtshams sbyor ba med par yang nges par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor ba med par yang nges par 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If you say that it is ascertained without a connection, then it is said, ‚ÄúNo, etc.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir yid las byung ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir yid las byung ba zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúarisen from mind.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dbang po las skyes pas sbyor ba ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dbang po las skyes pas sbyor ba ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that because it is not produced from a sense faculty, it is not a connection.

original: tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs pa ste /
translated: It is a designation as non-different.

original: khyad par rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo dang / khyad par can brjod par bya ba'i rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo dang / khyad par can brjod par bya ba'i rtogs pa'o //
translated: The nature of the expression of the distinction is the understanding of the expressed distinction.

original: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dag las yang zhes smos pa ni dpe'i don du'o //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dag las yang zhes smos pa ni dpe'i don du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúagain‚Äù in ‚Äúfrom the expression and the expressed‚Äù is for the sake of an example.

original: gang tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs pa'i shes pa de yid kyi yin te /
analyzed: gang tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs pa'i shes pa de yid kyi yin te /
translated: The cognition that is a designation as non-different is mental.

original: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba tha mi dad du nye bar 'dogs pa'i rtogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba tha mi dad du nye bar 'dogs pa'i rtogs pa bzhin /
translated: It is like the understanding of the designation of the expression and the expressed as non-different.

original: ba lang kho na 'di'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: ba lang kho na 'di'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa yang de lta bu'o //
translated: The cognition that thinks, ‚ÄúThis is just a cow,‚Äù is also like that.

original: rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa khyab pa mi srid par dris pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa khyab pa mi srid par dris pa'o //
translated: Why? This asks about the impossibility of the pervasion.

original: rang gis rig bya ni zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs gsungs so //
analyzed: rang gis rig bya ni zhes pa la sogs pas gtan tshigs gsungs so //
translated: The reason is stated in ‚Äúbecause it is not perceived by the other.‚Äù

original: 'di yang du ma'i ngo bo'i chos can ni zhes pa 'di'i nang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di yang du ma'i ngo bo'i chos can ni zhes pa 'di'i nang du bshad zin to //
translated: This is also explained in the section on the subject that has a multiple nature.

original: thun mong ma yin pas zhes pa /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pas zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is not shared‚Äù means

original: thun mong ba ni 'ga' zhig tu nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //üîΩde 'dis ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pa kho na rang gi mtshan nyid yin zhing dbang po'i blo'i yul te /
analyzed: thun mong ba ni 'ga' zhig tu nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to // de 'dis ni tha snyad du bya ba ma yin pa kho na rang gi mtshan nyid yin zhing dbang po'i blo'i yul te /
translated: that it is not shared because it is not applied to anything else.

original: tha snyad du bya ba spyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad du bya ba spyi ni ma yin no //
translated: This is saying that the object of a sense consciousness is only a unique particular that is not a conventional term and is not a universal that is a conventional term.

original: de'i phyir des ni tha dad med par yang nye bar gdags pa bya bar nus pa ma yin no zhes gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir des ni tha dad med par yang nye bar gdags pa bya bar nus pa ma yin no zhes gsal bar byas so //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to impute something that is not different from that.

original: gang gang zhig gi yul ma yin pa de des tha mi dad pa nye bar gdags pa bya bar nus pa ma @79b yin te /
analyzed: gang gang zhig gi yul ma yin pa de des tha mi dad pa nye bar gdags pa bya bar nus pa ma @79b yin te /
translated: That which is not the object of something cannot be imputed as not different from it.

original: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa sgras bzhin /
analyzed: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa sgras bzhin /
translated: For example, the eye consciousness is not the object of sound.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i spyi yang dbang po'i blo'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i spyi yang dbang po'i blo'i yul ma yin no //
translated: The universals of cow-ness and so forth are also not the objects of the sense consciousnesses.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: [The reason] is contradictory to the pervader.

original: de las kyang 'di ni yid kyi kho na'o zhes gnas so //
analyzed: de las kyang 'di ni yid kyi kho na'o zhes gnas so //
translated: And from that, it is established that this is only mental.

original: ci ste yang zhes pa ma grub pa nyid du dogs par byed de /
analyzed: ci ste yang zhes pa ma grub pa nyid du dogs par byed de /
translated: But if one doubts that the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is not established,

original: rnam / pa thams cad ces pa shes bya nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pas kyang zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: rnam / pa thams cad ces pa shes bya nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pas kyang zhes pa'i don te /
translated: the phrase ‚Äúin all aspects‚Äù means ‚Äúby the aspects of object of knowledge and so forth.‚Äù

original: de las skyon ci yod gsungs pa /üîΩrnam kun zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de las skyon ci yod gsungs pa / rnam kun zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: What is the fault of that? He says:

original: rnam kun don gyi rnam shes ni //
analyzed: rnam kun don gyi rnam shes ni //
translated: If the consciousness of the object in all aspects

original: gnas na ste /
analyzed: gnas na ste /
translated: exists,

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi don rtogs pa la 'jug bzhin par gyur pa na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi don rtogs pa la 'jug bzhin par gyur pa na /
translated: then when it is engaged in the realization of the object in all aspects,

original: mngon sum blor mi 'gyur zhes sprel te /
analyzed: mngon sum blor mi 'gyur zhes sprel te /
translated: it will not become a direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyi sgra'i brjod bya ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi sgra'i brjod bya ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it will not be the expressed object of the word ‚Äúdirect perception.‚Äù

original: 'di ci las she na /
analyzed: 'di ci las she na /
translated: What is the reason for this?

original: gsungs pa / mngon sum gyi sgra ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / mngon sum gyi sgra ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The passage beginning ‚ÄúThe term ‚Äòperception‚Äô . . .‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir bshad 'grel byed pa po'i 'dod pas mngon sum gyi sgra gsum rnams kho na la 'jug ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bshad 'grel byed pa po'i 'dod pas mngon sum gyi sgra gsum rnams kho na la 'jug ste /
translated: Because of the desire of the author of the commentary, the term ‚Äúperception‚Äù is used only for the three.

original: tshad ma la ni dngos so zhes pa'o //üîΩphrad pa la ni mngon sum gyis gzhal zin pa gnyis kyi phyir zhes pa ste /
analyzed: tshad ma la ni dngos so zhes pa'o // phrad pa la ni mngon sum gyis gzhal zin pa gnyis kyi phyir zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of valid cognition, it is direct.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúIn the case of contact, it is because two are directly perceived.‚Äù

original: bres gzhal zin pa la ni brer nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bres gzhal zin pa la ni brer nye bar 'dogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as when two things are directly perceived, they are designated as in contact.

original: shes pa la zhes pa ni 'bras bu la'o //
analyzed: shes pa la zhes pa ni 'bras bu la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of consciousness, it is in the effect.‚Äù

original: dbang po la so sor 'jug pa zhes pa 'dis chos mthun pa nyid kyis tshad ma dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum du nye bar btags par rigs te /
analyzed: dbang po la so sor 'jug pa zhes pa 'dis chos mthun pa nyid kyis tshad ma dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum du nye bar btags par rigs te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of the sense faculties, it is because they engage individually.‚Äù By this, because of the similarity of the property, it is reasonable to designate valid cognition as perception,

original: bram ze'i khye'u la seng ge zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u la seng ge zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: just as a young brahmin is designated as a lion.

original: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: ‚ÄúEven though . . .‚Äù and so forth.

original: rnam kun don gyi rnam shes ni //
analyzed: rnam kun don gyi rnam shes ni //
translated: The consciousness of the object in all ways

original: gnas pa zhes pa 'di bshad de //
analyzed: gnas pa zhes pa 'di bshad de //
translated: Is explained as ‚Äúabiding.‚Äù

original: de zhes pa la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: de zhes pa la sogs pa ni //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù and so forth.

original: mngon sum blo min 'gyur zhes pa 'di'o//
analyzed: mngon sum blo min 'gyur zhes pa 'di'o//
translated: ‚ÄúNor is it the cognition of the senses‚Äù is the second line.

original: dbang po'i ltos pa dang zhes pa /
analyzed: dbang po'i ltos pa dang zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe dependence of the senses‚Äù is the third line.

original: spyi'i blo rnams ni 'das pa la sogs pa rnams la yang yod pa'i phyir long ba la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: spyi'i blo rnams ni 'das pa la sogs pa rnams la yang yod pa'i phyir long ba la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo //
translated: The cognition of the universal is also present in the past, etc., and in the blind, etc.

original: tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs par zhugs pa zhes pa tha dad med par nye bar btags pa'i blo rnam kyang 'di lta bu'i rnam pa can rnams kho na'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs par zhugs pa zhes pa tha dad med par nye bar btags pa'i blo rnam kyang 'di lta bu'i rnam pa can rnams kho na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cognition of the nondifferent is also of this form‚Äù is the fourth line. The cognition of the nondifferent is also of this form.

original: yang na yod pa ma yin pas kyang tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: yang na yod pa ma yin pas kyang tha mi dad par nye bar 'dogs par byed de /
translated: Or, it is also designated as nondifferent although it does not exist.

original: ji ltar gtso bo'i rang bzhin gyi grags can pa'i skyes bu 'di'o zhes pa ltar ro //
analyzed: ji ltar gtso bo'i rang bzhin gyi grags can pa'i skyes bu 'di'o zhes pa ltar ro //
translated: For example, it is like the statement, ‚ÄúThis is the famous person who is the essence of the primary elements.‚Äù

original: 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dbang po la sogs pa phrad pa las skyes pa'i shes par 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dbang po la sogs pa phrad pa las skyes pa'i shes par 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not asserted that the cognition produced from the contact of the senses, etc., is of this form.

original: spyi dbang po'i blo'i yul ma @80a * //
analyzed: spyi dbang po'i blo'i yul ma @80a * //
translated: The universal is not the object of the cognition of the senses.

original: yin no zhes bsgrubs kyang zin to //
analyzed: yin no zhes bsgrubs kyang zin to //
translated: This has been established.

original: dbang po'i gzhan dbang du ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes pa shugs las mngon sum gyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i ngor zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i gzhan dbang du ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes pa shugs las mngon sum gyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i ngor zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This is to be understood as the force of the term ‚Äúdirect perception‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúthe object of direct perception.‚Äù

original: de ltar ni mngon sum gyi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin nyid rtogs par byas pa nyid kyis skabs su byas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni mngon sum gyi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin nyid rtogs par byas pa nyid kyis skabs su byas so //
translated: In this way, the fact that it is not the object of direct perception is established by the mere fact that it is the object of inference.

original: 'di ni 'di ltar gdon mi za bar rnam par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di ltar gdon mi za bar rnam par shes par bya ste /
translated: This is to be understood in the following way.

original: gzhan du na dbang po la mi ltos pa dang / dbang po'i gzhan dbang dag ces pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na dbang po la mi ltos pa dang / dbang po'i gzhan dbang dag ces pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be contradictory to say that it is not dependent on the sense faculties and that it is under the influence of the sense faculties.

original: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /üîΩshes pa skye ba na dbang po'i gzhan dbang can du mngon sum dang chos mthun pa'i phyir mngon sum du nye bar btags pa ni yang na /
analyzed: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te / shes pa skye ba na dbang po'i gzhan dbang can du mngon sum dang chos mthun pa'i phyir mngon sum du nye bar btags pa ni yang na /
translated: This is explained as follows.üîΩWhen consciousness arises, it is designated as direct perception because it is similar to direct perception in being under the influence of the sense faculties.

original: mngon sum gyi mnyan pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi mnyan pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan te /
translated: Or, it is the reason for engaging the activity of direct perception.

original: de med na de 'jug pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de med na de 'jug pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Without it, that activity does not occur.

original: rgyu mtshan can gyi mnyan pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu mtshan gang na med pa der de 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can gyi mnyan pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu mtshan gang na med pa der de 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason why the name ‚Äúperceiver‚Äù is given to a certain person is not present in the case of the other person.

original: dper na dbyug pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu la dbyug pa can gyi mnyan pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na dbyug pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu la dbyug pa can gyi mnyan pa bzhin /
translated: For example, a person who is without a stick is not called ‚Äúa man with a stick.‚Äù

original: ji skad bshad pa'i shes pa la yang mngon sum gyi mnyan pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin no zhes ba rgyu mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i shes pa la yang mngon sum gyi mnyan pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin no zhes ba rgyu mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The reason why the name ‚Äúperceiver‚Äù is given to a certain person is not present in the case of the other person.

original: rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pas skyon gzhan gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pas skyon gzhan gsungs so //
translated: The other fault is stated in the line ‚ÄúIn every way,‚Äù and so forth.

original: yon tan nyid la sogs pa spyi'i chos rnams ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa thams cad du yod pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: yon tan nyid la sogs pa spyi'i chos rnams ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa thams cad du yod pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since the general properties of being a quality, and so on, are present in all things, such as form, sound, and so on,

original: ji ltar mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar rna ba la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo zhes pas dbang po gzhan gyi yul la yang dbang po gzhan 'jug go //
analyzed: ji ltar mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar rna ba la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo zhes pas dbang po gzhan gyi yul la yang dbang po gzhan 'jug go //
translated: just as something is perceptible by the eye, it is also perceptible by the ear and so on. Thus, one sense faculty engages the object of another sense faculty.

original: de'i phyir dbang po du ma brtag pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po du ma brtag pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is pointless to posit many sense faculties.

original: 'bras bu gzhan pa 'thob ma yin //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan pa 'thob ma yin //
translated: Nor is there any other effect.

original: rtogs pa ni shes pa'i 'bras bu yin pa ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa ni shes pa'i 'bras bu yin pa ste /
translated: Understanding is the effect of knowledge.

original: de gal te tshad ma yin na 'bras bu gzhan pa med do //
analyzed: de gal te tshad ma yin na 'bras bu gzhan pa med do //
translated: If that is a means of valid cognition, there is no other effect.

original: nyams pa nye bar blang bya la ltos pa'i blo rnams 'bras bu'o zhes brtags par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams pa nye bar blang bya la ltos pa'i blo rnams 'bras bu'o zhes brtags par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not reasonable to imagine that the cognitions that depend on the acquisition of what is lost are the effect,

original: chu la sogs pa dran pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa dran pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because water, etc., are interrupted by memory.

original: bar du chod pa dang bar du chod pa ma yin pa dag las kyang bar du ma chod pa kho na 'bras bur gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bar du chod pa dang bar du chod pa ma yin pa dag las kyang bar du ma chod pa kho na 'bras bur gzung bar bya'o //
translated: And from among what is interrupted and what is not interrupted, only what is not interrupted should be accepted as the effect.

original: yul tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'bras bur de rnams mi rigs te /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'bras bur de rnams mi rigs te /
translated: Also, they are not reasonable as the effect because of the difference in objects,

original: gang phyir mngon sum ni gzugs la sogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin la /
analyzed: gang phyir mngon sum ni gzugs la sogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin la /
translated: because perception has as its object the intrinsic identity of form, etc.,

original: de rnams ni 'degs pa la sogs pa bya ba'i yul can rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams ni 'degs pa la sogs pa bya ba'i yul can rnams so //
translated: and those have as their objects such actions as lifting, etc.

original: blo yi yang zhes pa la sogs @80b ba ste /üîΩblo skye ba mdor mngon sum du bshad la /
analyzed: blo yi yang zhes pa la sogs @80b ba ste /üîΩblo skye ba mdor mngon sum du bshad la /
translated: The cognition of the object, etc.,üîΩis not the effect of the means of valid cognition,üîΩbecause it is not produced from that.üîΩThe cognition of the object, etc., is not the effect of the means of valid cognition, because it is not produced from that.

original: de yang blo las gzhan nam gzhan ma yin pa gcig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang blo las gzhan nam gzhan ma yin pa gcig tu 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, it would be either other than cognition or not other than cognition.

original: de la gal te gzhan du 'dod na /
analyzed: de la gal te gzhan du 'dod na /
translated: If it is asserted to be other,

original: de kho na tshad mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na tshad mar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be a valid cognition of reality.

original: skye ba yang ka na bhu dz'a ni bdag la rang gi rgyu la blo'i 'du ba ste /
analyzed: skye ba yang ka na bhu dz'a ni bdag la rang gi rgyu la blo'i 'du ba ste /
translated: Arising is the coming together of the self with its cause.

original: yang na yod pa nyid dang yon tan nyid dang blo nyid 'du ba ste shes pa 'bras bu la'o //
analyzed: yang na yod pa nyid dang yon tan nyid dang blo nyid 'du ba ste shes pa 'bras bu la'o //
translated: Or else, the coming together of existence, quality, and cognition is in the effect, cognition.

original: dpyod pa rnams kyis kyang de'i lugs kho na la brten to //
analyzed: dpyod pa rnams kyis kyang de'i lugs kho na la brten to //
translated: The NaiyƒÅyikas also rely on just that system.

original: de yang gang gi phyir bshad 'grel byed pa'i lugs kyis 'du ba mngon sum du thob cing /
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir bshad 'grel byed pa'i lugs kyis 'du ba mngon sum du thob cing /
translated: Moreover, in the system of the author of the Commentary, the coming together is obtained by direct perception,

original: de mngon sum nyid du rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de mngon sum nyid du rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: and it is not reasonable that it is direct perception,

original: don la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is mistaken with regard to the object.

original: de ltar ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir don med na yang de yod pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir don med na yang de yod pas so //
translated: That is because, even when there is no object, it exists due to permanence.

original: gang don la 'khrul pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: gang don la 'khrul pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: That which is mistaken with regard to the object is not direct perception,

original: log pa'i shes pa bzhin /
analyzed: log pa'i shes pa bzhin /
translated: like a mistaken cognition.

original: 'du ba yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du ba yang de lta bu'o //
translated: The coming together is also like that.

original: 'gal bas khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab pa'o //
translated: It is pervaded by contradiction.

original: ci ste 'grel pa byed pa'i 'dod pas gang las blo skye ba de mngon sum yin pa /
analyzed: ci ste 'grel pa byed pa'i 'dod pas gang las blo skye ba de mngon sum yin pa /
translated: If, by the desire of the author of the commentary, that from which cognition arises is direct perception,

original: de lta na yang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir 'du ba ni 'ga' zhig las kyang skye ba ma yin no zhes pas yul med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de lta na yang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir 'du ba ni 'ga' zhig las kyang skye ba ma yin no zhes pas yul med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: even so, because of permanence, the collection does not arise from anything at all. Thus, it is characterized as non-existent.

original: de'i phyir gnyi ga ltar na yang ni gal te mdo byed pa po'i 'dod pas yin na dang / gal te 'grel pa byed pa po'i 'dod pas yin na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyi ga ltar na yang ni gal te mdo byed pa po'i 'dod pas yin na dang / gal te 'grel pa byed pa po'i 'dod pas yin na'o //
translated: Therefore, in both cases, if it is by the desire of the author of the s≈´tra, and if it is by the desire of the author of the commentary,

original: yang na gal te rang gi rgyu la 'bras bu 'du ba blo skye bar 'dod na dang / gal te yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu shes pa la 'du ba yin na ste /
analyzed: yang na gal te rang gi rgyu la 'bras bu 'du ba blo skye bar 'dod na dang / gal te yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu shes pa la 'du ba yin na ste /
translated: or if the collection of the effect in its cause is asserted to be the arising of cognition, and if the existence, etc. of the effect is the collection in cognition,

original: gnyis ka ltar na yang mngon sum nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ka ltar na yang mngon sum nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: in both cases, it is not reasonable as direct perception.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If, etc.

original: gzhan ma yin pa nyid na /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa nyid na /
translated: If it is not different,

original: blo kho na skye ba'o zhes pas skye ba smos pa lugs gnyis ka la yang don med pa'o //
analyzed: blo kho na skye ba'o zhes pas skye ba smos pa lugs gnyis ka la yang don med pa'o //
translated: then cognition alone arises. Thus, the statement of arising is meaningless in both systems.

original: 'o na skye ba smos pa'i dgos pa skye bzhin pa'i gnas skabs kyi blo kho na tshad ma nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du'o zhes bshad zin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na skye ba smos pa'i dgos pa skye bzhin pa'i gnas skabs kyi blo kho na tshad ma nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du'o zhes bshad zin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But has it not already been explained that the purpose of mentioning ‚Äúarising‚Äù is to show that only the cognition at the time of arising is valid cognition?

original: de mi rigs par bshad zin to //üîΩde ltar ni skad cig pa nyid kyis phyi ma'i dus su gnas pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de mi rigs par bshad zin to // de ltar ni skad cig pa nyid kyis phyi ma'i dus su gnas pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: It has been explained that this is not correct.

original: blo skye bzhin pa kho na tshad ma nyid yin gyi nye bar dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: blo skye bzhin pa kho na tshad ma nyid yin gyi nye bar dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: In that case, since it does not endure in a later time due to being momentary, it has been explained that only the arising of cognition is valid cognition, but it is not observed.üîΩSince at that time there is no cognition, there is no valid cognition. What is the point of mentioning ‚Äúarising‚Äù?

original: de'i tshe yang blo med pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid med pa'o zhes pas skye ba smos pas ci zhig / ci ste skye ba las dus phyis blo yod na /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang blo med pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid med pa'o zhes pas skye ba smos pas ci zhig / ci ste skye ba las dus phyis blo yod na /
translated: But if there is cognition after arising,

original: de lta na yang khyad par med pa'i phyir de las sngar yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang khyad par med pa'i phyir de las sngar yang /
translated: then even in that case, since there is no difference, it would be valid cognition even before that.

original: de yin na de'i tshe yang tshad ma nyid bzlog par bya ba ma yin no zhes pas skye ba smos pas ci zhig / blos khyad par du byas pa'i skye @81a * //
analyzed: de yin na de'i tshe yang tshad ma nyid bzlog par bya ba ma yin no zhes pas skye ba smos pas ci zhig / blos khyad par du byas pa'i skye @81a * //
translated: If it is valid cognition, then at that time it cannot be refuted. What is the point of mentioning ‚Äúarising‚Äù?

original: ba ni dbang po'i ngor mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang sngar bshad pa'i rgyu'i phyir mngon sum nyid med do //
analyzed: ba ni dbang po'i ngor mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang sngar bshad pa'i rgyu'i phyir mngon sum nyid med do //
translated: It is not a perception because it does not engage in the form of the sense faculty, and for the reasons explained above.

original: mu stegs pa thams cad bdag rab tu 'jal bar byed pa por 'dod de /
analyzed: mu stegs pa thams cad bdag rab tu 'jal bar byed pa por 'dod de /
translated: All the tƒ´rthikas assert that the self is the experiencer.

original: de'i phyir bzlog pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bzlog pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, in order to refute that, [the Buddha] said,

original: blo skye la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩci 'di kho nar rnam par dpyod par byed ce na /
analyzed: blo skye la zhes pa la sogs pa'o // ci 'di kho nar rnam par dpyod par byed ce na /
translated: ‚ÄúThe mind arises‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.üîΩIf one analyzes this, how can this dispute arise, since it is begun by an analysis?

original: rnam par dpyad pa rtsom pas na rtsod pa 'di ga la 'jug / gzhan yang 'dir mtshan nyid kyi ngag la skyes bu'i zhes pa'i tshig gi phyir bdag gi dbang du byas pa'o zhes pas 'di kho nar rnam par dpyad par rigs so //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa rtsom pas na rtsod pa 'di ga la 'jug / gzhan yang 'dir mtshan nyid kyi ngag la skyes bu'i zhes pa'i tshig gi phyir bdag gi dbang du byas pa'o zhes pas 'di kho nar rnam par dpyad par rigs so //
translated: Moreover, here in the statement of the definition, since the word ‚Äúperson‚Äù is used, it is appropriate to analyze this alone, since it is from the perspective of the self.

original: sngar gyi gnas skabs las rnam par 'gyur te zhes pa /
analyzed: sngar gyi gnas skabs las rnam par 'gyur te zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúChanges from its previous state‚Äù

original: rab tu 'jal ba po ma yin pa'i gnas skabs nye bar bcom pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rab tu 'jal ba po ma yin pa'i gnas skabs nye bar bcom pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means that the state of not being an experiencer is destroyed.

original: de ltar gyur na mi rtag par zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na mi rtag par zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIf that is so, it is impermanent‚ÄùüîΩmeans that it is not tenable that the self is permanent.

original: gang rnam par 'gyur ba can de mi rtag par yin te /
analyzed: gang rnam par 'gyur ba can de mi rtag par yin te /
translated: Whatever is perishable is impermanent,

original: bum pa bzhin /
analyzed: bum pa bzhin /
translated: like a pot.

original: bdag kyang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang de lta bu'o //
translated: And the self is like that.

original: rang bzhin gyi thal ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi thal ba'o //
translated: This is the natural reductio.

original: ci ste mi 'gyur na zhes pa la sogs pas gang gang gi tshe rab tu 'jal bar byed pa po ma yin pa'i gnas skabs las khyad par med pa de de'i tshe rab tu 'jal ba po ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste mi 'gyur na zhes pa la sogs pas gang gang gi tshe rab tu 'jal bar byed pa po ma yin pa'i gnas skabs las khyad par med pa de de'i tshe rab tu 'jal ba po ma yin te /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIt does not change,‚Äù then, as it was said, ‚ÄúIf it is not different from the state of not being a cognizer, then at that time it is not a cognizer,‚Äù

original: dper na sngar gyi skyes bu de kho na bzhin /
analyzed: dper na sngar gyi skyes bu de kho na bzhin /
translated: like the previous person.

original: de yang blo skyed pa na yang ji skad bshad pa yin no zhes pa 'gal bar khyab pa'i thal 'gyur gsungs so //
analyzed: de yang blo skyed pa na yang ji skad bshad pa yin no zhes pa 'gal bar khyab pa'i thal 'gyur gsungs so //
translated: And when the mind is generated, it is as it was explained. This is a reductio argument that exposes a contradiction.

original: 'di kho nas tshang ma brtag pa bzlog ba'i ched du /
analyzed: 'di kho nas tshang ma brtag pa bzlog ba'i ched du /
translated: Just this is the refutation of the objection.

original: tshad mar gyur pa zhes pa 'dir gang gyur pa smos pa der rigs pa gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: tshad mar gyur pa zhes pa 'dir gang gyur pa smos pa der rigs pa gsal bar byas so //
translated: Here, where it says, ‚ÄúIf it is valid cognition,‚Äù the reason is stated clearly.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa sgrub pa na yang ngo 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa bklag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa sgrub pa na yang ngo 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa bklag par bya ste /
translated: And when the pervasion of the reason that will be stated is established, it should be read as a verse:

original: gal te dngos po don bya ba'i //üîΩdus na 'gyur na mi rtag nyid //
analyzed: gal te dngos po don bya ba'i // dus na 'gyur na mi rtag nyid //
translated: If it is at the time of the function of the thing, then it is impermanent.

original: gal te de med de dngos min //
analyzed: gal te de med de dngos min //
translated: If it is not at that time, then it is not a thing.

original: nus pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of all ability.

original: zhes pa'o // yongs su bcad pa dang po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // yongs su bcad pa dang po'o //
translated: This is the first determination.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gnyis dag kho na'o zhes bshad zin to /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gnyis dag kho na'o zhes bshad zin to /
translated: It has been explained that there are only two valid cognitions, perception and inference.

original: // / de la mngon sum bshad zin te /
analyzed: // / de la mngon sum bshad zin te /
translated: Of these, perception has been explained.

original: da ni skabs su bab pa rjes su dpag pa rnam par bshad par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni skabs su bab pa rjes su dpag pa rnam par bshad par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to explain inference, which is the topic at hand, it is said:

original: rjes dpag rnam gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes dpag rnam gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Inference is of two kinds.

original: drang don ni gang gis rang nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: drang don ni gang gis rang nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The interpretable meaning is that by which one understands for oneself.

original: gzhan gyi don ni gang gis gzhan gyis rtogs su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don ni gang gis gzhan gyis rtogs su 'jug pa'o //
translated: The definitive meaning is that by which one causes others to understand.

original: 'o na gzhan don gyi mtshan nyid logs su brjod bya ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'o na gzhan don gyi mtshan nyid logs su brjod bya ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Well, the definition of the interpretable meaning is not to be stated separately.

original: gang phyir go @81b bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid bsgrub pa kho nas /
analyzed: gang phyir go @81b bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid bsgrub pa kho nas /
translated: Because the definition of the interpretable meaning is established by the very definition of the definitive meaning.

original: rtogs par 'dod pa po'i tshig gi rim pa bstan pa kho na'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtogs par 'dod pa po'i tshig gi rim pa bstan pa kho na'i phyir te /
translated: It is only in order to teach the sequence of words for those who desire to understand.

original: rnam pa gzhan du mngon par brjod na go bar byed pa'i chos rab tu gsal bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du mngon par brjod na go bar byed pa'i chos rab tu gsal bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For if it were expressed in another way, the teaching that causes understanding would not be clearly expressed.

original: gang don 'di ji lta ba bzhin rig cing tshig shes pa de rnams ni de rtogs par byed pa na slar nye bar bstan pa gzhan la ltos pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang don 'di ji lta ba bzhin rig cing tshig shes pa de rnams ni de rtogs par byed pa na slar nye bar bstan pa gzhan la ltos pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If someone who knows the meaning as it is and who knows the words were to teach it, he would not depend on another explanation.

original: 'di bden mod /
analyzed: 'di bden mod /
translated: This is true.

original: de lta na yang byis pas rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'di brtsams so //
analyzed: de lta na yang byis pas rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'di brtsams so //
translated: Nevertheless, it was composed for the sake of understanding by the childish.

original: dngos po ji lta bzhin rtogs pa rnams kyang rnam pa gzhan du brjod pa mthong bas te /
analyzed: dngos po ji lta bzhin rtogs pa rnams kyang rnam pa gzhan du brjod pa mthong bas te /
translated: Those who understand things as they are see that it is expressed in another way.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nye bar mkho ba yang mi brjod pa'i phyir dang / nye bar mi mkho ba yang bsgrub par bya ba dang / nye bar gtod pa dang mjug bsdu ba rnams sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nye bar mkho ba yang mi brjod pa'i phyir dang / nye bar mi mkho ba yang bsgrub par bya ba dang / nye bar gtod pa dang mjug bsdu ba rnams sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even that which is necessary is not expressed if it is not the case that it is not present, and that which is not necessary is applied, such as the probandum, the conclusion, and the summary.

original: tshul gsum las zhes pa rgyu la lnga pa ste /
analyzed: tshul gsum las zhes pa rgyu la lnga pa ste /
translated: The five cases of the reason are from the three modes.

original: brdungs pa las sgra zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: brdungs pa las sgra zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of the sound that is produced by the striking of a bell.

original: yang na lag pa phyis pa ste /
analyzed: yang na lag pa phyis pa ste /
translated: Or, it is like the case of the hand that wipes away.

original: 'di ltar khang bzangs la 'dzegs nas lta ba ni khang bzangs la lta ba yin pa de ltar tshul gsum pa'i rtags mthong nas don mthong ba ni tshul gsum rtags las don mthong ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar khang bzangs la 'dzegs nas lta ba ni khang bzangs la lta ba yin pa de ltar tshul gsum pa'i rtags mthong nas don mthong ba ni tshul gsum rtags las don mthong ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as when one climbs a mansion and sees the mansion, so when one sees the triply characterized reason, one sees the object.

original: 'o na tshul gsum pa smos pa don med de /
analyzed: 'o na tshul gsum pa smos pa don med de /
translated: But then the mention of the triply characterized reason is pointless,

original: tshul gsum pa ma yin pa ni rtags ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa ma yin pa ni rtags ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because what is not triply characterized is not a reason.

original: gzhan yang mi gsal ba'i don 'dis rtags su rtogs par byed pas rtags te /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi gsal ba'i don 'dis rtags su rtogs par byed pas rtags te /
translated: Moreover, this is a reason that causes one to understand an unclear object.

original: de yang tshul gsum pa med par srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang tshul gsum pa med par srid pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not possible without the triply characterized reason.

original: 'di las kyang rtogs zin pa'i don can nyid kyi phyir tshul gsum pa las zhes pa brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'di las kyang rtogs zin pa'i don can nyid kyi phyir tshul gsum pa las zhes pa brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: And in this case, because it has the meaning of what is already understood, one should not say ‚Äúfrom the triply characterized reason.‚Äù

original: 'di ni skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni skyon ma yin te /
translated: This is not a fault,

original: tshul gsum pa ma yin pa yang 'ga' zhig rtags su 'dod de /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa ma yin pa yang 'ga' zhig rtags su 'dod de /
translated: because some assert that what is not triply characterized is a reason.

original: des na de'i log par rtogs pa bzlog pa'i ched du tshul gsum pa smos so //
analyzed: des na de'i log par rtogs pa bzlog pa'i ched du tshul gsum pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, in order to stop his wrong understanding, the three modes are mentioned.

original: de la 'dzem med pas smras pa /
analyzed: de la 'dzem med pas smras pa /
translated: To this, PrƒÅsa·πÖgika says:

original: gang zhig gi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid 'di gtan tshigs su 'dod de //
analyzed: gang zhig gi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid 'di gtan tshigs su 'dod de //
translated: You assert this, which is not tenable in any other way, as the reason.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa can kho na yin pa de ni don mtshan nyid bzhi can kho na'o zhes te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa can kho na yin pa de ni don mtshan nyid bzhi can kho na'o zhes te /
translated: That which has only one characteristic is only an object with four characteristics.

original: rnam pa gzhan du zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba med par zhes pa'i don to //üîΩmi 'thad pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba med par zhes pa'i don to // mi 'thad pa nyid ni /
translated: ‚ÄúIn any other way‚Äù means ‚Äúwithout the probandum.‚Äù

original: rab tu nus pa med pa mi srid pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu nus pa med pa mi srid pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot tenable‚Äù means ‚Äúimpossible.‚Äù

original: 'o na 'di med na mi 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'di med na mi 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is not tenable, then it would be a necessary condition for this.‚Äù

original: ma yin no zhes 'dzem med pa ste /üîΩmed na mi 'byung ba nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba las phyi rol du 'dod la /üîΩrnam pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni chos can kho na la bsgrub @82a * //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes 'dzem med pa ste / med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba las phyi rol du 'dod la / rnam pa gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni chos can kho na la bsgrub @82a * //
translated: PrƒÅsa·πÖgika says, ‚ÄúNo.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúNecessary condition‚Äù is asserted to be outside the probandum.

original: par bya ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: par bya ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot tenable in any other way‚Äù is the probandum itself.

original: tshigs su bcad pa yang smras pa /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa yang smras pa /
translated: He also says in verse:

original: dpe la bsgrub bya med pa las //üîΩrtags nyid ma mthong gzhan gyis 'dod //
analyzed: dpe la bsgrub bya med pa las // rtags nyid ma mthong gzhan gyis 'dod //
translated: The reason is not seen in the example,üîΩbut the opponent asserts it.

original: bdag gis 'di ni med par yang //
analyzed: bdag gis 'di ni med par yang //
translated: I do not say that the reason is not seen in the object of affirmation,

original: chos can la ni mi srid pa'o //
analyzed: chos can la ni mi srid pa'o //
translated: but that it is impossible in the subject.

original: zhes so // 'di yang tshul gcig kho na'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'di yang tshul gcig kho na'o //
translated: This is the only method.

original: yang na tshul gsum pa nyid yod na /
analyzed: yang na tshul gsum pa nyid yod na /
translated: Or, if the trimodal condition exists,

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid tshul bzhi bar 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid tshul bzhi bar 'dod par bya'o //
translated: the impossibility of the reason in the absence of the property of the subject should be asserted as the fourth method.

original: tshul gsum pa nyid tsam la ni /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa nyid tsam la ni /
translated: In the mere trimodal condition,

original: yul gzhan du song ba de sngo bsangs yin te /
analyzed: yul gzhan du song ba de sngo bsangs yin te /
translated: the subject, having gone to another place, is blue,

original: nag po'i bu nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di yang rtags nyid du 'gyur ro zhe'o //
analyzed: nag po'i bu nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'di yang rtags nyid du 'gyur ro zhe'o //
translated: because of being the son of a dark woman. This is also a reason.

original: de la gang med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni pha rol po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba las phyi rol du 'dod do zhes brjod pa 'di sgro btags pa ste /
analyzed: de la gang med na mi 'byung ba nyid ni pha rol po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba las phyi rol du 'dod do zhes brjod pa 'di sgro btags pa ste /
translated: In this regard, it is said that the opponent asserts that the invariable relation is external to the object of affirmation. This is a superimposition.

original: thams cad nye bar bsdus pas gang dang gang na sgrub par byed pa'i chos yod pa de dang de na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos so zhes pa khyab pa 'di ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: thams cad nye bar bsdus pas gang dang gang na sgrub par byed pa'i chos yod pa de dang de na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos so zhes pa khyab pa 'di ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pas so //
translated: Since all are included, wherever the property of the reason exists, there the property to be established exists. This pervasion is a matter of invariable concomitance.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba la yang de 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba la yang de 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the property to be established is also accepted as such.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can kho na la gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang med na mi 'byung ba de gtan tshigs su 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can kho na la gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang med na mi 'byung ba de gtan tshigs su 'dod na /
translated: If the property to be established is accepted as the reason only when it is invariably concomitant with the property to be established in the subject,

original: de ltar gyur na gang zhig phyi rol du yang bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba de gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gang zhig phyi rol du yang bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba de gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: then in that case, that which is to be established and is invariably concomitant with the property to be established in the external world would not be a reason.

original: 'khrul pa can yang tan tshigs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa can yang tan tshigs su 'gyur te /
translated: And a fallacious reason would be a reason,

original: de la yang chos can la gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang chos can la gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible that even in that case, the property to be established is not established in the subject.

original: de'i phyir 'di mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, this is not correct.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di mi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs mtshan nyid bzhi pa can 'thad pa ma yin no //üîΩgang yang tshul gsum pa nyid tsam pa ni de sngo bsangs yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di mi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs mtshan nyid bzhi pa can 'thad pa ma yin no // gang yang tshul gsum pa nyid tsam pa ni de sngo bsangs yin te /
translated: Therefore, because this is illogical, a reason having four characteristics is not tenable.üîΩAlso, the mere trimodal condition is not a reason, because it is not a reason that is established in the subject.

original: nag po'i bu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di yang tan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de mi rigs te /
analyzed: nag po'i bu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di yang tan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de mi rigs te /
translated: Also, the statement ‚ÄúThis is a reason because it is the mere trimodal condition, like the son of a barren woman being blue‚Äù is not correct.

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa'i khyad par rnams kho na la tshul gsum pa nyid 'thad kyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa'i khyad par rnams kho na la tshul gsum pa nyid 'thad kyi /
translated: The mere trimodal condition is tenable only in the case of reasons of nature, effect, and nonperception.

original: gzhan rnams la ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la ma yin no //
translated: It is not tenable in other cases.

original: 'di de rnams kyi nang du 'du ba yang ma yin na /
analyzed: 'di de rnams kyi nang du 'du ba yang ma yin na /
translated: If it is not included among these,

original: de ci las thal bar 'gyur ba 'di yin /
analyzed: de ci las thal bar 'gyur ba 'di yin /
translated: then what is it?

original: gzhan ni rtags tshul gnyis pa'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan ni rtags tshul gnyis pa'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du smras pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the other is the second type of reason, it is said:

original: shes pa ma zin pa'i chos can gyi chos shig chos la yod pa kho na gang du shes par bya ba dang shes su gzhug par bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: shes pa ma zin pa'i chos can gyi chos shig chos la yod pa kho na gang du shes par bya ba dang shes su gzhug par bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: A reason is that which is known to exist in only the subject and the similar class, and which is to be known and made known.

original: sgrub pa dang @82b dgag pa dang ldan pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang @82b dgag pa dang ldan pa'o zhes so //
translated: It is endowed with affirmation and negation.

original: shes ma zin pa'i chos ni shes 'dod can te mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes ma zin pa'i chos ni shes 'dod can te mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: The unknown property is the one to be known, such as impermanence.

original: chos can gyi skra ni la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: chos can gyi skra ni la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: The property possessor is the one to be known, such as sound.

original: gang du shes par bya ba ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos la'o //
analyzed: gang du shes par bya ba ni byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos la'o //
translated: The property to be known is the property to be established, such as being produced.

original: shes zin pa nyid ni nus pa thob par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes zin pa nyid ni nus pa thob par bya ba'o //
translated: The known is the one who has obtained the ability.

original: yod pa kho na zhes pa rang tu 'jal ba pos bum pa la sogs pa rnams la rang nyid dran pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa kho na zhes pa rang tu 'jal ba pos bum pa la sogs pa rnams la rang nyid dran pa'o //
translated: The existent alone is the one who remembers the pot, etc.

original: gzhan gyis dran pa yang na ste gzhan don rjes su dpag pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis dran pa yang na ste gzhan don rjes su dpag pa la'o //
translated: The other is the one who remembers, that is, the inferential cognition for the sake of others.

original: yod pa kho na dang med pa ma yin pa zhes pa 'di dag sgrub pa dang dgag pa dag ste /
analyzed: yod pa kho na dang med pa ma yin pa zhes pa 'di dag sgrub pa dang dgag pa dag ste /
translated: The existent alone and not nonexistent are the affirmation and negation.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni sgrub pa dang dgag pa dang ldan pa ste gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni sgrub pa dang dgag pa dang ldan pa ste gtan tshigs so //
translated: The one who has that is endowed with affirmation and negation, that is, the reason.

original: 'di ni chos can gyi chos nyid dang / yod ba bsgrub bya'i chos nyid ces pa 'di tshul gnyis nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: 'di ni chos can gyi chos nyid dang / yod ba bsgrub bya'i chos nyid ces pa 'di tshul gnyis nyid du brjod do //
translated: This is called the ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù and the ‚Äúproperty to be established.‚Äù

original: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos gang na yod pa de kho na ste med pa ma yin pa zhes smras pas ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa nyid de kho na brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos gang na yod pa de kho na ste med pa ma yin pa zhes smras pas ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan pa nyid de kho na brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, by saying ‚Äúwherever the property to be established exists, the reason exists, and not where it does not exist,‚Äù one expresses the presence and absence of the reason in the presence and absence of the property to be established.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar de de na yod pa kho nar 'gyur zhing gal te de med na gtan tshigs mi 'gyur ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar de de na yod pa kho nar 'gyur zhing gal te de med na gtan tshigs mi 'gyur ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in that case, the reason would exist only where the property to be established exists, and if it did not exist there, the reason would not exist.

original: de las kyang gsum pa kho na rnam pa gzhan gyis brjod pa'o zhes pas gtan tshigs tshul gnyis pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang gsum pa kho na rnam pa gzhan gyis brjod pa'o zhes pas gtan tshigs tshul gnyis pa ma yin no //
translated: And from that, the third mode is expressed in another way, so the reason is not the second mode.

original: gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug pa'o zhes gzhan rnams te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mtshan nyid drug pa'o zhes gzhan rnams te /
translated: Others say that the reason has six characteristics.

original: gsum po 'di rnams dang gnod pa med pa'i yul can nyid dang / brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa can nyid dang / shes zin pa nyid ce'o //
analyzed: gsum po 'di rnams dang gnod pa med pa'i yul can nyid dang / brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa can nyid dang / shes zin pa nyid ce'o //
translated: These three, and the subject that is not undermined, and the number one that is intended to be expressed, and the fact that it is already known.

original: de la re zhig gnod pa med pa'i yul can ni tshul gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig gnod pa med pa'i yul can ni tshul gzhan ma yin te /
translated: First, the subject that is not undermined is not another mode.

original: gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because undermining and non-occurrence are mutually exclusive.

original: med na mi 'byung ba ni gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yod pa kho na la yod pa yin na /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba ni gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba'i chos yod pa kho na la yod pa yin na /
translated: Non-occurrence is a reason that exists only when the property to be proven exists.

original: ci ltar de'i mtshan nyid can gyi gtan tshigs de chos can la 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ci ltar de'i mtshan nyid can gyi gtan tshigs de chos can la 'gyur zhing /
translated: How could a reason that has that as its definition be a property of the subject?

original: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med par yang 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos med par yang 'gyur /
translated: And this would be the property to be proven that does not exist.

original: des na gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gnod pa dang med na mi 'byung ba dag lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, undermining and non-occurrence do not occur together.

original: des na gnod pa med pa'i yul can nyid tshul gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gnod pa med pa'i yul can nyid tshul gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the subject that is not undermined is not another mode.

original: rnam par gcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa'i grangs gcig pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no object of exclusion, the number one that is intended to be expressed is not to be expressed as a distinct characteristic.

original: de ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa'i don du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can gtan tshigs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa'i don du brjod par bya ste /
translated: That is to be stated for the purpose of countering the consequence that it would be a logical reason that is nonerrone with respect to the contradictory.

original: @83a * // rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis gcig la 'gal ba dag nye bar bsdus pa na /
analyzed: @83a * // rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis gcig la 'gal ba dag nye bar bsdus pa na /
translated: When reasons that possess their own characteristics include contradictions in one basis,

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then they would be nonerrone with respect to the contradictory.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs ba rnams la ni 'gal zla can gyi gtan tshigs srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs ba rnams la ni 'gal zla can gyi gtan tshigs srid pa ma yin no //
translated: But in the case of effects, nature, and nonapprehension, which have the characteristics that have been explained, it is not possible for there to be a reason that is the contradictory of the predicate.

original: ci ltar na gcig po rang gi bsgrub par bya ba yod pa kho na la yod pa'i phyir de dang 'khrul pa med pa can yin zhing /
