original: de yang 'dir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'dir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not present here.

original: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dang thams cad du song ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dang thams cad du song ba nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: Because of its permanence and its omnipresence, space, etc.,

original: de med na de med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na de med pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are not possible without it.

original: de ltar mngon par bcom pa ma yin ba zhes bya ba nam mkha' la sogs pa dang 'brel pa can gyi dngos po kho na mi 'grub na /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par bcom pa ma yin ba zhes bya ba nam mkha' la sogs pa dang 'brel pa can gyi dngos po kho na mi 'grub na /
translated: Thus, if the mere thing that is related to space, etc., which are not actually destroyed, is not established,

original: yang de reg bya'i khyad par dang 'gal ba ga las yin /
analyzed: yang de reg bya'i khyad par dang 'gal ba ga las yin /
translated: then how much less is the special tactile object that is incompatible with it?

original: de ltar ni nyi ma'i 'od la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: de ltar ni nyi ma'i 'od la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: In the same way, in the case of the sun‚Äôs rays, etc.,

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon par ma bcom pa yod la /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon par ma bcom pa yod la /
translated: the pots, etc., are not destroyed.

original: 'on kyang de rnams reg pa dang ldan pa rnams te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de rnams reg pa dang ldan pa rnams te /
translated: But they are in contact with them.

original: de'i phyir de las dgag pa ma yin no //üîΩyon tan rjes su dpag par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa 'di ni de'i skyes bu ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de las dgag pa ma yin no // yon tan rjes su dpag par bya ba'i phyir zhes pa 'di ni de'i skyes bu ste /
translated: Therefore, there is no negation of them.

original: yid la yang yon tan nye bar skyes pa ldog pa'i rgyu can gyi drug pa ste /
analyzed: yid la yang yon tan nye bar skyes pa ldog pa'i rgyu can gyi drug pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúbecause the qualities are to be inferred‚Äù is that they are the cause of the arising of the qualities in the mind.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: The sixth case is not dependent on the object to be inferred.

original: yid kyi yon tan rnams rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa ngag gi don te /
analyzed: yid kyi yon tan rnams rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa ngag gi don te /
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚Äúbecause the qualities of the mind are to be inferred‚Äù is the meaning of the statement.

original: yon tan ni yon tan la ltos pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid las nus pa med pa'i skyon yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yon tan ni yon tan la ltos pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid las nus pa med pa'i skyon yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the qualities depend on the quality-possessor, the fault of the absence of the capacity of the permanent does not arise.

original: 'di yang gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: This is not a reason,

original: 'gal pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction.

original: de ltar ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni /
translated: In the same way,

original: ji ltar bdag gi khyab bdag nyid //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag gi khyab bdag nyid //
translated: how is it that the self is the pervader?

original: ces bya ba'i yon tan rjes su dpag par bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i yon tan rjes su dpag par bya ba ste /
translated: The qualities of pleasure, etc. are to be inferred.

original: 'on kyang bde ba la sogs pa rnams mngon sum yin pa de ltar yid kyi rdul nyid dang gcig bu nyid kyang ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang bde ba la sogs pa rnams mngon sum yin pa de ltar yid kyi rdul nyid dang gcig bu nyid kyang ste /
translated: But just as pleasure, etc. are manifest, so too is the atom of the mind.

original: yon tan gnyis bo 'di ni rjes su dpag par bya par 'gyur la /
analyzed: yon tan gnyis bo 'di ni rjes su dpag par bya par 'gyur la /
translated: These two qualities are to be inferred.

original: reg bya yon tan 'di yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'gal ba ci yang med do //
analyzed: reg bya yon tan 'di yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'gal ba ci yang med do //
translated: And this quality of touch is manifest. There is no contradiction at all.

original: da ni gang 'dir rigs pa de bsgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gang 'dir rigs pa de bsgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to establish this, which is reasonable here, he says:

original: 'o na ci zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩyang gi sgra ni nges @89a * //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste / yang gi sgra ni nges @89a * //
translated: ‚ÄúBut what?‚Äù

original: par 'dzin pa'i don can no //üîΩyang ci ltar mthong ba rnams la yang mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa 'di brjod /
analyzed: par 'dzin pa'i don can no // yang ci ltar mthong ba rnams la yang mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa 'di brjod /
translated: The word ‚Äúbut‚Äù has the sense of exclusion.üîΩAnd how is it that even those who see do not see?

original: ci tsam gyis na reg pa'i khyad par de mthong ba rnams la yang mthong ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: ci tsam gyis na reg pa'i khyad par de mthong ba rnams la yang mthong ba ma yin pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: To what extent is it that even those who see do not see the particular of touch?

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: mthong ba rnams la re zhig reg pa'i spyi srid ba'i khyad par mthong la /
analyzed: mthong ba rnams la re zhig reg pa'i spyi srid ba'i khyad par mthong la /
translated: In the case of those things that are seen, the general rule is that the specific tangible object is seen.

original: ma mthong ba rnams la ni de yang mthong ba med do //
analyzed: ma mthong ba rnams la ni de yang mthong ba med do //
translated: But in the case of those things that are not seen, the specific tangible object is not seen.

original: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: gang zhig gang du mthong pa'i spyi de ni der srid pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang du mthong pa'i spyi de ni der srid pa yin te /
translated: The universal that is seen in a certain place is possible there.

original: dper na skyu ru ra rnams la mngar ba'i ro bzhin mthong ba rnams la reg bya'i khyad par yang mthong ba'i spyi'o //
analyzed: dper na skyu ru ra rnams la mngar ba'i ro bzhin mthong ba rnams la reg bya'i khyad par yang mthong ba'i spyi'o //
translated: For example, the sweet taste is seen in grapes. The specific tangible object is seen in the case of those things that are seen.

original: yang na gang du mthong ba de der srid pa'i khyad bar yin te /
analyzed: yang na gang du mthong ba de der srid pa'i khyad bar yin te /
translated: Or, that which is seen in a certain place is possible there.

original: dper na skyu ru ra rnams la ro bzhin /
analyzed: dper na skyu ru ra rnams la ro bzhin /
translated: For example, the sweet taste is seen in grapes.

original: mthong ba rnams la reg pa yang mthong ba zhes pa rang bzhin dag go //
analyzed: mthong ba rnams la reg pa yang mthong ba zhes pa rang bzhin dag go //
translated: The tangible object is seen in the case of those things that are seen.

original: gnyis kar yang gnod par byed pa med pa na zhes pa'i khyad par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis kar yang gnod par byed pa med pa na zhes pa'i khyad par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In both cases, the qualification ‚Äúwhen there is no obstruction‚Äù should be supplied.

original: rlung la sogs pa la ni yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i ched du mi dmigs pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa la ni yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i ched du mi dmigs pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the case of wind, etc., nonapprehension should be stated in order to deny the convention of existence.

original: gal te 'di ltar nges par 'byung bar 'os na 'di kho na la 'di srid do zhes pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar nges par 'byung bar 'os na 'di kho na la 'di srid do zhes pa yin na /
translated: If it is proper to definitely emerge in this way, then this alone is possible for them.

original: the tshom ni mthong ste /
analyzed: the tshom ni mthong ste /
translated: But doubt is seen.

original: de'i phyir 'di mthong ba rnams la srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mthong ba rnams la srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not possible for those who see this.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúEven for them, etc.‚Äù

original: du ma nyid kyi phyir the tshom ste /
analyzed: du ma nyid kyi phyir the tshom ste /
translated: Because of multiplicity, there is doubt.

original: der mi srid ba'i phyir ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: der mi srid ba'i phyir ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not because it is impossible there.üîΩThey also refute the idea that wind is inferred.

original: de rnams kyis kyang rlung rjes su dpog pa can nyid bsal lo zhes ston pa gsungs pa /üîΩyid ches ming gi sgrub byed kyis //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang rlung rjes su dpog pa can nyid bsal lo zhes ston pa gsungs pa / yid ches ming gi sgrub byed kyis //
translated: It is said:

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the proof of the name of confidence, etc.‚Äù

original: rlung ni rjes su dpag pa can nyid de zhes 'dir lhag bar gzung bar bya ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rlung ni rjes su dpag pa can nyid de zhes 'dir lhag bar gzung bar bya ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Wind is not to be grasped as something extra here, as if it were inferred.

original: rdzas kyi spyi /
analyzed: rdzas kyi spyi /
translated: The general substance

original: rjes su dpag pa yod pa na //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yod pa na //
translated: is inferred.

original: zhes pa'i reg pa'i yon tan rdzas la brten pa'i gang la ni 'di brten pa'i rdzas ci nas kyang yod do zhes rdzas tsam rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i reg pa'i yon tan rdzas la brten pa'i gang la ni 'di brten pa'i rdzas ci nas kyang yod do zhes rdzas tsam rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: The quality of contact is based on a substance.  One infers the mere substance, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is based on some substance.‚Äù

original: de bor nas yid ches pa'i ming gi tshang ma nyid las zhes pa gang gi phyir /
analyzed: de bor nas yid ches pa'i ming gi tshang ma nyid las zhes pa gang gi phyir /
translated: Having discarded that, the author of the NyƒÅyas≈´tra says, ‚Äúfrom the mere name of the trustworthy person.‚Äù

original: nyes ba zang pa rnams kyis rdzas kyi ming can dgu rnams kho na byas te /
analyzed: nyes ba zang pa rnams kyis rdzas kyi ming can dgu rnams kho na byas te /
translated: Because the authors of the NyƒÅyas≈´tra made only nine substances.

original: de la sa la sogs pa rdzas brgyad rnams la ming brgyad rnams nges par bzhag la /
analyzed: de la sa la sogs pa rdzas brgyad rnams la ming brgyad rnams nges par bzhag la /
translated: Among them, the eight substances such as earth are established as the eight names.

original: rlung gi ming can kho na lhag mar lus te /
analyzed: rlung gi ming can kho na lhag mar lus te /
translated: The name ‚Äúwind‚Äù alone remains as the remainder.

original: gzhan rdzas bcu yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan rdzas bcu yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not that there are ten substances other than that.

original: de'i phyir rang gi reg pa 'di yin pa de ni rlung ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi reg pa 'di yin pa de ni rlung ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this contact of its own is wind.

original: de ltar @89b sa la sogs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i rdzas bcu pa la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa gzhan pa khegs pas rlung yod pa nyid du rtogs so //
analyzed: de ltar @89b sa la sogs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i rdzas bcu pa la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa gzhan pa khegs pas rlung yod pa nyid du rtogs so //
translated: Thus, because it is refuted that there is a tenth substance other than earth and so on, and earth and so on are not other than that, one understands that wind exists.

original: ma yin tha dad kyang srid phyir //
analyzed: ma yin tha dad kyang srid phyir //
translated: Because it is possible that even though they are not different,

original: zhes pa sgra las byung ba tshad ma gzhan nyid yin pa dgag pa'i ched du tshad ma gzhan smra bas re zhig lan btab pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa sgra las byung ba tshad ma gzhan nyid yin pa dgag pa'i ched du tshad ma gzhan smra bas re zhig lan btab pa ste /
translated: This is the response of the proponent of another means of valid knowledge, for the purpose of refuting that a means of valid knowledge arises from sound.

original: rang nyid ni lan phyi nas 'debs par byed do //
analyzed: rang nyid ni lan phyi nas 'debs par byed do //
translated: But he himself will respond later.

original: rab tu grags pa'i dbang gis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu grags pa'i dbang gis zhes pa ste /
translated: By the power of common usage.

original: mthun phyogs dang mi mthun phyogs dag yod pa dang med pa nyid dag nyan pa po la grub pa zhes pa'i dpe mngon par ma brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mthun phyogs dang mi mthun phyogs dag yod pa dang med pa nyid dag nyan pa po la grub pa zhes pa'i dpe mngon par ma brjod pa'o //
translated: The existence and nonexistence of the similar and dissimilar are established for the hearer. The example is not explicitly stated.

original: dpe smos pa ni yan lag nye bar mtshon pa'i don to //
analyzed: dpe smos pa ni yan lag nye bar mtshon pa'i don to //
translated: The mention of the example is for the purpose of illustrating the parts.

original: yan lag rnams nye bar ma bstan pa las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: yan lag rnams nye bar ma bstan pa las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The parts are not taught.

original: des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gang yan lag nye bar ma bstan pa de rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: gang yan lag nye bar ma bstan pa de rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa ste /
translated: That which is not taught as a part is different from inference.

original: mngon sum bzhin sgra las byung ba yang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mngon sum bzhin sgra las byung ba yang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin no //
translated: Sound as a means of valid knowledge is like perception. This is the nature of the argument.

original: de lta na yang zhes pa 'khrul par gsungs so //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa 'khrul par gsungs so //
translated: Even so, he says that it is mistaken.

original: dbe gcig gi zhes yan lag lhag ma la ltos pas dpe'i gcig nyid de /
analyzed: dbe gcig gi zhes yan lag lhag ma la ltos pas dpe'i gcig nyid de /
translated: The word one in the phrase one of the examples refers to the remaining parts of the example.

original: dpe la ltos pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dpe la ltos pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the example itself is the one.

original: de las don 'di ste /
analyzed: de las don 'di ste /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gang du dpe kho na'i mi brjod pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang du dpe kho na'i mi brjod pa zhes pa'o //
translated: It is the case where the example itself is not mentioned, as in the phrase like the non-example.

original: gnyis dag gi yang na zhes pa /üîΩyang na'i sgra ni gang gi don yin zhing /
analyzed: gnyis dag gi yang na zhes pa / yang na'i sgra ni gang gi don yin zhing /
translated: The word or in the phrase of two or more

original: 'jug bzhin pa'i ma brjod pa sdud bar byed de /
analyzed: 'jug bzhin pa'i ma brjod pa sdud bar byed de /
translated: means that the word or includes what is not stated,

original: gsum rnams kyi dang bzhi rnams kyi dang lnga rnams kyi'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gsum rnams kyi dang bzhi rnams kyi dang lnga rnams kyi'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: meaning of three, of four, of five, and so on.

original: de nas gang gi tshe yang gtan tshigs thun mong bar byed pa de'i tshe yang rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pas ma nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas gang gi tshe yang gtan tshigs thun mong bar byed pa de'i tshe yang rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pas ma nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when the reason is made common, at that time also it becomes uncertain due to inference for oneself.

original: sgra las byung ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa pha rol po la sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa las tha dad par grags te /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa pha rol po la sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa las tha dad par grags te /
translated: The word consequence in the phrase there would be a consequence from the word is known to the opponent as distinct from inference.

original: des na sgra las byung ba bzhin du thal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: des na sgra las byung ba bzhin du thal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, there would be a consequence like that from the word.

original: rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The meaning is that it would follow that it would be different from inference.

original: sgra las byung ba ji ltar gyur pa de ltar gyur par nge yang 'thob bo zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba ji ltar gyur pa de ltar gyur par nge yang 'thob bo zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: Just as it is for what arises from words, so it is for what arises from inference.

original: 'dra ba'i rkyen med kyang don rtogs par bya ba'o zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i rkyen med kyang don rtogs par bya ba'o zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: Even without a similar condition, the meaning is understood. This has been explained many times.

original: gzhan rnams zer zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan rnams zer zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Others say sound and so on.

original: sgra ni rang gi ngo bso tha dad med pa'i ngo bo'i don kho na rtogs su 'jug ste /
analyzed: sgra ni rang gi ngo bso tha dad med pa'i ngo bo'i don kho na rtogs su 'jug ste /
translated: Sound causes one to understand only the meaning that is its own nature, which is not different.

original: de ltar du ba la sogs pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar du ba la sogs pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: It is not like smoke and so on.

original: du ba las me rtogs pa 'am rtogs su 'jug pa ni ma yin gyi du @90a * //
analyzed: du ba las me rtogs pa 'am rtogs su 'jug pa ni ma yin gyi du @90a * //
translated: It is not that fire is understood or caused to be understood from smoke,

original: ba'i gzugs kyis rtogs pa'am rtogs su 'jug go zhes pa yang na'o //
analyzed: ba'i gzugs kyis rtogs pa'am rtogs su 'jug go zhes pa yang na'o //
translated: but rather it is understood or caused to be understood by the form of smoke.

original: ci ltar don la rjes su dpag pa yin zhes ba /
analyzed: ci ltar don la rjes su dpag pa yin zhes ba /
translated: How is it an inference for the sake of others?

original: don ni du ma'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don ni du ma'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning has the nature of being manifold.

original: de la spyi rang gi ngo bos don de rtogs par bya'am /
analyzed: de la spyi rang gi ngo bos don de rtogs par bya'am /
translated: In that case, is the universal to be understood by its own nature?

original: 'on te spyi'i ngo bos yin /
analyzed: 'on te spyi'i ngo bos yin /
translated: Or is it by way of a universal?

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad par sems te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad par sems te /
translated: We think that it is not tenable in any way.

original: de ltar ni gal te shing la sogs pa'i sgra rnams yod ba nyid la sogs pa spyi'i rnam ba can rnams kyis shing la sogs pa'i don rtogs par byed na /üîΩsgra thams cad kyi don gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ni gal te shing la sogs pa'i sgra rnams yod ba nyid la sogs pa spyi'i rnam ba can rnams kyis shing la sogs pa'i don rtogs par byed na / sgra thams cad kyi don gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: In that regard, if words such as ‚Äútree‚Äù that have the aspect of universals such as existence cause one to understand the object such as a tree,

original: spyi'i rnam pa rnams don du ma'i thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa rnams don du ma'i thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: then it follows that all words would have the same meaning because the aspects of universals are common to many objects.

original: ci ste khyad par gyi ngo bos yin na /üîΩde mi rigs te /
analyzed: ci ste khyad par gyi ngo bos yin na / de mi rigs te /
translated: But if it is by way of a particular,üîΩthat is not correct because it is impossible to understand a particular that is not common to others.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i so sor rtogs pa mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas rnam pa thams cad du sgra'i don nyid med do //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i so sor rtogs pa mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas rnam pa thams cad du sgra'i don nyid med do //
translated: Therefore, in every way, the meaning of a word does not exist.

original: shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni don gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni don gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: The object of expression of the word tree is not a different object.

original: ji ltar khyed kyi sgra'i don gzhan sel ba spyi yin pa de ltar kho bo cag gi yang ste /
analyzed: ji ltar khyed kyi sgra'i don gzhan sel ba spyi yin pa de ltar kho bo cag gi yang ste /
translated: Just as for you the meaning of a word is an other-exclusion that is a universal, so it is for us.

original: 'di tsam ni bye brag ste /
analyzed: 'di tsam ni bye brag ste /
translated: This much is the difference.

original: bdag gis de'i sgra'i rnam pa nye bar chags par rtogs zhes khas blangs so zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: bdag gis de'i sgra'i rnam pa nye bar chags par rtogs zhes khas blangs so zhes ston par byed do //
translated: We admit that we understand the word tree to be applied to that which is qualified by the presence of a certain form.üîΩThe meaning of the word tree is not the same as the meaning of the word pot, etc., because the meaning of one word is not the meaning of another.

original: shing gi sgras brjod par bya ba gang yin pa'i don de bum pa la sogs pa gzhan bum pa la sogs par 'gyur ba min te sgra gzhan gyi don med pas 'dir shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba bsten par mtshon to //
analyzed: shing gi sgras brjod par bya ba gang yin pa'i don de bum pa la sogs pa gzhan bum pa la sogs par 'gyur ba min te sgra gzhan gyi don med pas 'dir shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba bsten par mtshon to //
translated: The meaning of the word tree is indicated by the word tree itself.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: don gzhan las ldog pas nye bar mtshon pa'i gang dngos po'i cha de kho na shing gi sgra'i don zhes pa ste /
analyzed: don gzhan las ldog pas nye bar mtshon pa'i gang dngos po'i cha de kho na shing gi sgra'i don zhes pa ste /
translated: The aspect of a thing that is indicated by the exclusion of other things is the meaning of the word tree.

original: de kho na dang de mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩyod pa nyid la sogs pa thun mong ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis sam /
analyzed: de kho na dang de mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro // yod pa nyid la sogs pa thun mong ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis sam /
translated: Because it is just that and similar to that.üîΩIt is not by means of the common aspects such as existence, etc.,

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo dang ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo dang ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: or by means of the uncommon nature.

original: gzhan rnams klog pa ni shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni gzhan gyi don du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan rnams klog pa ni shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba ni gzhan gyi don du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is not the meaning of another word.

original: shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i don gang yin pa de sgra gzhan gyi don du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i don gang yin pa de sgra gzhan gyi don du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is not the meaning of another word.

original: rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams ni don gcig pa nyid kyis gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa bsam pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams ni don gcig pa nyid kyis gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa bsam pa'o //
translated: The idea is that the words ‚Äúsynonym‚Äù are not different because they have the same meaning.

original: 'dir yang shing gi sgra'i don ni sgra gzhan gyi brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bstan pas /
analyzed: 'dir yang shing gi sgra'i don ni sgra gzhan gyi brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid bstan pas /
translated: Here, too, the meaning of the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is shown to be not the meaning of another word.

original: sgra gzhan gyi don las ldog pas nye bar mtshon pa'i shing nyid tsam ni shing gi sgra'i don to zhes bshad par 'gyur ro zhes pas don de kho na'o //
analyzed: sgra gzhan gyi don las ldog pas nye bar mtshon pa'i shing nyid tsam ni shing gi sgra'i don to zhes bshad par 'gyur ro zhes pas don de kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is just the tree itself, which is indicated by the exclusion of the meaning of another word.

original: @90b 'o na rdzas kyi sgras kyang yal 'dab la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i don rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: @90b 'o na rdzas kyi sgras kyang yal 'dab la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i don rtogs par byed de /
translated: Well, the word ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù also makes one understand the meaning that possesses branches and so on.

original: 'di ni de'i ngo bo yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i ngo bo yang ma yin no //
translated: This is not its nature.

original: de las kyang 'dra ba nyid ma yin yang brjod par bya ba nyid ston pa'i phyir sgra 'dra ba nyid kyis don rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de las kyang 'dra ba nyid ma yin yang brjod par bya ba nyid ston pa'i phyir sgra 'dra ba nyid kyis don rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Moreover, even if they are not similar, because they indicate the meaning of the word, the meaning is not understood by the similarity of the word.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even if the word substance is not the cause of the cognition of substance,üîΩbecause of the similarity of the word, the meaning is understood.

original: yang gi sgras ni rdzas kyi sgra rdzas kyi bye brag rnams kyi 'khrul pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa ma yin pa kho na mod /
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni rdzas kyi sgra rdzas kyi bye brag rnams kyi 'khrul pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa ma yin pa kho na mod /
translated: The word ‚Äúeven‚Äù clarifies that although the word substance is not the cause of the cognition of the particulars of substance,

original: khas blangs nas lan brjod par bya'o zhes pa'i don gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: khas blangs nas lan brjod par bya'o zhes pa'i don gsal bar byed do //
translated: having accepted that, the reply is stated.

original: tshul gzhan ni rnam pa gzhan te /
analyzed: tshul gzhan ni rnam pa gzhan te /
translated: Another mode is a different aspect.

original: dngos bo de kho na'i cha shas 'ga' zhig go //
analyzed: dngos bo de kho na'i cha shas 'ga' zhig go //
translated: It is a part of that very thing.

original: de dang lhan cig rdzas kyi sgra'i 'dra ba nyid yod pa kho na'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig rdzas kyi sgra'i 'dra ba nyid yod pa kho na'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that there is only the similarity of the word substance with that.

original: tshul gzhan de yang rdzas ma yin pa las ldog pas nye bar mtshon par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du 'di brjod de /
analyzed: tshul gzhan de yang rdzas ma yin pa las ldog pas nye bar mtshon par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i ched du 'di brjod de /
translated: In order to show that that other mode is also indicated by the exclusion from non-substance, this is stated:

original: rdzas ma yin pa las ldog pas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas ma yin pa las ldog pas zhes pa'o //
translated: By the exclusion from non-substance.

original: 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWell then, etc.‚Äù

original: rdzas kyi sgras rdzas ma yin pa las ldog pas nye bar mtshon pa'i dngos po'i tshul gzhan rdzas kyi sgra dang 'dra ba nyid thob par rung ba rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: rdzas kyi sgras rdzas ma yin pa las ldog pas nye bar mtshon pa'i dngos po'i tshul gzhan rdzas kyi sgra dang 'dra ba nyid thob par rung ba rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is it proper to understand that the word substance obtains the nature of another thing that is indicated by the word substance, by the exclusion of what is not substance,

original: 'on kyang shing gi sgras kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang shing gi sgras kyang ngo //
translated: but also the word tree.

original: de ltar ni shing rdzas zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid mthong bas te /
analyzed: de ltar ni shing rdzas zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid mthong bas te /
translated: In this way, since one sees the very same basis in the expression ‚Äútree substance,‚Äù

original: don tha dad pa dag ni de 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don tha dad pa dag ni de 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not tenable that they have different referents.

original: de dang lhan cig de'i 'dra ba nyid 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig de'i 'dra ba nyid 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not asserted that the tree is similar to substance.

original: de'i phyir skyon de kho na ste /üîΩ'dra ba nyid ma yin pa la yang sgra'i don nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyon de kho na ste / 'dra ba nyid ma yin pa la yang sgra'i don nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, that fault remains,üîΩbecause even if they are not similar, the word still has a referent.

original: rjod par byed pa rang dang 'dra ba nyid don rjod par byed pa ma yin no zhes pa bsam pa'o //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa rang dang 'dra ba nyid don rjod par byed pa ma yin no zhes pa bsam pa'o //
translated: The idea is that the expression does not express itself, nor does it express another.

original: don las yin gyi sgra las ni ma yin zhes pa shing gi sgra'i don kho na rdzas ma yin pa las rtag tu ldog pa dang med na mi 'byung ba las de rtogs te /
analyzed: don las yin gyi sgra las ni ma yin zhes pa shing gi sgra'i don kho na rdzas ma yin pa las rtag tu ldog pa dang med na mi 'byung ba las de rtogs te /
translated: It is from the meaning, not from the word. The meaning of the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is only the opposite of non-substance and the non-occurrence of that is understood.

original: rmongs pas ni sgra kho na las rtogs so zhes sems so //
analyzed: rmongs pas ni sgra kho na las rtogs so zhes sems so //
translated: But the confused one understands it only from the word.

original: gzhi mthun pa nyid ni khyad par bcas pa'i khyad par la 'jug pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa nyid ni khyad par bcas pa'i khyad par la 'jug pa'i phyir na /
translated: The common locus itself is the particular with the distinction, because it engages the particular with the distinction.

original: shing gi sgras rdzas ma yin pa las ldog ba brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shing gi sgras rdzas ma yin pa las ldog ba brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äútree‚Äù does not express the opposite of non-substance.

original: gal te shing la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩsu pa'i tha'i tshig rnams kho na /
analyzed: gal te shing la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kho na zhes pa la sogs pa ste / su pa'i tha'i tshig rnams kho na /
translated: If one says that the words ‚Äútree‚Äù and so on are only the cause of the word,üîΩthe words of the SuÃÑtra of the Great U·π£·πáƒ´·π£a

original: gal te sgra'i rgyu can gyi tshad mar rjod par byed na skyon can du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te sgra'i rgyu can gyi tshad mar rjod par byed na skyon can du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: If one says that they are the cause of the word, there is no fault.

original: de ltar ni de rnams kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i don 'di de'o //üîΩso sor zhen par rung ba ni blo la yang dag par nges @91a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni de rnams kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i don 'di de'o // so sor zhen par rung ba ni blo la yang dag par nges @91a * //
translated: In that case, the complete nature of the meaning of those is this:

original: par gnas pas so zhes pas /
analyzed: par gnas pas so zhes pas /
translated: The individual is suitable to be conceived, because it is correctly ascertained in the mind.

original: de dang lhan cig tha dad med par nye bar btags pa sgra la srid pa'o //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig tha dad med par nye bar btags pa sgra la srid pa'o //
translated: It is possible that the name is applied to the sound that is not different from that.

original: ming gi tshig rnams kho na yongs su rdzogs pa'i don mngon par rjod par byed par bshad par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ming gi tshig rnams kho na yongs su rdzogs pa'i don mngon par rjod par byed par bshad par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not explained that the words of the name alone express the complete meaning.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: ti nga'i mtha' rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: ti nga'i mtha' rnams kyang ngo //
translated: The end of the ti is also.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: bya ba brjod pa'i sgra rnams kyis kyang zhes pa la sogs ba ste /
analyzed: bya ba brjod pa'i sgra rnams kyis kyang zhes pa la sogs ba ste /
translated: Even by the sounds that express action, etc.

original: bya ba brjod pa'i sgra klog go 'tshed do zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: bya ba brjod pa'i sgra klog go 'tshed do zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: By the sounds that express action, such as ‚Äúread‚Äù and ‚Äúcook,‚Äù etc.

original: rtags med pa grangs med pa sngon ma dang phyi mar gyur pa'i cha shas yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i bya ba brjod par bya la /
analyzed: rtags med pa grangs med pa sngon ma dang phyi mar gyur pa'i cha shas yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo'i bya ba brjod par bya la /
translated: The action of the incomplete own nature that is the prior and subsequent parts without a sign and without number is to be expressed.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i don 'di de'i zhes gzung ba med pa ni blos tha mi dad par nye bar gdags pa byas par nus pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i don 'di de'i zhes gzung ba med pa ni blos tha mi dad par nye bar gdags pa byas par nus pa ma yin zhing /
translated: That meaning of that kind is not able to be taken as the non-different designation made by the mind.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i sgra'i bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya bzhin pa'i rnam pa nyid du so sor rtogs par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i sgra'i bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya bzhin pa'i rnam pa nyid du so sor rtogs par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the complete entity, which is the nature of sound, is not understood as the form of what is being accomplished.

original: gang rnams kyi ngag kho na sgra yin pa zhes pa des don sgrogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang rnams kyi ngag kho na sgra yin pa zhes pa des don sgrogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For those who say that speech itself is sound, it is because it proclaims the meaning.

original: gal te dag kho na sgra yin na /
analyzed: gal te dag kho na sgra yin na /
translated: If speech itself is sound,

original: tshig rnams nye bar blang ba don ci zhe na /
analyzed: tshig rnams nye bar blang ba don ci zhe na /
translated: what is the point of taking up the words?

original: de rtogs pa'i thabs kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i thabs kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The means of understanding that is stated with ‚Äúthat‚Äù and so on.

original: de tshogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de tshogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Because it is the nature of their collection,

original: dper na tshig rnams kyi yi ge rnams bzhin zhes sems so //
analyzed: dper na tshig rnams kyi yi ge rnams bzhin zhes sems so //
translated: it is like the letters of the words.

original: de rnams kyi med ces pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩngag gi don ni phyi rol bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa dang 'brel ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de rnams kyi med ces pa la sogs pa ste / ngag gi don ni phyi rol bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa dang 'brel ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ram /
translated: The absence of those is stated with ‚Äúthat‚Äù and so on.üîΩThe meaning of speech is either the external object that is the nature of the connection between the proof and what is to be proven,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa nges par zhugs pas rjes su bzung ba cha shas med pa'i bya ba'am /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa nges par zhugs pas rjes su bzung ba cha shas med pa'i bya ba'am /
translated: or it is the partless action that is accepted by the ascertained capacity of the proof.

original: so sor snang ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yin /
analyzed: so sor snang ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yin /
translated: The characteristic of individual appearance is different.

original: 'di gsum ka yang yod par gyur ba ma yin pa nyid na /
analyzed: 'di gsum ka yang yod par gyur ba ma yin pa nyid na /
translated: If these three are not existent,

original: 'di de'o zhes so sor ngo shes pa las shin tu 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di de'o zhes so sor ngo shes pa las shin tu 'das pa yin no //
translated: then they are utterly beyond individual recognition, ‚ÄúThis is that.‚ÄùüîΩAnd, since the object is like that, it is not possible to impute it non-differently as ‚ÄúThis is that.‚Äù

original: de ltar gyur pa'i don gyis de 'di'o zhes tha mi dad par nye bar gdags par bya bar nus pa yang ma yin no zhes khyad par gyi cung zad ces pa dpe mngon bar ma brjod pa dang / sgras tha mi dad par nye bar gdags pa ni khyad par cung zad do //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i don gyis de 'di'o zhes tha mi dad par nye bar gdags par bya bar nus pa yang ma yin no zhes khyad par gyi cung zad ces pa dpe mngon bar ma brjod pa dang / sgras tha mi dad par nye bar gdags pa ni khyad par cung zad do //
translated: The difference is that the example is not explicitly stated and the non-different imputation by word is the slight difference.

original: gal te de lta na yang tha dad pa ma yin na khyod kyis kyang rlung la sogs pa rnams kyi lung las byung ba nyid du sgrub par byed pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can nyid du sgra las byung ba bsgrubs te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang tha dad pa ma yin na khyod kyis kyang rlung la sogs pa rnams kyi lung las byung ba nyid du sgrub par byed pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can nyid du sgra las byung ba bsgrubs te /
translated: But even if that is so, if they are not different, then you also prove that wind, etc. are derived from scripture, and thus you prove that sound is derived from scripture, which has the particular object of its own characteristic.

original: de ltar gyur na @91b lung dang rjes su dpag ba dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can nyid du grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na @91b lung dang rjes su dpag ba dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can nyid du grub bo zhe na /
translated: In that case, because scripture and inference are not different, it is established that they are objects of intrinsic identity.

original: gsungs pa / de la sgra dang bral ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de la sgra dang bral ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: To respond to that, it is said, ‚ÄúIn that regard, free from words, etc.‚Äù

original: de la zhes pa bstan bcos la ste /
analyzed: de la zhes pa bstan bcos la ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn that regard‚Äù refers to the treatise.

original: bstan bcos kyi rgyu mtshan zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi rgyu mtshan zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the reason of the treatise.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: khyed kyis bstan bcos rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can zhes khas blangs te /
analyzed: khyed kyis bstan bcos rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can zhes khas blangs te /
translated: You accept that the treatise is an object of intrinsic identity.

original: de las gang 'di rjes su dpag pa reg bya yang mthong ba rnams kyi'ang reg bya ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pas nye bar bkod pa 'di /
analyzed: de las gang 'di rjes su dpag pa reg bya yang mthong ba rnams kyi'ang reg bya ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pas nye bar bkod pa 'di /
translated: From that, whatever is posited by you, such as ‚ÄúThat which is seen by touch is not tangible,‚Äù etc.,

original: khyed kyi bstan bcos kyi rgyu mtshan kho na las rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin bar brjod de /
analyzed: khyed kyi bstan bcos kyi rgyu mtshan kho na las rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin bar brjod de /
translated: is said to be only a reason of your treatise, not an object of intrinsic identity.

original: lung las grub pa nyid ni /
analyzed: lung las grub pa nyid ni /
translated: That it is established from scripture

original: khyed rnams kho na la grags pa smras pas na /
analyzed: khyed rnams kho na la grags pa smras pas na /
translated: is stated because it is renowned only to you.

original: rang la grags pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rang la grags pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: But not what is well known to oneself.üîΩWhat is the meaning of this statement?

original: ci la bsams nas 'di ltar brjod ces gsungs ba /
analyzed: ci la bsams nas 'di ltar brjod ces gsungs ba /
translated: It is said:

original: sgra dang bral ba'i rtags la mngon par bsams nas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sgra dang bral ba'i rtags la mngon par bsams nas zhes pa ste /
translated: Having considered the reason that is free from verbal expression.

original: lung zhes bya ba'i sgra dor ba ni 'di yin zhing rtags ni reg pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lung zhes bya ba'i sgra dor ba ni 'di yin zhing rtags ni reg pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúscripture.‚Äù The reason is called ‚Äúcontact.‚Äù

original: de la ltos ba med pa kho nas gang las rlung yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa de'o //
analyzed: de la ltos ba med pa kho nas gang las rlung yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa de'o //
translated: It is that which proves the existence of wind without depending on anything else.

original: de ltar khyod kyis khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos kyi dbang las ci yang mi byed pa'i rtags la bsams nas /
analyzed: de ltar khyod kyis khas blangs pa'i bstan bcos kyi dbang las ci yang mi byed pa'i rtags la bsams nas /
translated: Thus, having considered the reason that is not at all mentioned in the treatise accepted by you,

original: de las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa 'di kho bo cag gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin par brjod kyi /
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa 'di kho bo cag gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin par brjod kyi /
translated: we say that the inference arising from that is not one whose object is a particular.

original: rang nyid rlung la sogs pa rnams lung las grub pa nyid du 'dod pas ni ma yin no zhes pas brtsad bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid rlung la sogs pa rnams lung las grub pa nyid du 'dod pas ni ma yin no zhes pas brtsad bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: But we are not to be criticized for asserting that wind and so on are established by scripture.

original: de lta na 'o na sgra las byung ba yang ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ltar bsgrub par bya ba nyid do zhes pa 'di'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na sgra las byung ba yang ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ltar bsgrub par bya ba nyid do zhes pa 'di'i phyir /
translated: In that case, then just as it is established that the meaning-generality is the object of the mental sense-faculty, so it should be established that the sound-generality is not the object of the mental sense-faculty.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to establish that, he says,

original: sgra las byung ba yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The sound-generality, etc.

original: 'brel pa med ces pa brda'i dus na'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa med ces pa brda'i dus na'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúunrelated‚Äù refers to the time of the convention.

original: sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa mngon par shes pa ni don brda'i dus na nyams su myong ba'i spyi kho na sgra las rtogs kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa mngon par shes pa ni don brda'i dus na nyams su myong ba'i spyi kho na sgra las rtogs kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of the relation between the sound and the meaning is the understanding of the meaning from the sound, which is only the universal experienced at the time of the convention, not the particular.

original: de sngar mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrab tu sbyor ba'i dus na khyad par gyi yul can nyid kyi dogs pa mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de sngar mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro // rab tu sbyor ba'i dus na khyad par gyi yul can nyid kyi dogs pa mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: This is because the particular was not seen before.üîΩAt the time of the application, it is absolutely impossible to suspect that it has a particular object.

original: brda'i dus na ni rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum mo zhes de'i yul can nyid du dogs pa srid do //
analyzed: brda'i dus na ni rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum mo zhes de'i yul can nyid du dogs pa srid do //
translated: At the time of the convention, the particular is directly perceived, so it is possible to suspect that it is the object of that.

original: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa zhes gsungs so mthong ba'i don ni gang @92a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa zhes gsungs so mthong ba'i don ni gang @92a * //
translated: Therefore, it is said that there is no relation.

original: du den mngon sum gyis mthong ba'o //
analyzed: du den mngon sum gyis mthong ba'o //
translated: The object that is seen is that which is seen by direct perception.

original: ma mthong ba'i don ni bzlog ba las so //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i don ni bzlog ba las so //
translated: The object that is not seen is the opposite of that.

original: mthong ba'i don la ming bye brag tu rtogs pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mthong ba'i don la ming bye brag tu rtogs pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The understanding of the name in regard to the object that is seen isüîΩlike, for example, the understanding of the particular relation in this case,

original: dper na 'di pa na sa'o zhes pa lta bu 'dir 'brel pa bye brag tu rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na 'di pa na sa'o zhes pa lta bu 'dir 'brel pa bye brag tu rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: when one says, This is a cow.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not inference,

original: don mngon gyur yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don mngon gyur yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the object is manifest.

original: ma mthong ba'i don la ni mtho ris la sogs pa la ste /üîΩdon du rnam par rtog ba tsam zhes ba gang phyir mtho ris la sogs pa'i sgra rnams mtho ris la sogs pa rnams kyi brda'i dus sam /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i don la ni mtho ris la sogs pa la ste / don du rnam par rtog ba tsam zhes ba gang phyir mtho ris la sogs pa'i sgra rnams mtho ris la sogs pa rnams kyi brda'i dus sam /
translated: In regard to the object that is not seen, such as heaven,üîΩit is mere imagination of the object, because the words heaven, etc.,üîΩdo not present the intrinsic identity of heaven, etc., either at the time of the convention for heaven, etc.,

original: gzhan gyi tshe yang rang gi mtshan nyid blo la gtod pa ma yin pas te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe yang rang gi mtshan nyid blo la gtod pa ma yin pas te /
translated: or at any other time,

original: dbang po las 'das pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that they would not be beyond the senses.

original: de rtogs su 'jug pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyis rab tu sbyar ba rnams nyan pa po la so sor snang ba ma yin pa de'i rang bzhin don gyi gzugs brnyan 'jog par byed pa 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: de rtogs su 'jug pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyis rab tu sbyar ba rnams nyan pa po la so sor snang ba ma yin pa de'i rang bzhin don gyi gzugs brnyan 'jog par byed pa 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: Those who have the intention to understand it, when they apply themselves to it, do not perceive in the listener the form of the object, which is its nature.

original: lha'i gnas kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig yod do zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i gnas kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig yod do zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is only a reflection of the object.

original: de lta na rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin pa so sor rtogs su bcug pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin pa so sor rtogs su bcug pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not the case that one understands the specific property of the object, nor does one cause the listener to understand it.

original: mtho ris la sogs pa thob pa na /
analyzed: mtho ris la sogs pa thob pa na /
translated: For, if one were to obtain heaven, etc.,

original: de nyams su myong ba rnams kyi bzhin du so sor snang ba tha dad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de nyams su myong ba rnams kyi bzhin du so sor snang ba tha dad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
translated: then, like those who experience it, the listener would perceive it differently.

original: de'i rang bzhin so sor rtogs pa ma yin pa yang /üîΩrnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan de ltar gyur pa kho na la /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin so sor rtogs pa ma yin pa yang / rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan de ltar gyur pa kho na la /
translated: It is not that one understands its nature,

original: der lhag par zhen pas dga' bar byed de /
analyzed: der lhag par zhen pas dga' bar byed de /
translated: for one delights in the conceptual reflection that has that form.

original: de ltar gyur ba kho na las sgra'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur ba kho na las sgra'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One understands the meaning of the word only in that form.

original: 'dir yang 'brel pa med pa zhes pa 'di ltos par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'brel pa med pa zhes pa 'di ltos par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Here, too, the word ‚Äúunrelated‚Äù does not mean ‚Äúnot dependent,‚Äù

original: 'on kyang mthong ba'i don rnams kho na la'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang mthong ba'i don rnams kho na la'o //
translated: but rather ‚Äúnot seen.‚Äù

original: de la ni khyad par mthong ba nyid kyi phyir de brjod par bya ba nyid kho nar dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la ni khyad par mthong ba nyid kyi phyir de brjod par bya ba nyid kho nar dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And in that case, since the difference is seen, it is only to be expected that it will be mentioned.

original: de'i phyir de bzlog pa'i ched du ming bye brag tu rtogs pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzlog pa'i ched du ming bye brag tu rtogs pa zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, in order to avoid that, the word ‚Äúparticular‚Äù is added.

original: 'o na ci ltar de rjes su dpag pa yin zhe na zhes pa /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar de rjes su dpag pa yin zhe na zhes pa /
translated: But how can it be inference?

original: yang lung las skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba'i don dbang po las 'das pa nges par byas nas ji ltar 'os par gnas pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes lung tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: yang lung las skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba'i don dbang po las 'das pa nges par byas nas ji ltar 'os par gnas pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes lung tshol bar byed de /
translated: Moreover, having ascertained by scripture the meaning of what is necessary for man, which is beyond the senses, he should accomplish it as is fitting. Thus he seeks scripture.

original: de las gal te don rnam par rtog ba tsam du 'gyur gyi don gyi khyad par rtogs par mi 'gyur na de'i rjes su dpag pa nyid kho na nyams so zhes pa bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de las gal te don rnam par rtog ba tsam du 'gyur gyi don gyi khyad par rtogs par mi 'gyur na de'i rjes su dpag pa nyid kho na nyams so zhes pa bsams pa'o //
translated: If from that there would be only a conceptualization of the meaning, and not the understanding of a particular meaning, then inference itself would be lost. This is the idea.

original: 'o na yang ji @92b ltar yid ches pa ma yin pas rab tu sbyar ba'i sgra rnams ni brjod par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don tsam gang yin pa de tshig las rjes su dpag pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na yang ji @92b ltar yid ches pa ma yin pas rab tu sbyar ba'i sgra rnams ni brjod par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don tsam gang yin pa de tshig las rjes su dpag pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: But still, since one does not have confidence in the words that are applied, the mere meaning that is the characteristic of what is desired is inferred from the words.

original: phyi rol gyi don rjod par byed pa las ni ma yin pa de ltar yid ches pas rab tu sbyar ba rnams kyang 'gyur ro zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don rjod par byed pa las ni ma yin pa de ltar yid ches pas rab tu sbyar ba rnams kyang 'gyur ro zhe na bshad pa /
translated: But it is not the external object that is expressed. In that case, even those that are applied with confidence would be like that.üîΩTo respond:

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is not so, and so on.

original: 'di ltar bsams pas te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsams pas te /
translated: In this way, it is thought:

original: yid ches pa'i tshig ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don tsam la tshad ma nyid du 'dod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yid ches pa'i tshig ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don tsam la tshad ma nyid du 'dod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The words of confidence are not asserted to be a valid means of knowledge for the mere meaning that is desired.

original: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don la yang ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don la yang ste /
translated: But also for external objects.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de dang yid ches pa ma yin pa'i tshig la khyad par cir 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de dang yid ches pa ma yin pa'i tshig la khyad par cir 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, what would be the difference between that and words that are not of confidence?

original: de'i phyir yid ches pas rab tu sbyar ba'i mtho ris la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyi don tsam brjod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir yid ches pas rab tu sbyar ba'i mtho ris la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyi don tsam brjod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the words of heaven and so on that are applied with confidence do not express mere meaning.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: 'jig rten pa'i sgra dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyi rol gyi don yang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sgra dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyi rol gyi don yang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: [The scriptures] are also [valid] with regard to the uncommon external objects of the world.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid rjod par byed pa las lung rnams rjes su dpag pa nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid rjod par byed pa las lung rnams rjes su dpag pa nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: The scriptures are not inferences from the point of view of expressing the specific characteristics [of things].

original: 'o na ci zhen /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhen /
translated: What then?

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i don la rnam par rtog ba tsam nye bar skyed pa rnams kyi spyi'i rnam pas don gsal bar byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i don la rnam par rtog ba tsam nye bar skyed pa rnams kyi spyi'i rnam pas don gsal bar byed pa'i phyir /
translated: They are inferences from the point of view of being non-deceptive with regard to the object, because they generate mere conceptions of an object of that kind and clarify the object by means of a general image.

original: de la yang mi bslu ba las so zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la yang mi bslu ba las so zhes ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: To explain this, [DignƒÅga] states:

original: yid ches tshig ni mi bslu ba'i //
analyzed: yid ches tshig ni mi bslu ba'i //
translated: The words of a trustworthy person are non-deceptive

original: spyi las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩyid ches pa'i tshig shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can ni cig shos mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas mthong ba'i don gyi yul can gyi yid ches pa'i tshig dang mi bslu bar mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa nyid do zhes pa ngag
analyzed: spyi las zhes pa la sogs pa ste / yid ches pa'i tshig shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can ni cig shos mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas mthong ba'i don gyi yul can gyi yid ches pa'i tshig dang mi bslu bar mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa nyid do zhes pa ngag
translated: with regard to the hidden.

original: gi don to //
analyzed: gi don to //
translated: The words of a trustworthy person with regard to a hidden object are similar to the words of a trustworthy person that are non-deceptive with regard to the object seen by the other person's direct perception and inference. Therefore, they are inferences. This is the meaning of the statement.

original: 'o na sgra rnams don rnams la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / skyes bu khyad par can yang nges par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'o na sgra rnams don rnams la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / skyes bu khyad par can yang nges par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: But since there is no connection between words and meanings, and since one cannot ascertain a special person,üîΩisn‚Äôt it unreasonable to accept that external objects are valid cognitions?

original: phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma nyid lo nar mi rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na 'di bden mod 'di ni 'dir dgongs pa rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na 'di bden mod 'di ni 'dir dgongs pa par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma nyid lo nar mi rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na 'di bden mod 'di ni 'dir dgongs pa rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na 'di bden mod 'di ni 'dir dgongs pa par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: This is true, but it is not reasonable to think that this is what is intended here.

original: 'bras bu dbang po las 'das pa 'ga' zhig rnams kyis phan yon chen po dang ngan 'gro thos pa'i phyir dang / de yod pa la 'gal ba ma mthong ba'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu dbang po las 'das pa 'ga' zhig rnams kyis phan yon chen po dang ngan 'gro thos pa'i phyir dang / de yod pa la 'gal ba ma mthong ba'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: Because some results are beyond the senses, and because one hears of great benefits and bad rebirths, and because we do not see any contradiction in their existence.

original: des na 'jug par bya ba yod na /
analyzed: des na 'jug par bya ba yod na /
translated: Therefore, if there is something to be engaged,

original: 'di ltar 'jug pa mchog go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jug pa mchog go zhes pa'o //
translated: it is best to engage in this way.

original: de'i phyir yongs su brtags nas tshad mar gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su brtags nas tshad mar gsungs so //
translated: Thus, having examined, he taught that they are valid cognitions.

original: de la skyes bu'i don dang nus pa dang / de'i thabs gang rtogs par byed par @93a * //
analyzed: de la skyes bu'i don dang nus pa dang / de'i thabs gang rtogs par byed par @93a * //
translated: In this regard, one should understand the purpose of a person, his abilities, and the means to that end.

original: nus pa'i bstan bcos de brtag par 'os pa'i phyir de kho na brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: nus pa'i bstan bcos de brtag par 'os pa'i phyir de kho na brtag par bya ste /
translated: Since the treatise on ability is worthy of examination, it should be examined,

original: gzhan la gnod pa med pa kho na mi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la gnod pa med pa kho na mi rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not reasonable to harm others at all.

original: de gal te slu ba med pa nyid brten par gyur na /
analyzed: de gal te slu ba med pa nyid brten par gyur na /
translated: If it were non-deceptive,

original: 'jug pa mdzes so //
analyzed: 'jug pa mdzes so //
translated: it would be beautiful to engage in.

original: yid ches pa'i tshig bzung nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste yid ches pa'i tshig bzung nas mi bslu bar rtogs pa'i rgyur /
analyzed: yid ches pa'i tshig bzung nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste yid ches pa'i tshig bzung nas mi bslu bar rtogs pa'i rgyur /
translated: Having taken up the words of trust, etc., having taken up the words of trust, in order to understand non-deceptiveness,

original: de rjes su dpag pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: de rjes su dpag pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: it is said to be inference itself.

original: ci'i phyir de rjes su dpag pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de rjes su dpag pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it inference itself?

original: don la mi bslu bar mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: don la mi bslu bar mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained because it is the same in not being deceptive regarding the object.

original: yang 'di'i mi bslu ba ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang 'di'i mi bslu ba ci yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is its non-deceptiveness?

original: mngon sum du mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi de lta'i dngos po dang / de ltar mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa rnams kyi mngon sum ma yin pa nyid dang / de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa'i yul du mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi de lta bu'i dngos po dang /
analyzed: mngon sum du mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi de lta'i dngos po dang / de ltar mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa rnams kyi mngon sum ma yin pa nyid dang / de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa'i yul du mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi de lta bu'i dngos po dang /
translated: Similarly, for those who desire inference, it is the nature of such things.

original: de ltar gyur pa ma yin pa rnams kyi rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa ma yin pa rnams kyi rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: For those who do not desire such things, it is the absence of inference.

original: yongs su gcod par nus pa'i yul ma lus pa yongs su dag pa 'di ni mi bslu ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su gcod par nus pa'i yul ma lus pa yongs su dag pa 'di ni mi bslu ba'o //
translated: This complete purification of the object that can be ascertained without error is the non-deceptive.

original: de dang mtshungs pa nyid rjes su dpag par bya ste /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa nyid rjes su dpag par bya ste /
translated: One should infer that which is similar to that.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'i don la yang yid ches pa'i tshig nyid nye par dmigs nas so //
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'i don la yang yid ches pa'i tshig nyid nye par dmigs nas so //
translated: Even with regard to a meaning that is not to be understood through direct perception or inference, one should infer that which is similar to that, having observed the very words of a trustworthy person.

original: gang yid ches pa'i tshig de mi bslu ba ste /
analyzed: gang yid ches pa'i tshig de mi bslu ba ste /
translated: The words of a trustworthy person are non-deceptive.

original: de las gzhan pa'i yid ches pa'i tshig bzhin /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i yid ches pa'i tshig bzhin /
translated: They are like the words of another trustworthy person.

original: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can gyi tshig 'ga' zhig kyang yid ches pa'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can gyi tshig 'ga' zhig kyang yid ches pa'i tshig yin no //
translated: Some statements of the person who has a very hidden object are also trustworthy statements.

original: rang bzhin no //üîΩde'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid yul du byed pa ma yin yang lung rnams ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin no // de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid yul du byed pa ma yin yang lung rnams ni /
translated: The nature of the object

original: de las gzhan pa'i sgra bzhin du brjod par 'dod pa tsam la tshad ma nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sgra bzhin du brjod par 'dod pa tsam la tshad ma nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, even though the statements do not take intrinsic identity as their object, they are not valid cognitions in regard to mere desire to speak, like other statements.

original: 'o na ci zhe na don la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na don la yang ngo //
translated: What then? They are valid cognitions in regard to the object.

original: yang na rnam pa gzhan du yid ches pa'i tshig gi mi bslu ba las rjes su dpag pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na rnam pa gzhan du yid ches pa'i tshig gi mi bslu ba las rjes su dpag pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
translated: Or else, the statements of the trustworthy person are to be called inference, because they are nondeceptive.

original: spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba dang de'i thabs rnams dang de nye bar ston pa rnams phyin ci ma log pa nyid ni mi bslu ba'o //
analyzed: spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba dang de'i thabs rnams dang de nye bar ston pa rnams phyin ci ma log pa nyid ni mi bslu ba'o //
translated: The nondeceptiveness of the statements of the trustworthy person is the nondeceptiveness of the teaching of what is to be rejected, what is to be accepted, and the means of achieving those, without error.

original: de ltar 'di skyes bu'i don la nye bar mkho ba can rjes su sgrub par 'os pa la mi bslu ba'i phyir yul gzhan la yang de ltar nyid du khas len gyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'di skyes bu'i don la nye bar mkho ba can rjes su sgrub par 'os pa la mi bslu ba'i phyir yul gzhan la yang de ltar nyid du khas len gyi /
translated: Thus, because the statements of the trustworthy person are nondeceptive in regard to what is to be accomplished, which is necessary for the purpose of persons, they are accepted as nondeceptive in regard to other objects as well.

original: slu ba'i ched du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: slu ba'i ched du ni ma yin te /
translated: not for the purpose of deceiving.

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir dang / 'chad pa po dgos pa med pa la phyin ci log tu rjod par byed pa 'bras bu med @93b pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir dang / 'chad pa po dgos pa med pa la phyin ci log tu rjod par byed pa 'bras bu med @93b pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no contradiction, and because the expounder, without a purpose, would be ineffective in speaking falsely.

original: de dang 'di rnams gnyis ka ltar yang go skabs med pas lung rjes su dpag pa nyid du nye bar bsgrags te /
analyzed: de dang 'di rnams gnyis ka ltar yang go skabs med pas lung rjes su dpag pa nyid du nye bar bsgrags te /
translated: Since there is no opportunity for either of these two, scripture is proclaimed to be inference.

original: lung las 'jug pa na de ltar 'jug pa mchog go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: lung las 'jug pa na de ltar 'jug pa mchog go zhes pa'o //
translated: When one engages in scripture, such engagement is supreme.

original: rjes su dpag pa nyes pa med pa ni ma yin te sgra rnams don rnams dang med na 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o//
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyes pa med pa ni ma yin te sgra rnams don rnams dang med na 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o//
translated: But it is not faultless inference, because words do not occur without their referents.

original: 'dir yang yid ches pa'i tshig bzung nas /
analyzed: 'dir yang yid ches pa'i tshig bzung nas /
translated: Here, too, one should accept the words of a trustworthy person.

original: mi bslu ba rjes su dpag par bya la /
analyzed: mi bslu ba rjes su dpag par bya la /
translated: One should infer non-deceptiveness.

original: de rjes su dpag pa na phyis de kho na las mi bslu ba las yid ches pa'i tshig ni rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rjes su dpag pa na phyis de kho na las mi bslu ba las yid ches pa'i tshig ni rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: When one infers that, later on, one should infer that the words of a trustworthy person are non-deceptive.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i sgra yang 'dir rtags la 'jug ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i sgra yang 'dir rtags la 'jug ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúinfer‚Äù here refers to the reason.

original: 'dis rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'dis rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: Having said that, it is to be inferred.

original: rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid las yang na'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid las yang na'o //
translated: Again, from the very cause of inference.

original: yang yid ches ba'i tshig gi mi bslu ba ni don gyi 'bras bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang yid ches ba'i tshig gi mi bslu ba ni don gyi 'bras bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Again, the non-deceptiveness of the words of a trustworthy person is because of the result of the object.

original: de yang rtogs pa po'i ngor byas pa las te /
analyzed: de yang rtogs pa po'i ngor byas pa las te /
translated: And that is made in relation to the one who understands,

original: dngos po'i dbang las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i dbang las ni ma yin no //
translated: not from the power of the thing.

original: de skad du yang smras pa zhes pa 'dis rang gi 'dod pa bstan bcos gzhan dang sgrig par byed do //
analyzed: de skad du yang smras pa zhes pa 'dis rang gi 'dod pa bstan bcos gzhan dang sgrig par byed do //
translated: And by this statement ‚Äúthus it is said,‚Äù he connects his own assertion with other treatises.

original: yid ches ba rnams ni mngon sum du mtho ris la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin bzung nas ming byed do //
analyzed: yid ches ba rnams ni mngon sum du mtho ris la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin bzung nas ming byed do //
translated: The trustworthy, having apprehended the nature of heaven, etc., directly, make the name.

original: ming gi las ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: ming gi las ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du rig par bya ste /
translated: The function of the name should be understood as mere indication.

original: de rnams ni thams cad du yang don mthong ba sngon ma can kho nar tha snyad byed la /
analyzed: de rnams ni thams cad du yang don mthong ba sngon ma can kho nar tha snyad byed la /
translated: For they make conventions only in regard to what has been seen before, in all cases.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na yid ches pa rnams kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na yid ches pa rnams kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, they would not be trustworthy.

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyi tshig thams cad mi slu ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyi tshig thams cad mi slu ba ste /
translated: Therefore, all their words are non-deceptive.

original: des na rjes su dpag pa'o zhes ba'o //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pa'o zhes ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is inference.

original: phyogs 'dis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs 'dis zhes pa ste /
translated: By this method,

original: gtso bo la sogs pa rnams dang de rnams kyi rtags rnams 'brel pa ma mthong ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa rnams dang de rnams kyi rtags rnams 'brel pa ma mthong ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: since the connection between the reason and the probandum is not seen,

original: gtso bo la sogs pa rnams ni lung las grub pa kho na'o zhes sngar gyi rjes su 'brangs nas brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo la sogs pa rnams ni lung las grub pa kho na'o zhes sngar gyi rjes su 'brangs nas brjod par bya'o //
translated: it should be said, following the previous, that the existence of pradhƒÅna, etc. is established only by scripture.

original: rjes dpag bya dang de mtshungs la'ang //
analyzed: rjes dpag bya dang de mtshungs la'ang //
translated: Also, with regard to what is to be inferred and what is similar to that,

original: zhes pa / aa tha'i sgra ni sdud pa'i don can te /
analyzed: zhes pa / aa tha'i sgra ni sdud pa'i don can te /
translated: the word atha has the sense of collection.

original: de dang mtshungs pa la yang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa la yang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means also with regard to what is similar to that.

original: de mtshungs la /
analyzed: de mtshungs la /
translated: With regard to what is similar to that,

original: yod gyur ni rjes su 'gro ba mtshon par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: yod gyur ni rjes su 'gro ba mtshon par rig par bya ste /
translated: the word hi indicates concomitance.

original: ji ltar bya rog las zho srungs shig ces pa 'dir bya rog ni khyi la sogs pa gnod byed thams cad kyi yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar bya rog las zho srungs shig ces pa 'dir bya rog ni khyi la sogs pa gnod byed thams cad kyi yin pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the expression ‚Äúprotect the curd from the crow,‚Äù where the crow is all the harmful agents such as the dog, etc.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni tshul gnyis pa'o zhes pa'o //üîΩde lta na yang mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs la tshul gsum pa @94a * //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni tshul gnyis pa'o zhes pa'o // de lta na yang mnyan par bya ba nyid kyang mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs la tshul gsum pa @94a * //
translated: The second mode is the forward mode.

original: nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur la /
analyzed: nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur la /
translated: Even so, the fact that it is to be heard is established as the third mode of the reason of impermanence.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ma yin te /
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: de la de dang mtshungs pa la yod par gyur pa nyid yod pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de la de dang mtshungs pa la yod par gyur pa nyid yod pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Because the existence of that which is similar to it does not exist there.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni yod de /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni yod de /
translated: The forward mode exists.

original: rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rtags la rtags can yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rtags la rtags can yod pa kho na ste /
translated: The so-called forward mode is the existence of the property possessor in the reason.

original: de yang mnyan par bya ba nyid la yang yod do //
analyzed: de yang mnyan par bya ba nyid la yang yod do //
translated: And that exists in the fact that it is to be heard.

original: de ltar ni gang du mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa der mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni gang du mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa der mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba kho na ste /
translated: It is understood in this way: wherever it is to be heard, there impermanence will occur.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na mnyan par bya ba nyid kho na yang mi 'byung bas so zhes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na mnyan par bya ba nyid kho na yang mi 'byung bas so zhes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the fact that it is to be heard would not occur at all.

original: med la med nyid pa'o zhes pa /
analyzed: med la med nyid pa'o zhes pa /
translated: Non-existence in the non-existent.

original: 'dir med pa'i sgras de dang mtshungs pa'i med pa brjod par bya ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir med pa'i sgras de dang mtshungs pa'i med pa brjod par bya ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù does not refer only to the object of expression that is similar to non-existence.

original: 'on kyang de las gzhan pa dang de dang 'gal ba yang ste de'i rnam pas dben pa'i phyir ro zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de las gzhan pa dang de dang 'gal ba yang ste de'i rnam pas dben pa'i phyir ro zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: Rather, it should be understood that it refers to that which is other than that, and that which is incompatible with that, because it is devoid of that aspect.

original: med pa la med pa nyid ni ldog pa nye bar mtshon bar yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid ni ldog pa nye bar mtshon bar yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: Non-existence should be seen as the indication of the negation of existence.

original: ldog pa yang tshul gsum pa'o zhes pa ngag gi don to//
analyzed: ldog pa yang tshul gsum pa'o zhes pa ngag gi don to//
translated: The meaning of the statement is that negation also has three modes.

original: 'dir chos dang chos can 'ba' zhig pa dag grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'dir chos dang chos can 'ba' zhig pa dag grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Here, only the property and the subject are established,

original: rjes su dpag bya nyid du 'thad pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rjes su dpag bya nyid du 'thad pa ma yin zhing /
translated: and it is not tenable that they are the object of inference.

original: tshogs pa yang ji srid du chos ma grub pa de srid du mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa yang ji srid du chos ma grub pa de srid du mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: And as long as the property is not established, the collection is not possible.

original: blo la nges par zhugs pa ma yin pas ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can du rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: blo la nges par zhugs pa ma yin pas ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can du rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not reasonable for the subject to be distinguished by the property when it is not ascertained by the mind.

original: chos can la grub na ni /
analyzed: chos can la grub na ni /
translated: If the subject is established,

original: phyis tshogs pa skye mod /
analyzed: phyis tshogs pa skye mod /
translated: then later the collection arises.

original: de'i tshe yang de'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid ldog ste /
