analyzed: de'i tshe yang de'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid ldog ste /
translated: At that time, the predicate to be proven is reversed,

original: grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is already established.üîΩTherefore, it is absolutely impossible for an inferential sign to exist in the object of inference.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba la gtan tshigs yod pa nyid mi srid pa kho na'o zhes 'ga' zhig gi rtsod pa dogs par byas nas smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba la gtan tshigs yod pa nyid mi srid pa kho na'o zhes 'ga' zhig gi rtsod pa dogs par byas nas smras pa /
translated: Having anticipated this objection by someone, he says,

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of inference,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir gal te yang chos kyi sgra spyi sgra yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: 'dir gal te yang chos kyi sgra spyi sgra yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Here, although the term ‚Äúproperty‚Äù is a general term,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skabs las gang gi don du sgrub par byed pa rjes su 'dod pa de kho na la nye ba las 'jug go //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skabs las gang gi don du sgrub par byed pa rjes su 'dod pa de kho na la nye ba las 'jug go //
translated: nevertheless, from the context of the proof, it is the one for whose sake the proof is intended that is accepted as the inferential subject, and it is only in relation to that that the sign is said to be ‚Äúpresent.‚Äù

original: yang de'ang ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang de'ang ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid can gyi chos te /
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid can gyi chos te /
translated: It is the property that has the characteristic of the particular that is intended to be known.

original: chos can gyi chos shes par 'dod pa med pa la ni rtog pa dang ldan pa su yang sgrub par byed pa 'god pa med de /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos shes par 'dod pa med pa la ni rtog pa dang ldan pa su yang sgrub par byed pa 'god pa med de /
translated: For one who does not intend to know the property of the subject, no rational person would posit a proof,

original: de'i phyir yod pa nyid du grub pa'i chos can la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa nyid du grub pa'i chos can la /
translated: because the property of the subject is already established to exist.

original: gang la sgrub par byed pa drangs pa shes 'dod dang ldan pa'i chos de kho na chos kyi sgras rtogs par byas te /
analyzed: gang la sgrub par byed pa drangs pa shes 'dod dang ldan pa'i chos de kho na chos kyi sgras rtogs par byas te /
translated: The very phenomenon that is the basis of the proof, which is the object of the desire to know, is understood to be the word of the phenomenon.

original: des khyad par du @94b byas pa ni don gzhan las rnam par gcad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des khyad par du @94b byas pa ni don gzhan las rnam par gcad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúdistinguished by that‚Äù is ‚Äúexcluded from other objects.‚Äù

original: de las kyang don 'di kho nar 'gyur te /üîΩshes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa'i chos can zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang don 'di kho nar 'gyur te / shes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa'i chos can zhes pa'o //
translated: Moreover, this is the only meaning.üîΩThe word ‚Äúdistinguished‚Äù is a phenomenon that is the object of the desire to know.

original: de ltar ni gang shes par 'dod pa gang yin pas khyad par du byas par 'gyur ba de'i shes par 'dod pa 'di khyad par du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ni gang shes par 'dod pa gang yin pas khyad par du byas par 'gyur ba de'i shes par 'dod pa 'di khyad par du 'gyur te /
translated: The meaning is that the phenomenon that is the object of the desire to know is distinguished by the word ‚Äúdistinguished.‚Äù

original: tshogs pa bsgrub bya'o zhes pa'i tshig kyang shes par 'dod pa can gyi chos la ltos pa kho nas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa bsgrub bya'o zhes pa'i tshig kyang shes par 'dod pa can gyi chos la ltos pa kho nas rig par bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúestablished‚Äù is also understood only in terms of the phenomenon that is the object of the desire to know.

original: dus phyir gyi chos grub pa bsten pa ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can zhes so sor ston par byed kyi /
analyzed: dus phyir gyi chos grub pa bsten pa ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can zhes so sor ston par byed kyi /
translated: The word ‚Äúdistinguished by the phenomenon‚Äù is used to indicate the establishment of the phenomenon that is the object of the desire to know.

original: rtags mthong ba'i dus na chos kyis khyad par du byas pa nyid yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtags mthong ba'i dus na chos kyis khyad par du byas pa nyid yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: At the time of seeing the reason, the object qualified by the property is not present,

original: chos yang dag par shes pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gzhan rnams so //
analyzed: chos yang dag par shes pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gzhan rnams so //
translated: because there is no correct knowledge of the property.üîΩSince this is the section on the reason that causes knowledge, knowledge is implied by the meaning.

original: shes par byed pa gtan tshigs kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir shes pa don gyis 'phangs pa'o zhes nges bar byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: shes par byed pa gtan tshigs kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir shes pa don gyis 'phangs pa'o zhes nges bar byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Having ascertained this, it is said:

original: de la mthong ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la mthong ba ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: There, seeing... and so on.

original: de la zhes pa rjes su dpag par bya ba la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa rjes su dpag par bya ba la'o //
translated: There refers to the object of inference.

original: mngon sum mam zhes pa du ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mngon sum mam zhes pa du ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Directly refers to smoke and so on.

original: du ba dang bcas ba'i phyogs don gzhan gyis dben pa'i ngo bo can thun mong ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du mthong ba po la ni mngon sum gyis te /
analyzed: du ba dang bcas ba'i phyogs don gzhan gyis dben pa'i ngo bo can thun mong ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du mthong ba po la ni mngon sum gyis te /
translated: For the one who sees the place with smoke as having the nature of being devoid of other objects, it is by direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyi stobs kho nas ji ltar mthong ba'i khyad par gyi yul can gyi nges pa de kho na 'di'o zhes dran pa rtags shes pa dus phyis skye'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi stobs kho nas ji ltar mthong ba'i khyad par gyi yul can gyi nges pa de kho na 'di'o zhes dran pa rtags shes pa dus phyis skye'o //
translated: By the power of direct perception alone, the memory of the object qualified as seen arises later, the reason being the knowledge that this is exactly that.

original: de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not a valid cognition,

original: ma rtogs par don bya bar rung ba'i dngos po rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rtogs par don bya bar rung ba'i dngos po rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not realize the object that is fit to perform a function, since it is not a realization.

original: dang po kho na ni tshad ma nyid de /
analyzed: dang po kho na ni tshad ma nyid de /
translated: Only the first is a valid cognition,

original: de las bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the opposite of that.

original: 'di ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: This is the definition of valid cognition,

original: de ga las she na /
analyzed: de ga las she na /
translated: because of what?

original: dngos po la brten pa nyid las tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po la brten pa nyid las tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because valid cognition is established on the basis of an entity.

original: de yang ga las she na /
analyzed: de yang ga las she na /
translated: And that is because of what?

original: don du gnyer pa'i 'jug pa ni don bya bar rung ba'i yul can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don du gnyer pa'i 'jug pa ni don bya bar rung ba'i yul can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the engagement of one who seeks an object is only in a domain that is fit to perform a function.

original: 'dis ni chos can dang chos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtogs pa tshad ma nyid ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos can dang chos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtogs pa tshad ma nyid ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: By this, one should understand that conceptual thoughts such as the subject and the object are not valid cognitions.

original: de las kyang gang rnams rtags la sogs pa'i shes pa rnams mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i nang du ma 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir tshad ma gzhan nyid du 'thob bo zhes rtsod par byed pa de rnams bdag nyid kyis blun po nyid du 'chad do //üîΩyang na rjes su dpag pa las zhes pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni res @95a * //
analyzed: de las kyang gang rnams rtags la sogs pa'i shes pa rnams mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i nang du ma 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir tshad ma gzhan nyid du 'thob bo zhes rtsod par byed pa de rnams bdag nyid kyis blun po nyid du 'chad do // yang na rjes su dpag pa las zhes pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni res @95a * //
translated: Moreover, those who argue that other valid cognitions are obtained because the cognitions of signs and so on are not included in direct perception and inference are explaining their own stupidity.

original: 'ga' ba nyid la sogs pa'i rtags kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' ba nyid la sogs pa'i rtags kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Or, having the word ‚Äúinference‚Äù is because having been made and so on are to be inferred by the reason sometimes and so on.

original: dus phyis zhes pa so sor sbrel bar bya ste /
analyzed: dus phyis zhes pa so sor sbrel bar bya ste /
translated: Later is to be connected to each.

original: mngon sum las dus phyis sam yang na rjes su dpag pa las dus phyis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum las dus phyis sam yang na rjes su dpag pa las dus phyis zhes pa'o //
translated: Later than direct perception or later than inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i sgra yang 'dir rtags shes pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i sgra yang 'dir rtags shes pa la 'jug ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúinference‚Äù here is used for the cognition of a reason.

original: ji skad du bshad pa /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: de 'di ni dngos sam brgyud pas rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka yang rjes dpag pa ste /
analyzed: de 'di ni dngos sam brgyud pas rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka yang rjes dpag pa ste /
translated: Because this is a cause of inference either directly or indirectly, both are inferences.

original: byed pa'i byed pa can du byas nas so //
analyzed: byed pa'i byed pa can du byas nas so //
translated: and it is made into the instrument of the action.

original: chos spyi'i ngo bos zhes pa la /
analyzed: chos spyi'i ngo bos zhes pa la /
translated: By the universal of the property.

original: spyi'i ngo bo smos pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo bsal ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi'i ngo bo smos pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo bsal ba'i don to //
translated: The mention of the universal is for the purpose of excluding the uncommon property.

original: des rjes su dpag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des rjes su dpag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because inference is impossible with respect to that.

original: de ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i rjes la byung ba'i shes pas yul du bya bar nus pa yang ma yin te de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang spyi'i yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i rjes la byung ba'i shes pas yul du bya bar nus pa yang ma yin te de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang spyi'i yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it possible for it to be the object of a cognition that occurs after perception, etc., because that is conceptual and because the concepts have universals as their objects.

original: de'i rigs can la yang zhes pa 'dir yang spyi'i ngo bos zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rigs can la yang zhes pa 'dir yang spyi'i ngo bos zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: And in this case, ‚Äúhaving the same type‚Äù should be connected with ‚Äúby the universal of the property.‚Äù

original: 'o na chos can gyis khyad par du byas pa gzhan du 'jug pa 'gal ba /
analyzed: 'o na chos can gyis khyad par du byas pa gzhan du 'jug pa 'gal ba /
translated: But if the property is specified by the subject, then it is contradictory for it to occur elsewhere.

original: khyad par du mi byed na'ang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par du mi byed na'ang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i chos nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: And if it does not specify, then it is not the property of the object to be inferred.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is distinguished by the exclusion of non-possession.

original: dper na nag pa gzhung 'dzin no zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nag pa gzhung 'dzin no zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the expression ‚ÄúNƒÅga is the upholder of the treatise.‚Äù

original: gal te de lta na sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyi bye brag ni rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad kyi ngor nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no zhes pa spyi kho na rtags su yongs su gzung sbar bya la /
analyzed: gal te de lta na sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyi bye brag ni rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad kyi ngor nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no zhes pa spyi kho na rtags su yongs su gzung sbar bya la /
translated: If that is so, then the particular of the proving property is not applied in the perspective of the conventions of inference and that which is to be inferred, so only the universal is taken as the evidence.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi yang de kho na gzung bar byas ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi yang de kho na gzung bar byas ste /
translated: And the probandum is also taken as just that.

original: de'i yang khyad par ni nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de'i yang khyad par ni nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pas so //
translated: Because its particular is not applied.

original: spyi sgrub par byed na yang grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: spyi sgrub par byed na yang grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Even if the universal is proven, it would be the proof of what is already established.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: spyi kho na bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: spyi kho na bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: The universal alone is the probandum.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas so //
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par bcad pas so //
translated: Because it is distinguished by the exclusion of non-possession.

original: grub pa la bsgrub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: grub pa la bsgrub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not the proof of what is already established,

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the exclusion of non-possession is not established.

original: phyogs gcig smos pas mthun phyogs la ma khyab pa yang gtan tshigs nyid du ston to //üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa rjes su dpag par bya ba dang de dang mtshungs pa dag la mtshungs par yod par brjod pa la gcig la ni gtan tshigs thams cad la yod par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs gcig smos pas mthun phyogs la ma khyab pa yang gtan tshigs nyid du ston to // de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa rjes su dpag par bya ba dang de dang mtshungs pa dag la mtshungs par yod par brjod pa la gcig la ni gtan tshigs thams cad la yod par gyur pa ste /
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause of the mention of one part‚Äù shows that the nonpervasion of the similar instances is also a reason.

original: gzhan la ni phyogs gcig la yang zhes pa 'di ci'i phyir 'thob ces @95b 'dri bar byed do //
analyzed: gzhan la ni phyogs gcig la yang zhes pa 'di ci'i phyir 'thob ces @95b 'dri bar byed do //
translated: Why is that? He asks, ‚ÄúWhy is it that in one case all the reasons are present, and in another case, even one part is not present?‚Äù

original: ngag rnams ni rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: ngag rnams ni rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because the statements have the effect of exclusion.

original: 'dod pa las kyang nges par 'dzin pa las 'di 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa las kyang nges par 'dzin pa las 'di 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Even though it is not stated, it is understood.

original: de dang mtshungs pa kho na la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa kho na la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúOnly in the similar instances‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dis ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas 'dir nges par gzung ba la brten pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas 'dir nges par gzung ba la brten pa ste /
translated: This shows that the definite inclusion is based on the exclusion of the other.

original: dper na srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin zhes pa lta bu'i zhes ston to //
analyzed: dper na srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin zhes pa lta bu'i zhes ston to //
translated: For example, it is like the statement ‚ÄúArjuna holds a bow.‚Äù

original: gal te de lta na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mi 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la mi 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if that is so, then it would not apply to the subject that is to be established.

original: chos gzhan dgag pa'i don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gzhan dgag pa'i don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the very purpose of refuting other phenomena.

original: de la 'jug pa sgrub pa na sdud pa'i nges par 'dzin pas ni gzhan rnam par gcod pa yin te /
analyzed: de la 'jug pa sgrub pa na sdud pa'i nges par 'dzin pas ni gzhan rnam par gcod pa yin te /
translated: When it is established that it applies to that, by the ascertainment of the inclusion, it excludes the other.

original: dper na ran gla bu gnyis skyes gyur te //
analyzed: dper na ran gla bu gnyis skyes gyur te //
translated: For example, when two sons of Narayana are born,

original: na ra dang ne sred med kho na'o //üîΩzhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: na ra dang ne sred med kho na'o // zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: they are Narayana and Narayani.

original: de ltar na brjod par ya ba ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: de ltar na brjod par ya ba ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: Thus, it is not expressed as ‚Äúit is not other.‚ÄùüîΩBecause the meaning of that is understood just from the ascertainment itself.

original: nges par gzung ba de kho na las de'i don rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes sems pa'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba de kho na las de'i don rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes sems pa'o //
translated: This is what he thinks.

original: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: Here, ‚Äúthis‚Äù refers to the ascertainment.

original: 'di nges par bya bas na nges pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nges par bya bas na nges pa ste /
translated: Because it is ascertained, it is an ascertainment.

original: chos mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa dang chos mi mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: The application that possesses the property of the similar instance and the application that possesses the property of the dissimilar instance should be stated.

original: gang phyir sbyor ba'i ngag gis ni tshad ma gsal bar byed pas /
analyzed: gang phyir sbyor ba'i ngag gis ni tshad ma gsal bar byed pas /
translated: Because the statement of the application clarifies the valid cognition,

original: ci 'di brtag pa'am 'on te ma yin zhes pha rol po rnams kyi the tshom gyi khyogs la zhon pa'i blo 'di ni mi rtag pa kho na'o zhes don gzhan las rnam par bcad nas mi rtag pa kho na la rnam par 'jog par byed de /
analyzed: ci 'di brtag pa'am 'on te ma yin zhes pha rol po rnams kyi the tshom gyi khyogs la zhon pa'i blo 'di ni mi rtag pa kho na'o zhes don gzhan las rnam par bcad nas mi rtag pa kho na la rnam par 'jog par byed de /
translated: The mind of the opponent, which is mounted on the swing of doubt, ‚ÄúIs this to be analyzed or not? ‚Äù is determined to be impermanent alone, having been eliminated from another object.

original: de'i phyir sbyor ba nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyor ba nges pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the application is certain.

original: de'i don du tshul gsum pa bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don du tshul gsum pa bshad par bya'o //
translated: For that purpose, the three modes should be explained.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las khyab pa nges pa can gyi tshul gcig sbyar bas kyang don gyis gnyis pa rtogs par byed do zhes pas gcig kyang sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las khyab pa nges pa can gyi tshul gcig sbyar bas kyang don gyis gnyis pa rtogs par byed do zhes pas gcig kyang sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Since the certainty of the pervasion from the forward and reverse pervasions is applied by one mode, the other is understood implicitly. Therefore, even one mode is applied.

original: 'o na rtags tshul gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rtags tshul gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well, then, the two modes of the reason would be obtained.

original: ma yin te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag tshul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag tshul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because the forward and reverse pervasions are different modes.

original: de dag ni ngag gcig gis kyang bstan par nus pa'i phyir sbyor ba bsdus te brjod kyi tshul bsdus pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni ngag gcig gis kyang bstan par nus pa'i phyir sbyor ba bsdus te brjod kyi tshul bsdus pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Since those can be indicated by a single statement, the application is stated to be included, but the modes are not included.

original: de ltar ni yang na don gyis go bas gang yang rung bas gnyis ka rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar ni yang na don gyis go bas gang yang rung bas gnyis ka rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gsungs so //
translated: Thus, in order to demonstrate both by implication, he says:

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so,

original: med pa la med pa nyid ni 'thad pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid ni 'thad pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: but non-existence is not tenable in non-existence.

original: med pa ni gzhi nyid la sogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩbyed pas can rnams ni nu sa @96a * //
analyzed: med pa ni gzhi nyid la sogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro // byed pas can rnams ni nu sa @96a * //
translated: For, non-existence is not tenable as a basis, etc.

original: pa las rab tu skyes pa can rnams yin pas te /
analyzed: pa las rab tu skyes pa can rnams yin pas te /
translated: Those that have an agent are those that are produced from an action.

original: med pa yang nus pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: med pa yang nus pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But non-existence is devoid of all efficacy.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, he says:

original: med pa kho na la med pa nyid ces pa ste /
analyzed: med pa kho na la med pa nyid ces pa ste /
translated: Non-existence is only in non-existence.

original: tshig phrad rim pa tha dad par bya la /
analyzed: tshig phrad rim pa tha dad par bya la /
translated: The sequence of the words should be different.

original: med pa la med pa nyid kho na zhes blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid kho na zhes blta bar bya'o //
translated: Non-existence is only in non-existence should be seen.

original: yang na ji ltar bkod pa kho na 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar bkod pa kho na 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, it is just as it is arranged.

original: 'o na de ltar gyur na yod pa dang ldan pa la med pa nyid thob pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de ltar gyur na yod pa dang ldan pa la med pa nyid thob pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if that is so, then existence is not established in non-existence.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: 'dir med la med nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir med la med nyid med pa'o //
translated: Here, non-existence is only in non-existence.

original: zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig la med pa la med pa nyid kho na zhes nges par gzung bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir med pa nyid brjod pa ni nges pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig la med pa la med pa nyid kho na zhes nges par gzung bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir med pa nyid brjod pa ni nges pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúnonexistence of nonexistence‚Äù is intended to be a restriction, so the expression ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù is definite.

original: de'i phyir de'i dbang du byas nas 'di skad bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i dbang du byas nas 'di skad bshad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is explained from that point of view.

original: 'di ni 'di'i don te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i don te /
translated: This is the meaning of that passage.

original: med pa la med pa nyid kho na ni dngos po dgag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur gyi yod pa nyid sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid kho na ni dngos po dgag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur gyi yod pa nyid sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Nonexistence of nonexistence is the nature of the negation of an existent thing, not the affirmation of existence,

original: med pa sgrub pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa sgrub pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to affirm nonexistence.

original: 'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the result of valid knowledge.

original: gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa de ma thag pa'i med pa las te /
analyzed: gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa de ma thag pa'i med pa las te /
translated: ‚ÄúNot in another‚Äù is from the immediately preceding nonexistence,

original: skabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the context.

original: de la ltos pas 'dir gzhan pa'i don blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la ltos pas 'dir gzhan pa'i don blta bar bya'o //
translated: In dependence on that, the meaning of ‚Äúanother‚Äù should be seen here.

original: med pa las gzhan pa yod pa nyid dang ldan pa la med pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa las gzhan pa yod pa nyid dang ldan pa la med pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: That which has existence, which is other than nonexistence, does not become only nonexistence,

original: de la sgrub pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la sgrub pa yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible to affirm that.

original: 'dis ni nges pa dang ldan pas med pa nyid ni yod pa la 'gog par byed pas nges pa dang bral ba'i med pa nyid yod do zhes don 'di rtogs te /
analyzed: 'dis ni nges pa dang ldan pas med pa nyid ni yod pa la 'gog par byed pas nges pa dang bral ba'i med pa nyid yod do zhes don 'di rtogs te /
translated: This means that one should understand that nonexistence, which is endowed with determination, is refuted in regard to existence, and that nonexistence, which is devoid of determination, exists.

original: dgag pa khyad par can gyis ni de las bzlog pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgag pa khyad par can gyis ni de las bzlog pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should understand that the opposite of that is understood through a special negation.

original: dper na 'di ni 'bras bu can gyi pa l'a sha med do zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'di ni 'bras bu can gyi pa l'a sha med do zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúThis is not a fruit-bearing palm tree.‚Äù

original: dpe 'di ni pha rol po la grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe 'di ni pha rol po la grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This example is established for the opponent.

original: med pa la ni pha rol pos med pa nyid 'dod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: med pa la ni pha rol pos med pa nyid 'dod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: The opponent does not assert the nonexistence of nonexistence,

original: yod pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: but he does assert the nonexistence of existence.

original: med pa la nges pa dang ldan pa'i med pa nyid 'gyur ba rgyu ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: med pa la nges pa dang ldan pa'i med pa nyid 'gyur ba rgyu ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the reason that nonexistence is endowed with determination?

original: 'gal ba la yang ma yin zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba la yang ma yin zhes pa ste /
translated: It is not in regard to a contradiction.

original: zhes pa'i byed pa ni gtan tshigs la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i byed pa ni gtan tshigs la'o //
translated: The suffix ‚Äú-tva‚Äù is in regard to the reason.

original: 'di skad ston to //
analyzed: 'di skad ston to //
translated: This is what is being shown.

original: gal te med pa la dngos po'i chos 'ga' zhig sgrub na skyon du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te med pa la dngos po'i chos 'ga' zhig sgrub na skyon du 'gyur mod /
translated: If one were to establish any quality of an entity in regard to nonexistence, there would be an error.

original: dngos po'i chos ni med pa la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ni med pa la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for a non-existent thing to be a phenomenon.

original: 'dir cung zad sgrub pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir cung zad sgrub pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, there is no proof whatsoever.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: dgag pa tsam du bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgag pa tsam du bya ba'o //
translated: It is a mere negation.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'am med pa ni mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa med pa nyid dang 'gal @96b pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'am med pa ni mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa med pa nyid dang 'gal @96b pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Non-existence or non-existent is not contradictory to the non-existence of the barren woman's son, etc.

original: de'i phyir de de la srid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de de la srid do zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is possible for that to be in that.

original: yang med pa nyid dang 'gal ba ma yin pa 'di ni de la srid pa ste /
analyzed: yang med pa nyid dang 'gal ba ma yin pa 'di ni de la srid pa ste /
translated: Moreover, this non-contradiction with non-existence is possible for that,

original: dper na med pa la bzhin med pa yang dngos po'i chos bkag pa'i mtshan nyid can med pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: dper na med pa la bzhin med pa yang dngos po'i chos bkag pa'i mtshan nyid can med pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba'o //
translated: just as non-existence is not contradictory to the non-existence of a barren woman's son, which is characterized by the negation of a thing's property.

original: rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature.

original: gzhi la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni dngos po'i rgyu can kho na ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhi la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni dngos po'i rgyu can kho na ma yin no //
translated: The conventions of basis, etc. are not only due to a thing.

original: med pa la med pa nyid med do zhes smra ba'i pha rol pos kyang 'di khas blangs so zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid med do zhes smra ba'i pha rol pos kyang 'di khas blangs so zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The opponent who says that non-existence does not have non-existence accepts this, I think.

original: shes pa smos pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa smos pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: With regard to the statement consciousness, etc., etc.

original: gang zhig gis shes pa gzung bar bya ba 'di ni shes pa smos pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gis shes pa gzung bar bya ba 'di ni shes pa smos pa ste /
translated: This is the knowledge of the object to be apprehended.

original: rtsol ba gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba gzhan pa'o //
translated: The other is the effort.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: ji ltar rtags kyi yul can gyi shes pa 'thob pa de ltar rtsol ba gzhan bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar rtags kyi yul can gyi shes pa 'thob pa de ltar rtsol ba gzhan bya ba ste /
translated: Just as the knowledge of the object of the reason is obtained, so too the other effort is to be made.

original: gzhan du na ma shes pa'i du ba la sogs pa las kyang bstan pa'i yul gyi khyad par du /
analyzed: gzhan du na ma shes pa'i du ba la sogs pa las kyang bstan pa'i yul gyi khyad par du /
translated: Otherwise, even from the unknown smoke and so on, the particular object of the teaching,

original: me la sogs pa la rjes su dpag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: me la sogs pa la rjes su dpag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: fire and so on, would be inferred.

original: shes pa'ang thob ces pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: shes pa'ang thob ces pa la sogs pas /
translated: Also, knowledge is obtained and so on.

original: shes pa ni shugs kyis 'phangs pa nyid kyi phyir de la rtsol ba gzhan bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: shes pa ni shugs kyis 'phangs pa nyid kyi phyir de la rtsol ba gzhan bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: Since knowledge is implied by the word, it is not to be accomplished by another effort.

original: tshul re re dang gnyis gnyis pa'ang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tshul re re dang gnyis gnyis pa'ang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Each method and both and so on.

original: gang zhig gi tshul re re dang gnyis gnyis dag yin pa de de skad du brjod do //
analyzed: gang zhig gi tshul re re dang gnyis gnyis dag yin pa de de skad du brjod do //
translated: That which has each method and both is expressed in that way.

original: don dang 'brel pa las 'dir skyes pa'i rtags su bstan to //
analyzed: don dang 'brel pa las 'dir skyes pa'i rtags su bstan to //
translated: From the connection with the meaning, here the reason is taught.

original: don gyis zhes pa sgra med kyang don gyis 'thob pa nyid du don 'di ston par byed do //
analyzed: don gyis zhes pa sgra med kyang don gyis 'thob pa nyid du don 'di ston par byed do //
translated: Although the words are not there, the meaning is shown to be obtained by implication.

original: gal te de lta na don 'di don gyis thob pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na don 'di don gyis thob pa kho na yin na /
translated: If that is so, this meaning is obtained by implication alone.

original: ci'i don du bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: ci'i don du bshad par bya ste /
translated: For what purpose is it to be explained?

original: don 'di kho bos sgra med kyang don gyis rtogs so zhes pa /
analyzed: don 'di kho bos sgra med kyang don gyis rtogs so zhes pa /
translated: This meaning is understood by me even without the words.

original: de ltar tshig brjod par bya bzhin pa la ni /
analyzed: de ltar tshig brjod par bya bzhin pa la ni /
translated: Thus, when the words are being uttered,

original: bshad zin par yang mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bshad zin par yang mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: it is not as if they have already been explained.

original: don gyis thob pa slar yang brjod pas rtogs par byed pa ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don gyis thob pa slar yang brjod pas rtogs par byed pa ni 'bras bu dang ldan pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And it is not as if the meaning is understood by stating again what is already obtained by implication.

original: 'di bden mod /
analyzed: 'di bden mod /
translated: This is true.

original: de lta na yang blo zhen pas bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'di don gyis thob kyang bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang blo zhen pas bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'di don gyis thob kyang bshad par bya ste /
translated: Nevertheless, in order to understand the meaning that is to be specifically realized by the mind, this is explained even though the meaning is obtained by implication.

original: mgo smos pas shes pa la ltos pas ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mgo smos pas shes pa la ltos pas ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not for the sake of those who understand from a mere hint.

original: 'dir rtsod pa /
analyzed: 'dir rtsod pa /
translated: Here, there is an objection:

original: de dang mtshungs pa nyid la yod par gyur pa zhes pa 'dis rjes su 'gro ba rtogs par bya zhing de yang ldog pa med par med la /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa nyid la yod par gyur pa zhes pa 'dis rjes su 'gro ba rtogs par bya zhing de yang ldog pa med par med la /
translated: And by ‚Äúexisting in that which is similar to it‚Äù one should understand the forward pervasion, which is not nonexistent without the counter pervasion.

original: med pa la med pa nyid ces pa 'dis kyang ldog pa ste /üîΩde yang rjes su 'gro ba med @97a * //
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid ces pa 'dis kyang ldog pa ste / de yang rjes su 'gro ba med @97a * //
translated: And by ‚Äúnonexistent in that which is not it‚Äù one should understand the counter pervasion,

original: par ma yin na /
analyzed: par ma yin na /
translated: which is not nonexistent without the forward pervasion.

original: de ji ltar 'di skad du /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'di skad du /
translated: How could it be explained like this?

original: de dang mtshungs pa la yod cing de med pa la med pa ni ma yin pa dang / de med pa la med cing de dang mtshungs pa la yod pa ni ma yin pa zhes pa la sogs pa bshad ce na /
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa la yod cing de med pa la med pa ni ma yin pa dang / de med pa la med cing de dang mtshungs pa la yod pa ni ma yin pa zhes pa la sogs pa bshad ce na /
translated: ‚ÄúExisting in that which is similar to it and not nonexistent in that which is not it‚Äù and ‚Äúnonexistent in that which is not it and not existing in that which is similar to it.‚Äù

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: There is no error here.

original: 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin pa'i ngo bo'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin pa'i ngo bo'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa ma yin gyi /
translated: This is not explained from the perspective of the essential nature of the forward pervasion and the counter pervasion.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par gyur pa tsam gyi dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med pa nyid tsam nges pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par gyur pa tsam gyi dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med pa nyid tsam nges pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: and the mere presence in the similar instance and the mere absence in the dissimilar instance.

original: 'dun pa las kyang tshig rnams kyi 'jug pa ste ;
analyzed: 'dun pa las kyang tshig rnams kyi 'jug pa ste ;
translated: The application of the words is due to the desire.

original: don ni yongs su brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: don ni yongs su brtag par bya'o //
translated: The meaning should be examined.

original: 'di ni 'dir brjod par 'dod pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir brjod par 'dod pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning that is intended here.

original: gang la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yod pa ma yin na phyogs kyi chos nyid yod kyang gtan tshigs ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gang la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yod pa ma yin na phyogs kyi chos nyid yod kyang gtan tshigs ma yin zhing /
translated: If there is neither positive nor negative concomitance, there is no logical reason, even if there is the property of the subject.

original: gang la phyogs kyi chos nyid med na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan na yang de yang gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang la phyogs kyi chos nyid med na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang ldan na yang de yang gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: And if there is no property of the subject, even if there is positive and negative concomitance, it is not a logical reason.

original: de yang rnam pa 'dis kyang rtogs par bya bar nus pa de kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa 'dis kyang rtogs par bya bar nus pa de kho na'o zhes pa'o //
translated: And that is only what can be understood by this method.

original: kun nas gnas pa ma yin par smra ba'i ngor sgra rtag ste lus can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas gnas pa ma yin par smra ba'i ngor sgra rtag ste lus can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: To one who maintains that sound is not a quality of space, one may say: Sound is permanent, because it is embodied.

original: bye brag pa'i 'dod pas rtag pa dang lus can rdul phra rab la ltos pas gcig pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag pa'i 'dod pas rtag pa dang lus can rdul phra rab la ltos pas gcig pa'o //
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ika‚Äôs assertion is permanent and one, because it depends on the subtle particle that has a body.

original: de bzhin du sgra rtag ste gzhal bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa'i phyir tshul gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra rtag ste gzhal bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa'i phyir tshul gcig pa'o //
translated: Similarly, sound is permanent because it is not an object of comprehension. This is one mode that is the opposite of the discordant side.

original: sgra rtag ste lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa tshul gnyis pa thun mong ba'o //
analyzed: sgra rtag ste lus can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa tshul gnyis pa thun mong ba'o //
translated: Sound is permanent because it does not have a body. This is a common second mode.

original: sgra rtag ste mnyan bya nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di thun mong ma yin pa tshul gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste mnyan bya nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di thun mong ma yin pa tshul gnyis pa ste /
translated: Sound is permanent because it is audible. This is an uncommon second mode.

original: gal te sgra nyid rtag par khas mi len na'o //
analyzed: gal te sgra nyid rtag par khas mi len na'o //
translated: If one does not accept that sound itself is permanent.

original: sgra mi rtag ste mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes ro zhes pa tshul gnyis pa 'di ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes ro zhes pa tshul gnyis pa 'di ma grub pa ste /
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is apprehended by the eye. This is an unestablished second mode.

original: gal te rigs rnams mig gis gzung bar mi 'dod na'o //
analyzed: gal te rigs rnams mig gis gzung bar mi 'dod na'o //
translated: If one does not assert that the elements are apprehended by the eye.

original: tshul med pa yang yod de /
analyzed: tshul med pa yang yod de /
translated: There is also a mode that does not exist.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: sgra rtag ste mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, ‚ÄúSound is permanent because of being perceptible by the eye.‚Äù

original: de ni phyogs 'di kho nas rtogs par bya'o zhes pas tshigs su bcad par ma gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni phyogs 'di kho nas rtogs par bya'o zhes pas tshigs su bcad par ma gsungs so //
translated: But that is to be understood only from this treatise, so it is not stated in verse.

original: mdor ni tshul re re dang / gnyis gnyis pa'ang zhes pa 'dir /
analyzed: mdor ni tshul re re dang / gnyis gnyis pa'ang zhes pa 'dir /
translated: In brief, there is one mode and also two modes,üîΩand so on.

original: 'ang gi sgras de sdud pa'i don can du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'ang gi sgras de sdud pa'i don can du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the word also should be viewed as having the meaning of including those.

original: gzhan rnams na re tshul med pa nye bar ma bkod de /
analyzed: gzhan rnams na re tshul med pa nye bar ma bkod de /
translated: Others say that the mode does not occur without the object of negation,

original: rtags @97b ltar snang ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags @97b ltar snang ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no mere semblance of a reason.

original: gang phyir gang du tshul gyi phyogs gcig pa can yod pa de ni der snang bzhin pas blo phyin ci log tu byed do zhes pas de kho na 'dir brjod par bya ba'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gang phyir gang du tshul gyi phyogs gcig pa can yod pa de ni der snang bzhin pas blo phyin ci log tu byed do zhes pas de kho na 'dir brjod par bya ba'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Since it is said that wherever there is a one-sided mode, it is that which appears there and causes the mind to be mistaken, therefore that is to be stated here.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can no zhes bshad zin la /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba ni chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can no zhes bshad zin la /
translated: It has been explained that the object of inference is a subject that is distinguished by a property.

original: gang rnams rnam pa gzhan du 'dod pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa bsal bar bya ba'i ched du dgod de /
analyzed: gang rnams rnam pa gzhan du 'dod pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa bsal bar bya ba'i ched du dgod de /
translated: For the sake of refuting the assertions of those who assert otherwise, he sets forth:

original: 'di la ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, etc.

original: mi 'khrul pas zhes pa gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: mi 'khrul pas zhes pa gtan tshigs so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of non-erroneousness‚Äù is the reason.

original: gang gis gang la mi 'khrul bar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de de'i bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis gang la mi 'khrul bar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de de'i bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is not to be stated as non-erroneous with regard to something is not the probandum of that,

original: dper na du ba'i chu bzhin /
analyzed: dper na du ba'i chu bzhin /
translated: like, for example, the water of smoke.

original: gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang mi 'khrul par brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa ldog pa can rang bzhin du sems so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang mi 'khrul par brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa ldog pa can rang bzhin du sems so //
translated: The reason also is not to be stated as non-erroneous with regard to the probandum, he thinks, because of the contrapositive, which is the nature of the reason.

original: grub nyid phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: grub nyid phyir zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of being established‚Äù is the reason.

original: gang grub par bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang grub par bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is established is not to be established,

original: dper na me dro'o zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na me dro'o zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: like, for example, ‚Äúfire is hot.‚Äù

original: chos dang chos can 'ba' zhig pa dag kyang grub pa'o zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: chos dang chos can 'ba' zhig pa dag kyang grub pa'o zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mere property and the mere possessor of the property are also established‚Äù is the statement of the contradictory nature.

original: chos la gtan tshigs grub na ni //
analyzed: chos la gtan tshigs grub na ni //
translated: ‚ÄúIf the reason is established with regard to the property,‚Äù etc.

original: zhes pa gang zhig chos 'ba' zhig pa bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa des ni /
analyzed: zhes pa gang zhig chos 'ba' zhig pa bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa des ni /
translated: Whoever wishes to establish a mere property to be proven

original: nges par de kho na la rtags blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: nges par de kho na la rtags blta bar bya ste /
translated: must definitely observe the reason in that alone,

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise it would not be understood.

original: gang phyir gzhan du rigs pa'i rtags kyis gzhan rtogs par 'gyur ba ni med do //
analyzed: gang phyir gzhan du rigs pa'i rtags kyis gzhan rtogs par 'gyur ba ni med do //
translated: Because it is not the case that one understands something else by means of a reason that is something else.

original: ha cang thal bar gyur na mi rung ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar gyur na mi rung ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: It would follow that there would be an unacceptable overextension.

original: de las kyang rtags 'dzin pa'i dus kho na ni rtags can yang rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de las kyang rtags 'dzin pa'i dus kho na ni rtags can yang rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Moreover, at the time of apprehending the reason, the property possessor is also understood,

original: gzhan ci zhig rjes su dpag par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan ci zhig rjes su dpag par bya ste /
translated: so what else is there to infer?

original: gang gi don du 'brel pa dran bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi don du 'brel pa dran bya ba'o //
translated: For what purpose would one remember the relation?

original: ci ste me dang 'brel ba'i sa phyogs su zhes pa'i 'brel pa smos pa ni ha cang thal ba yongs su spang ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: ci ste me dang 'brel ba'i sa phyogs su zhes pa'i 'brel pa smos pa ni ha cang thal ba yongs su spang ba'i ched du'o //
translated: If one says that the mention of the relation in ‚Äúin a place related to fire‚Äù is for the purpose of completely avoiding overextension,

original: phyogs de kho na me dang ldan pa nyid du mi 'dod pa ci yin zhes pa'i kho na'i sgra ni chos 'ba' zhig pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid rnam par gcad pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: phyogs de kho na me dang ldan pa nyid du mi 'dod pa ci yin zhes pa'i kho na'i sgra ni chos 'ba' zhig pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid rnam par gcad pa'i ched du'o //
translated: Why is it not accepted that only that direction is endowed with fire? The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the purpose of excluding the probandum as a mere property.

original: de ltar chos 'ba' zhig pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid na rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar chos 'ba' zhig pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid na rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not logical to have a probandum that is a mere property.

original: gal te chos can 'di'i rten nyid du 'dod pa ma yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te chos can 'di'i rten nyid du 'dod pa ma yin na'o //
translated: If it is not accepted as the very basis of the subject,

original: gzhan du na chos can 'ga' zhig la rtags nye bar dmigs pa der gzhi la brten par bya bzhin pa yin na tshogs pa kho na bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na chos can 'ga' zhig la rtags nye bar dmigs pa der gzhi la brten par bya bzhin pa yin na tshogs pa kho na bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then when the mere property is observed as the evidence in relation to some subject, the collection itself would be the probandum.

original: de'i phyir de kho na 'dod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na 'dod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, only that should be accepted as the probandum.

original: nges par @98a * //
analyzed: nges par @98a * //
translated: It is certain that

original: sbyor ba las kyang 'di 'di ltar kho na khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba las kyang 'di 'di ltar kho na khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: in the application, only that should be accepted.

original: chos tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni 'di'i yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: chos tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni 'di'i yod pa nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur la /
translated: If the mere property were the probandum, then its existence would be the probandum.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: But that is illogical,

original: de grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because that is already established.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: What is said?

original: me yod pa nyid du ma rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o//
analyzed: me yod pa nyid du ma rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o//
translated: It is not that the existence of fire is not understood.

original: de 'dis gang grub pa de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rang bzhin 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de 'dis gang grub pa de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rang bzhin 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: That which is established by this is not to be established, and so on, as was previously explained.

original: 'brel pa la yang gnyis yod min //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: 'brel pa la yang gnyis yod min // zhes pa la /
translated: There is no relation in the two.

original: gnyis ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos so //
analyzed: gnyis ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos so //
translated: The two are the property to be established and the property that establishes.

original: me dang sa phyogs kyi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa la me dang du ba dag yod pa ma yin pas te /
analyzed: me dang sa phyogs kyi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa la me dang du ba dag yod pa ma yin pas te /
translated: There is no relation of the nature of inherence in fire and the place of earth, because fire and smoke do not exist.

original: gal te de la gnyis med pas ci'i phyir de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de la gnyis med pas ci'i phyir de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is asked why, since there are not two in that, it would not be the property to be established,

original: gsungs pa / 'di ltar yang byed ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'di ltar yang byed ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIn this way, also, the agent,‚Äù and so on.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i dus na gang du de la rjes su dpag par bya ba la mchog tu snyeg pa'i sgra dag gis rjes su dpog par byed na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i dus na gang du de la rjes su dpag par bya ba la mchog tu snyeg pa'i sgra dag gis rjes su dpog par byed na /
translated: When there is an inference, if the object to be inferred is inferred by means of words that are directed toward it,

original: de la gal te sa phyogs bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de la gal te sa phyogs bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the place is to be established,

original: de dag gis de la so sor nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur la gzhan du na rang gi sgras nges par bstan pa'i me dang du ba dag dang yul phyogs dag kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis de la so sor nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur la gzhan du na rang gi sgras nges par bstan pa'i me dang du ba dag dang yul phyogs dag kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: then they would be applied to it individually. Otherwise, fire and smoke that are indicated by their own words and the place would not be inferred.

original: 'brel pa la yang gnyis yod min //
analyzed: 'brel pa la yang gnyis yod min //
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúNor is there a relation in the two,‚Äù

original: zhes pas / de dag yul med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pas / de dag yul med par 'gyur ro //
translated: those would be without an object.

original: de 'dis ni gang du me dang du ba dag yod pa ma yin pa de ni du bas rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dis ni gang du me dang du ba dag yod pa ma yin pa de ni du bas rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: This shows that where fire and smoke do not exist, that is not to be inferred by smoke.

original: chu bzhin 'brel pa la'ang /
analyzed: chu bzhin 'brel pa la'ang /
translated: Like water,

original: me dang du ba dag yod pa ma yin no zhes pa 'gal bas khyab pa gsungs so //
analyzed: me dang du ba dag yod pa ma yin no zhes pa 'gal bas khyab pa gsungs so //
translated: in a relation, fire and smoke do not exist. Thus he states the pervasion by contradiction.

original: drug pa'i sgra ru 'gyur zhes pa 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pa na me'i sgra drug pa'i mtha' can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: drug pa'i sgra ru 'gyur zhes pa 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pa na me'i sgra drug pa'i mtha' can du 'gyur te /
translated: When one wishes to state the relation, the word fire would have a sixth case ending,

original: dper na me'i reg pa dro'o zhes pa 'di bzhin /
analyzed: dper na me'i reg pa dro'o zhes pa 'di bzhin /
translated: like this example: ‚ÄúThe heat of fire.‚Äù

original: me ni 'dir zhes dang po'i mtha' can du thos pas te /
analyzed: me ni 'dir zhes dang po'i mtha' can du thos pas te /
translated: Since one hears fire with an affix indicating the first case,

original: de'i phyir 'dir 'brel pa brjod par 'dod par rtogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir 'brel pa brjod par 'dod par rtogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: therefore it is not to be understood that the relation is intended to be stated here.

original: 'o na 'di rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i skabs ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na 'di rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i skabs ma yin nam /
translated: But isn't this the context of inference for oneself?

original: de la drug pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la drug pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the implication of the sixth case?

original: 'di ni skyon ma yin te gzhan gyi don rjes su dpag par drug pa'i sgra med pas 'brel pa med pas gsal bar nye bar dmigs nas rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par yang rtogs par byed do//
analyzed: 'di ni skyon ma yin te gzhan gyi don rjes su dpag par drug pa'i sgra med pas 'brel pa med pas gsal bar nye bar dmigs nas rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par yang rtogs par byed do//
translated: This is not a fault, because in inference for others the sixth case is not used, so the relation is not clearly observed. It is understood that it is also for inference for oneself.

original: @98b des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: @98b des 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: That is explained as follows:

original: gang du me'i sgra dang po'i mtha' can der 'brel pa rab tu sbyor ba can brjod par 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du me'i sgra dang po'i mtha' can der 'brel pa rab tu sbyor ba can brjod par 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: Where the word 'fire' has an affix indicating the first case, the relation is not intended to be stated there.

original: dper na 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pa med pa na rab tu sbyar ba'i me'i sgra la bzhin /
analyzed: dper na 'brel pa brjod par 'dod pa med pa na rab tu sbyar ba'i me'i sgra la bzhin /
translated: For example, like the word 'fire' used without the intention to state the relation.

original: 'dir me'i zhes pa 'dir yang me'i sgra ni /
analyzed: 'dir me'i zhes pa 'dir yang me'i sgra ni /
translated: Here, the word 'fire' is also like that.

original: dang po'i mtha' can no zhes pa /
analyzed: dang po'i mtha' can no zhes pa /
translated: The first has an affix.

original: 'bras bu dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is contradictory to the effect.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is possible here.

original: gnas gzhi'i rnam par dbye ba kho nas 'brel pa bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: gnas gzhi'i rnam par dbye ba kho nas 'brel pa bshad pa yin te /
translated: The relation is explained only by the division of the locus.

original: des na drug par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: des na drug par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ga las she na /
translated: Therefore, how is it that this is the consequence of the sixth?

original: de lta na gang gi tshe sgra mi rtag ces pa chos dang chos can dag dang po'i mtha' can dag gi sbyor ba yin pa de'i tshe rtog pa can ci yin /
analyzed: de lta na gang gi tshe sgra mi rtag ces pa chos dang chos can dag dang po'i mtha' can dag gi sbyor ba yin pa de'i tshe rtog pa can ci yin /
translated: Thus, when the statement ‚Äúsound is impermanent‚Äù is the application of the property and the subject having the first affix, at that time, what is the thought?

original: 'dir me zhes brjod pa na rten dang brten pa'i dngos po bsgrub par bya ba nyid du rtogs par bya ba nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir me zhes brjod pa na rten dang brten pa'i dngos po bsgrub par bya ba nyid du rtogs par bya ba nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, when ‚Äúfire‚Äù is stated, the supported and the support are not to be understood as the probandum.

original: 'o na ci zhe na me kho na'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na me kho na'o //
translated: Rather, what is it? It is only fire.

original: 'brel pa de yang sa phyogs su bsgrub par bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir tshogs pa de kho na bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes pa 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa de yang sa phyogs su bsgrub par bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir tshogs pa de kho na bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes pa 'ongs pa'o //
translated: And that relation is also the collection itself that is to be proven, because the place is being proven to exist.

original: rang gi chos kyis brjod bya min zhes pa 'brel pa'i ngo bo ni 'brel pa'o zhes dngos po'i ngo bos 'brel pa de 'brel pa'i sgras brjod pa'i phyir dngos po yang 'brel pa can gzhan gyis rigs so zhes pas 'brel pa can gzhan ci zhes bya ba skye
analyzed: rang gi chos kyis brjod bya min zhes pa 'brel pa'i ngo bo ni 'brel pa'o zhes dngos po'i ngo bos 'brel pa de 'brel pa'i sgras brjod pa'i phyir dngos po yang 'brel pa can gzhan gyis rigs so zhes pas 'brel pa can gzhan ci zhes bya ba skye
translated: So what is the other that is related?

original: zhing / ci zhig gi 'brel ba yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhing / ci zhig gi 'brel ba yin zhes pa'o //
translated: And to what is it related?

original: de las kyang 'brel pa can kho na der 'gyur ro zhes pas rang gi ngo bos 'brel pa can brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang 'brel pa can kho na der 'gyur ro zhes pas rang gi ngo bos 'brel pa can brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And since it is just the related thing that would be so, the related thing is not to be expressed by virtue of its own nature.

original: de ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba yang ma yin zhes pas khas blangs dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba yang ma yin zhes pas khas blangs dang 'gal ba gsungs so //
translated: And since it is not to be inferred either, he states the contradiction with his own doctrine.

original: gang phyir phyogs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pas rjes su dpag bya brjod bya nyid du khas blangs la ;
analyzed: gang phyir phyogs kyi tshig sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pas rjes su dpag bya brjod bya nyid du khas blangs la ;
translated: Since he accepts the thesis statement as the proof, he accepts that the inferendum is to be expressed.

original: de 'brel pa rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid na nyams so //
analyzed: de 'brel pa rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid na nyams so //
translated: And if that is related, the inferendum is lost.

original: gal te sgras brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te sgras brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: don gyis smos 'gyur zhes pa /
analyzed: don gyis smos 'gyur zhes pa /
translated: It is understood by implication.

original: 'di na me zhes me'i gzhi'i dngos pos sa phyogs sgras rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di na me zhes me'i gzhi'i dngos pos sa phyogs sgras rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúplace‚Äù makes one understand the basis of fire by the thing that is the basis of fire.

original: me dang ldan pa nyid yod na yangs phyogs ni gzhi byed par nus pa ste /
analyzed: me dang ldan pa nyid yod na yangs phyogs ni gzhi byed par nus pa ste /
translated: If there is the mere possession of fire, then the place is able to serve as the basis.

original: de'i phyir de kho na rtogs par bya'i /
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na rtogs par bya'i /
translated: Therefore, that alone is to be understood.

original: ldan pa ni bar du chod pa can nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa ma yin no zhes pas don gyis smos pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ldan pa ni bar du chod pa can nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa ma yin no zhes pas don gyis smos pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: The possession is not understood because it is obstructed. Thus it is said to be understood by implication.

original: gzhi byed nus pa rang gi 'bras bus drang bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhi byed nus pa rang gi 'bras bus drang bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because the basis that is able to serve as the basis is to be inferred by its effect.

original: 'o na de lta na rjes su dpag par @99a * //üîΩbya ba kho nar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na rjes su dpag par @99a * // bya ba kho nar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Well, in that case, it would be an inference.

original: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub par bya ba nyid la 'jug pa las 'das pa de brjod par 'dod kyi /
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub par bya ba nyid la 'jug pa las 'das pa de brjod par 'dod kyi /
translated: We assert that the object to be inferred is beyond the scope of the reason, such as smoke.

original: rtags can ma lus pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid la 'jug pa las 'das na ni ma yin no zhes pas 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: rtags can ma lus pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid la 'jug pa las 'das na ni ma yin no zhes pas 'gal ba med do //
translated: But if it is not engaged in the object of proof, then it is not.

original: gang yang 'bras bu rjes su dpag par bya ba ni 'brel pa'o zhes bshad pa de yang rang gi 'bras bus rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir brjod kyi /
analyzed: gang yang 'bras bu rjes su dpag par bya ba ni 'brel pa'o zhes bshad pa de yang rang gi 'bras bus rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir brjod kyi /
translated: And what was said, ‚ÄúThe effect is to be inferred because of the relation,‚Äù that is said because it is to be inferred by its own effect.

original: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyis rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not because it is to be inferred by the evidence of smoke, etc.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gal te yang 'brel pa yod du chug mod /
analyzed: gal te yang 'brel pa yod du chug mod /
translated: Even if a relation were possible,

original: de rang gi 'bras bu kho nas rjes su dpag par bya'o /
analyzed: de rang gi 'bras bu kho nas rjes su dpag par bya'o /
translated: it would be inferred only by its own effect.

original: du ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It would not be by another, such as smoke, etc.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: de du bas rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de du bas rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not to be inferred by smoke.

original: gtan tshigs snga ma rnams las zhes pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs snga ma rnams las zhes pa /
translated: From the previous reasons

original: 'brel pa la yang gnyis yod min //
analyzed: 'brel pa la yang gnyis yod min //
translated: There is no relation in two

original: drug pa thos 'gyur de ldan la'o //
analyzed: drug pa thos 'gyur de ldan la'o //
translated: In the sixth, it is heard to be possessed.

original: brjod bya min zhes pa 'di rnams las so //
analyzed: brjod bya min zhes pa 'di rnams las so //
translated: The words not to be expressed are in apposition to that.

original: 'di ni rtags dang 'brel pa'ang min //
analyzed: 'di ni rtags dang 'brel pa'ang min //
translated: This is not related to the reason.

original: zhes pa med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pas rtags dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pas rtags dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not related to the reason by the relation that has the nature of not occurring without.

original: gang zhig gang dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid rab tu bstan pa med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid rab tu bstan pa med pa de ni /
translated: That which is not taught to be the invariable concomitance of something

original: des rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te /üîΩdper na du bas chu bzhin /
analyzed: des rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin te / dper na du bas chu bzhin /
translated: is not to be inferred by that.üîΩFor example, water is not to be inferred by smoke.

original: du ba yang 'brel pa dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid rab tu bstan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: du ba yang 'brel pa dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid rab tu bstan pa ma yin no //
translated: Smoke is not taught to be the invariable concomitance of water.

original: 'gal bas khyab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gal bas khyab par bya'o //
translated: It is pervaded by contradiction.

original: rab tu ma bstan pa na don gzhan ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa dang med na mi 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu ma bstan pa na don gzhan ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa dang med na mi 'byung ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: When it is not taught, the other object is not its effect and is not the invariable absence of its absence.

original: 'di med de zhes pa la sogs pas ma nges par smras so //
analyzed: 'di med de zhes pa la sogs pas ma nges par smras so //
translated: He says that the statement it does not exist is indeterminate.

original: gzhan du zhes pa spyi yis tshang bang la sogs pa thams cad du'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes pa spyi yis tshang bang la sogs pa thams cad du'o //
translated: The word elsewhere means in all places, such as in a kitchen.

original: de ci'i don du ston par byed ce na /
analyzed: de ci'i don du ston par byed ce na /
translated: For what purpose does he teach this?

original: sa phyogs la sogs pa gang du me la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod pa de la rab tu grub pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i rtags ni me la sogs pa'i chos gang dang de med na mi 'byung bar gyur cing /
analyzed: sa phyogs la sogs pa gang du me la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod pa de la rab tu grub pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i rtags ni me la sogs pa'i chos gang dang de med na mi 'byung bar gyur cing /
translated: In whatever place, such as a hill station, one desires to establish fire, there the sign, such as smoke, which is well established, and the property of fire, which is invariably concomitant with it,

original: de dang 'brel pa'i sa phyogs la sogs pa'i chos can rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu'i don to //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i sa phyogs la sogs pa'i chos can rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu'i don to //
translated: are understood to be the property of the subject, such as the hill station. This is the meaning.

original: gang gzhan du zhes pa /
analyzed: gang gzhan du zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú In another place‚Äù means

original: du ba dang ldan pa'i yul phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba dang ldan pa'i yul phyir ro //
translated: in a place possessing smoke.

original: de gzhan du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de gzhan du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú That in another place‚Äù and so on.

original: gzhan du'i sgra 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba'i @99b chos can sa phyogs la sogs pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: gzhan du'i sgra 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba'i @99b chos can sa phyogs la sogs pa la 'jug go //
translated: The word ‚Äúanother‚Äù applies to the subject, such as the hill station, which is the probandum.

original: du ba tsam mthong ba na yang zhes pa'i tsam gyi sgra ni me mthong ba bcad pa'i don te /
analyzed: du ba tsam mthong ba na yang zhes pa'i tsam gyi sgra ni me mthong ba bcad pa'i don te /
translated: ‚Äú Even when one sees only smoke‚Äù ‚Äî the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù means to exclude seeing fire.

original: me mthong ba med na yang zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: me mthong ba med na yang zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means ‚Äúeven without seeing fire.‚Äù

original: yang na tsam gyi sgras 'di ston te /
analyzed: yang na tsam gyi sgras 'di ston te /
translated: Or, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù teaches this:

original: chos can rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa med par yang zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chos can rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa med par yang zhes pa'o //
translated: The subject is taught to be concomitant with the reason, even without the word ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don te /
analyzed: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don te /
translated: This is the condensed meaning:

original: chos can gyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid na yang du ba med dang med na mi 'byung ba gang yin pa tshang bang la sogs par rab tu bstan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid na yang du ba med dang med na mi 'byung ba gang yin pa tshang bang la sogs par rab tu bstan par bya ba ste /
translated: When the subject is qualified by the property to be proven, the subject is to be inferred. The presence of smoke and the invariable concomitance are to be taught in a kitchen, and so on.

original: de ni sa phyogs me dang ldan pa nyid du rab tu sgrub pa'i ched du thabs kho na'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: de ni sa phyogs me dang ldan pa nyid du rab tu sgrub pa'i ched du thabs kho na'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: That is the only method for proving that the place is endowed with fire.

original: de ltar gang na du ba yod pa de na me'o zhes nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar gang na du ba yod pa de na me'o zhes nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is ascertained that where there is smoke, there is fire.

original: gzhan du du ba tsam mthong nas yul phyogs me dang ldan par rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan du du ba tsam mthong nas yul phyogs me dang ldan par rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Otherwise, having seen just smoke, one would not understand that the place is endowed with fire.

original: de'i phyir chos dang med na mi 'byung ba gdon mi za bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos dang med na mi 'byung ba gdon mi za bar bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the property and the invariable concomitance must be taught without doubt.

original: chos can dang ni khyad par dang ngam spyi dang med na mi 'byung ba bstan par bya ba yin grang na /
analyzed: chos can dang ni khyad par dang ngam spyi dang med na mi 'byung ba bstan par bya ba yin grang na /
translated: If the subject, the property, the distinction, the universal, and the invariable concomitance are to be taught,

original: de la re zhig khyad par dang rab tu bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig khyad par dang rab tu bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: First, the distinction and the object of demonstration are not so.

original: de gzhan du mi 'byung ba nyid kyis na mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de gzhan du mi 'byung ba nyid kyis na mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible, since it does not occur elsewhere.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it were otherwise, etc.‚Äù

original: chos can spyi dang ni med na mi 'byung ba srid mod /
analyzed: chos can spyi dang ni med na mi 'byung ba srid mod /
translated: The universal of the subject and the possibility of the invariable relation are indeed so.

original: de dang rab tu bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang rab tu bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the object of demonstration.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: rten spyi dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rten spyi dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe universal of the substratum, etc.‚Äù

original: brten par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid bstan par bya ba na rten dang yang bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: brten par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid bstan par bya ba na rten dang yang bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: When the object of demonstration, the invariable relation, is taught, the substratum is also taught,

original: rten ni brten pa'i dbang po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rten ni brten pa'i dbang po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the substratum is the sense faculty of the support.

original: yang na gang na du ba yod pa de na me'o zhes pa 'dis du ba med tsam dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid bshad pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yang na gang na du ba yod pa de na me'o zhes pa 'dis du ba med tsam dang med na mi 'byung ba nyid bshad pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Or, by this statement ‚ÄúWhere there is smoke, there is fire,‚Äù the mere absence of smoke and the invariable relation are not explained.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Then what?

original: rten gyi spyis khyad par du byas pa dang ngo //
analyzed: rten gyi spyis khyad par du byas pa dang ngo //
translated: The universal of the substratum is distinguished.

original: de'i phyir rten gyi spyi dang yang de bstan pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rten gyi spyi dang yang de bstan pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the general rule of the basis is taught just by that.

original: 'brel pa dang ni rnam pa thams cad du med na mi 'byung ba mi ston pa kho na'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: 'brel pa dang ni rnam pa thams cad du med na mi 'byung ba mi ston pa kho na'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: And the relation is taught just by the invariable concomitance.

original: mi mnyam pa nye bar bkod pa zhes pa'o//
analyzed: mi mnyam pa nye bar bkod pa zhes pa'o//
translated: This is called the ‚Äúuncommon application.‚Äù

original: de ltar spyis kyang gtan tshigs su mngon par 'dod pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid mi ston la /
