analyzed: de ltar spyis kyang gtan tshigs su mngon par 'dod pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid mi ston la /
translated: Thus, even by the general rule, if the invariable concomitance is not stated,

original: de mi mthun phyogs la 'jug pa yang ma yin no zhes pas ma nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de mi mthun phyogs la 'jug pa yang ma yin no zhes pas ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: and that does not occur in the discordant side, it is not uncertain.

original: chos la'ang rnam par dpyad pa gzhan //
analyzed: chos la'ang rnam par dpyad pa gzhan //
translated: Also, with regard to the property, there is another analysis.

original: zhes pa snga ma gang ni rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa rnam par dpyad ba bshad @100a * //
analyzed: zhes pa snga ma gang ni rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa rnam par dpyad ba bshad @100a * //
translated: The analysis of the understanding of the inferential object has been explained above.

original: cing / da ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su gyur pa rnam par dpyod cing rtags su gyur pa yang rab tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: cing / da ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su gyur pa rnam par dpyod cing rtags su gyur pa yang rab tu bstan par bya'o //
translated: Now, the analysis of the property to be established should be taught, and the property that is the reason should also be indicated.

original: tu'i sgra ni rnam par dpyad pa de kho na srid par gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: tu'i sgra ni rnam par dpyad pa de kho na srid par gsal bar byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù clarifies that the analysis is just possible.

original: rnam par dpyad pa de yang gang rtags dang rtags can dag chos can bzhin du chos du ma can dag ste /
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa de yang gang rtags dang rtags can dag chos can bzhin du chos du ma can dag ste /
translated: Moreover, that analysis is of the reason and the property-possessor, like the subject, as having many properties.

original: dper na me dang du ba dag lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na me dang du ba dag lta bu ste /
translated: For example, like fire and smoke.

original: de kho na la rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i cha shas nges par byed pa'i ched du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na la rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i cha shas nges par byed pa'i ched du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is for the sake of ascertaining the aspects of the object of knowledge and the means of knowledge in reality.

original: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: But not for the properties of being produced, impermanent, and so on.

original: de la du ma'i chos nyid mi srid pa'i phyir cha shas ci zhig gis rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i dngos po yin zhes dogs pa mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la du ma'i chos nyid mi srid pa'i phyir cha shas ci zhig gis rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i dngos po yin zhes dogs pa mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: For in that case, since the nature of being many is not possible, it is absolutely impossible to doubt by what part the object of knowledge and the means of knowledge are.

original: rjes 'brel rnam gcod pa zhes pa /
analyzed: rjes 'brel rnam gcod pa zhes pa /
translated: The so-called connection is the exclusion of what is not connected.

original: rjes su sbrel bar byed pas na 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su sbrel bar byed pas na 'brel pa ste /
translated: Because it connects, it is a connection.

original: cha shas gang gis mi rtogs par byed pa rdzas nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cha shas gang gis mi rtogs par byed pa rdzas nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: By what part it is not the means of knowledge, such as substance and so on.

original: de mi mthun phyogs gzhan las rnam par gcod cing rnam bar ldog pa rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de mi mthun phyogs gzhan las rnam par gcod cing rnam bar ldog pa rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the means of knowledge that excludes and turns away from other discordant factors.

original: rjes su 'brel pa'i khyad par rnams kyang ci zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa'i khyad par rnams kyang ci zhe na /
translated: What are the specific relations?

original: gang med na me mi 'byung ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang med na me mi 'byung ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Those without which fire does not occur.

original: 'o na du ba gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'o na du ba gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: But since smoke is the manifestor,

original: gang rnams med pa du ba mi 'gyur ba zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gang rnams med pa du ba mi 'gyur ba zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: shouldn‚Äôt it be said that those without which smoke does not occur?

original: ci'i phyir 'di skad smras she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di skad smras she na /
translated: Why is it said in this way?

original: don 'di kho na rnam pa 'dis bshad do zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: don 'di kho na rnam pa 'dis bshad do zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: There is no error, since this very meaning is explained by this mode.

original: de ltar ni gang rnams med pas mer mi 'gyur ba de rnams med par du par yang 'gyur pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni gang rnams med pas mer mi 'gyur ba de rnams med par du par yang 'gyur pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: In this way, those without which fire does not occur are just those without which smoke does not occur.

original: yang na gang zhig 'brel pa rnams pa zhes pa du ba kho na'i rjes su 'brel pa rnams zhes sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang na gang zhig 'brel pa rnams pa zhes pa du ba kho na'i rjes su 'brel pa rnams zhes sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Or, that which is the relation is the relations that are just smoke.

original: gang rnams du ba kho na rjes su sbrel bar byed pa de rnams kho na bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa gang rnams med na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang rnams du ba kho na rjes su sbrel bar byed pa de rnams kho na bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa gang rnams med na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Those that are just related to smoke are just those that are taught for the purpose of statement, those without which, etc.

original: gang rnams med na mer mi 'gyur ba de rnams kho na ni du ba rjes su sbrel par byed pas so //
analyzed: gang rnams med na mer mi 'gyur ba de rnams kho na ni du ba rjes su sbrel par byed pas so //
translated: Those alone which, when absent, the fire does not occur, are connected with the smoke.

original: rjes su 'brel pa rnams gzhan las ldog pa rtogs par byed do zhes pa 'di la dper brjod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa rnams gzhan las ldog pa rtogs par byed do zhes pa 'di la dper brjod pa gsungs pa /
translated: The connection is understood as the exclusion from others. In this regard, an example is stated:

original: dper na me'i me ma yin pa las ldog pa tsam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na me'i me ma yin pa las ldog pa tsam zhes pa'o //
translated: For example, the fire is the mere exclusion of non-fire.

original: ci'i phyir ldog pa tsam go bar byed kyi khyad par ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ldog pa tsam go bar byed kyi khyad par ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is the mere exclusion understood, and not the distinction? It is said:

original: rang dang 'brel pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang dang 'brel pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: From the connection with itself and from the conformity, etc.

original: 'di ni byed pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: This is the causal reason,

original: rtags ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the logical reason.

original: de ltar ni 'di zhes pas de dang 'brel pa @100b dang rjes su mthun pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'di zhes pas de dang 'brel pa @100b dang rjes su mthun pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: In this way, this states the connection with that and the conformity.

original: me med pa thams cad la ma mthong zhes pa 'dis ldog pa gtso bo nyid du mi mthun phyogs la thams cad du ma mthong bas 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: me med pa thams cad la ma mthong zhes pa 'dis ldog pa gtso bo nyid du mi mthun phyogs la thams cad du ma mthong bas 'chad par byed do //
translated: By not seen in all cases of the absence of fire, he explains the exclusion as the principal factor, by the non-observation of the counter-example in all cases.

original: gzhan la yang mthong ngo zhes pa'i /
analyzed: gzhan la yang mthong ngo zhes pa'i /
translated: And by seen in another,

original: yang gi sbras ni 'ba' zhig tu ma mthong yang zhes gsal bar byed pas rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: yang gi sbras ni 'ba' zhig tu ma mthong yang zhes gsal bar byed pas rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin pa nyid du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the verse makes it clear that the exclusion is not only seen as the principal factor, but also as the secondary factor.

original: de ltar gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba nye bar bsags pa can gyi ldog pa gtso bo 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba nye bar bsags pa can gyi ldog pa gtso bo 'brel pa yin la /
translated: Thus, because the principal factor of the exclusion is the accumulation of the positive concomitance, the connection is the principal factor.

original: de yang spyi bo nas srid kyi /
analyzed: de yang spyi bo nas srid kyi /
translated: And that is possible from the top.

original: khyad par dang ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par dang ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: But not from the particular. Therefore,

original: de dang rjes su mthun pa las ni ldog pa'i sgo nas 'dir me kho na ste /
analyzed: de dang rjes su mthun pa las ni ldog pa'i sgo nas 'dir me kho na ste /
translated: from what is consistent with that, here it is only fire that is excluded,

original: me ma yin pa ni mi 'gyur ro zhes me ma yin pa las ldog pa tsam rtogs par byed kyi khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: me ma yin pa ni mi 'gyur ro zhes me ma yin pa las ldog pa tsam rtogs par byed kyi khyad par ma yin no //
translated: not what is not fire. Thus, it causes the understanding of the mere exclusion of what is not fire, but not the particular.

original: ji ltar yang me nyid dang 'brel ba de ltar rdzas nyid dang yon tan can nyid la sogs pa rnams dang yang ngo zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar yang me nyid dang 'brel ba de ltar rdzas nyid dang yon tan can nyid la sogs pa rnams dang yang ngo zhes pa ste /
translated: Just as it is connected with fire, in the same way it is also with substance, quality, etc.

original: de rnams kyang rdzas ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa las ldog pa kho na rtogs par byed pas so //
analyzed: de rnams kyang rdzas ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa las ldog pa kho na rtogs par byed pas so //
translated: Because those also cause the understanding of the mere exclusion of what is not substance, etc.

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'o zhes pa 'di la gtan tshigs gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'o zhes pa 'di la gtan tshigs gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: The other reasons are stated:

original: yon tan nyid dri dri zhim pa //
analyzed: yon tan nyid dri dri zhim pa //
translated: The quality itself is smell, and

original: de'i bye brag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bye brag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: by its particularities, etc.

original: gcig 'phel bas zhes pa re re 'phel pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gcig 'phel bas zhes pa re re 'phel pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: By the increase of one, means by the increase of each.

original: yon tan nyid kyi rdzas ma yin pa las zhes pa 'di ni rdzas te yon tan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes yon tan nyid kyi rdzas ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i autpala sogs pa la bya ba ste /
analyzed: yon tan nyid kyi rdzas ma yin pa las zhes pa 'di ni rdzas te yon tan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes yon tan nyid kyi rdzas ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i autpala sogs pa la bya ba ste /
translated: The substance that is not the quality itself is this, because it is a substance and a quality. This excludes the lotus, etc., that are not the substance of the quality itself.

original: de ltar ni de thams cad du rdzas med pa la ma mthong zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni de thams cad du rdzas med pa la ma mthong zhing /
translated: In this way, it is not seen everywhere that the substance does not exist,

original: rdzas la mthong bas so //
analyzed: rdzas la mthong bas so //
translated: but it is seen in substances.

original: 'dir rdzas ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa na /
analyzed: 'dir rdzas ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa na /
translated: Here, when the non-substance is excluded,

original: dang pos 'phel ba gcig yod la /
analyzed: dang pos 'phel ba gcig yod la /
translated: the first has one increase.

original: gang la ltos pas dris shig /'phel bas rnam par gcod par byed de /
analyzed: gang la ltos pas dris shig /'phel bas rnam par gcod par byed de /
translated: By which one is relied upon, ask. It excludes by increase.

original: de rab tu bstan pa'i don du ni yon tan nyid kyi rdzas ma yin pa las zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de rab tu bstan pa'i don du ni yon tan nyid kyi rdzas ma yin pa las zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it says, ‚Äúfrom that which is not a substance, by the quality itself.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir yon tan nyid kyi yang gcig 'phel bas rnam par gcod par byed pa'i ngor yan lag gi dngos po yod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yon tan nyid kyi yang gcig 'phel bas rnam par gcod par byed pa'i ngor yan lag gi dngos po yod do //
translated: Therefore, by the increase of the quality itself, the existence of the state of a part is distinguished.

original: gal te des rdzas ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa rnam par sgrub par byed na de lta na dris shig /'phel bas rnam par gcod pa byed kyi rnam pa gzhan du na ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te des rdzas ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa rnam par sgrub par byed na de lta na dris shig /'phel bas rnam par gcod pa byed kyi rnam pa gzhan du na ma yin no //
translated: If that establishes the distinction of that which is not a substance, then ask: it is distinguished by increase, not in any other way.

original: de lta na yang tshigs su bcad par zlas dbye'i tshig bsdu'i mthar gyur pa nyid dang yon tan nyid kyi sgra mi 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang tshigs su bcad par zlas dbye'i tshig bsdu'i mthar gyur pa nyid dang yon tan nyid kyi sgra mi 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Even so, in the verse, the words ‚Äúend‚Äù and ‚Äúquality‚Äù are not contradictory in the compound.

original: tshig gzhan dan @101a * //
analyzed: tshig gzhan dan @101a * //
translated: Because the other words

original: nus pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: have the same capacity.

original: dri nyid kyis sa las gyur pa ma yin pa dang / rdzas ma yin pa las kyang ngo zhes pas 'di ni sa las byung ba dang rdzas kyang ste /
analyzed: dri nyid kyis sa las gyur pa ma yin pa dang / rdzas ma yin pa las kyang ngo zhes pas 'di ni sa las byung ba dang rdzas kyang ste /
translated: By the word ‚Äúsmell,‚Äù it is not only earth, but also that which is not a substance. Therefore, this is both an element and a substance.

original: dri nyid kyi phyir zhes pas sa las gyur pa ma yin pa dang rdzas ma yin pa las kyang rnam par gcod par bya'o //
analyzed: dri nyid kyi phyir zhes pas sa las gyur pa ma yin pa dang rdzas ma yin pa las kyang rnam par gcod par bya'o //
translated: The phrase because of the very odor eliminates that it is not derived from the earth element and that it is not a substance.

original: dri zhim pa nyid kyis dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba med pa las zhes pa dri bzhin du 'di ni dri zhim pa nyid kyi phyir zhes dri zhim pa nyid kyis snga ma dag dang dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba med pa las kyang rnam par gcod pa
analyzed: dri zhim pa nyid kyis dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba med pa las zhes pa dri bzhin du 'di ni dri zhim pa nyid kyi phyir zhes dri zhim pa nyid kyis snga ma dag dang dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba med pa las kyang rnam par gcod pa
translated: Since pleasant odor is not common to the pleasant odor, it is eliminated by the pleasant odor itself, as in the case of odor. The phrase this is because of the very pleasant odor means that it is eliminated by the pleasant odor itself, since the pleasant odor is not common to the previous odors.

original: byed de / dri'i bye brag dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba spyi ni dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba ste /
analyzed: byed de / dri'i bye brag dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba spyi ni dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba ste /
translated: The general odor that is common to the various specific odors is the common odor.

original: dri tsam 'dir brjod par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dri tsam 'dir brjod par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Here, mere odor is what is intended to be expressed.

original: dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de skad ces bshad de /
analyzed: dri zhim pa'i thun mong ba yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de skad ces bshad de /
translated: That which does not exist as the common odor is explained in that way.

original: dri zhim pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dri zhim pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a pleasant odor.

original: dri zhim pa'i khyad bar autpala la sogs pa la dri'i bye brag go //
analyzed: dri zhim pa'i khyad bar autpala la sogs pa la dri'i bye brag go //
translated: The specific pleasant odor is the particular odor of the lotus, etc.

original: de ltar rdzas ma yin pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa re re 'phel bas autpala la sogs pa rnams la yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis bya bzhin pa mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rdzas ma yin pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa re re 'phel bas autpala la sogs pa rnams la yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis bya bzhin pa mthong ba'o //
translated: Thus, by the increase of each exclusion of non-substance, etc., the qualities, etc., of the lotus, etc., are seen.

original: de ci ltar na gal te mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa'i sgo nas yin na gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin par rigs she na /
analyzed: de ci ltar na gal te mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa'i sgo nas yin na gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin par rigs she na /
translated: How is it that if it is by the exclusion of the discordant side, the reason is the probans, and not otherwise?

original: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i sgo nas thams cad la thams cad rnams mthong bar byed pa khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i sgo nas thams cad la thams cad rnams mthong bar byed pa khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir rtogs pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because, like the perception, the establishment is by all of everything, there is no difference, and the understanding is the same.

original: de'i phyir ldog pa'i sgo kho nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'o zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa'i sgo kho nas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'o zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted that the reason is the probans only by the exclusion.

original: gang rnams de mi 'dod pa de rnams kyi ngor gsungs pa /üîΩmthong ba bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang rnams de mi 'dod pa de rnams kyi ngor gsungs pa / mthong ba bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For those who do not accept that, it is said:üîΩLike the perception, etc.

original: mthong ba dang mtshungs pa ni mthong ba bzhin te /
analyzed: mthong ba dang mtshungs pa ni mthong ba bzhin te /
translated: Like the perception is like the perception.

original: ji ltar sngar 'brel pa'i dus nas rtags nye bar dmigs pa de ltar gal te rab tu gsal byed na'o zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: ji ltar sngar 'brel pa'i dus nas rtags nye bar dmigs pa de ltar gal te rab tu gsal byed na'o zhes pa'i don te /
translated: It is like that, if it is made very clear.

original: sgrub pa'i sgo nas me 'dir 'gyur ro zhes pas te /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i sgo nas me 'dir 'gyur ro zhes pas te /
translated: By the method of affirmation, this fire is here.

original: ldog pa'i sgo nas 'dir me kho na ste /
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgo nas 'dir me kho na ste /
translated: By the method of negation, it is only fire here.

original: me ma yin pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di ltar ni ma yin no zhes pa'o//
analyzed: me ma yin pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di ltar ni ma yin no zhes pa'o//
translated: It is not not-fire. It is not like that.

original: thams cad du ma mthong ba las rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur zhes rnam par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du ma mthong ba las rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur zhes rnam par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that it is not made very clear by the non-observation of everything.

original: rab gsal 'gyur zhes pa rab tu gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rab gsal 'gyur zhes pa rab tu gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is made very clear by the transformation itself.

original: gal te yang dper na me la mthong ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te yang dper na me la mthong ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If it is like that, for example, fire is seen, etc.

original: gal te 'di ltar khas len na sgrub pa smra ba pos gang gi phyir me kho na la du ba @101b mthong zhing me med pa la ma yin pa de'i phyir rtogs par byed do zhes pa de ltar gyur na dgag pa'i sgo kho nas rab tu gsalüîΩbar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar khas len na sgrub pa smra ba pos gang gi phyir me kho na la du ba @101b mthong zhing me med pa la ma yin pa de'i phyir rtogs par byed do zhes pa de ltar gyur na dgag pa'i sgo kho nas rab tu gsalüîΩbar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is accepted in this way, the proponent of the proof says, ‚ÄúBecause smoke is only seen in fire and not in the absence of fire, therefore it is understood.‚Äù If it were like that, it would be made very clear only by the method of negation.

original: de'i phyir des 'di ltar khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir des 'di ltar khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: Therefore, he should accept this:

original: gang gi phyir med la mthong ba kho na ste mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir med la mthong ba kho na ste mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is seen only in the absence of fire, it is not seen.

original: de'i phyir des de go bar byed do zhes par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir des de go bar byed do zhes par ro //
translated: Therefore, it is understood by that.‚Äù

original: de las kyang rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
analyzed: de las kyang rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
translated: But even from that, it is not clearly understood,

original: gang phyir thams cad du de me la mthong ba ni ma yin pas te /
analyzed: gang phyir thams cad du de me la mthong ba ni ma yin pas te /
translated: because it is not seen everywhere in fire.

original: phyogs dang gnas skabs la sogs pa tha dad pa'i me thams cad la mthong ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs dang gnas skabs la sogs pa tha dad pa'i me thams cad la mthong ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible to see fire in all places and times, etc.

original: gal te yang zhes pas skyon gzhan gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te yang zhes pas skyon gzhan gsungs so //
translated: If, moreover, it is said that

original: gang gi tshe du ba me la mthong ba de'i tshe 'bar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyi gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa kho nar mthong la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe du ba me la mthong ba de'i tshe 'bar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyi gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa kho nar mthong la /
translated: when smoke is seen in fire, then it is seen only as possessing some particularity, such as blazing,

original: de las kyang de rnams kyang gsal bar byed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de las kyang de rnams kyang gsal bar byed par 'gyur na /
translated: and that even from that, those particularities are understood,

original: de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: that is not so.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, mere seeing is not the cause of understanding the object of inference,

original: de yod na yang de med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de yod na yang de med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because even when it exists, it does not exist.

original: 'o na dgag par smra ba pos kyang mthong ba 'dod pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na dgag par smra ba pos kyang mthong ba 'dod pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Well, doesn‚Äôt the proponent of negation also assert that seeing is the cause of understanding?

original: de ltar ni 'bras bu nyid kyis med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir du ba bsreg za'i gtan tshigs yin zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'bras bu nyid kyis med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir du ba bsreg za'i gtan tshigs yin zhing /
translated: In that case, the reason smoke is the cause of fire is because of the invariable concomitance of the effect,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis te /
translated: and the relation of cause and effect is seen and not seen,

original: de ni de dag las 'grub kyi /
analyzed: de ni de dag las 'grub kyi /
translated: because it is established from those,

original: ma mthong ba 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but not from mere non-seeing.

original: gsungs pa / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / gang gi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: To this, the reply is ‚ÄúBecause of what?‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di ston te /
analyzed: 'di ston te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: gang gi phyir du bas me spyi'i tshul gyis gsal bar byed kyi 'bar ba la sogs pa khyad par gyi ngo bos ni ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir du bas me spyi'i tshul gyis gsal bar byed kyi 'bar ba la sogs pa khyad par gyi ngo bos ni ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because smoke clarifies fire by the mode of being smoke, not by the specific nature of blazing and so on,

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po 'grub pa'i ched du bsgrubs pas kyang de kho na 'di'i ngo bo mthong ba'o zhes 'bras bu dang rgyu'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i rgyu nyid du rtogs kyi khyad par gyi ngo bo ni ma yin zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po 'grub pa'i ched du bsgrubs pas kyang de kho na 'di'i ngo bo mthong ba'o zhes 'bras bu dang rgyu'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i rgyu nyid du rtogs kyi khyad par gyi ngo bo ni ma yin zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: But the seeing of the nature of that is understood to be the cause of the establishment of the conventions of effect and cause, not the specific nature.

original: gsal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par mthong ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'i tha snyad du grub pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par mthong ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'i tha snyad du grub pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The seeing of the specific nature of the effect and cause is not the cause of the establishment of the conventions of effect and cause.

original: de med kyang du ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang du ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even when that is absent, smoke is seen.

original: cha shas kyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: cha shas kyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed bar byed par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: But it is produced by a part of the cause.

original: des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par gzung na 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des bskyed par bya ba'i khyad par gzung na 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because if the specific nature produced by that is apprehended, it is accepted.

original: rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po'i spyi khyad par du ma byas pa gzung na ni 'khrul pa'i phyir mi 'dod @102a * //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po'i spyi khyad par du ma byas pa gzung na ni 'khrul pa'i phyir mi 'dod @102a * //
translated: But if the general nature of the produced and producer is apprehended without distinction, it is not accepted because of error.

original: do ; / de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: do ; / de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so.üîΩBut if the specific nature is apprehended, it is not accepted because of error.

original: spyi dngos po gcig kho na gsal ba rnams la de dang tha dad pa'am de dang tha mi dad pa yod la /
analyzed: spyi dngos po gcig kho na gsal ba rnams la de dang tha dad pa'am de dang tha mi dad pa yod la /
translated: In general, a single entity that is manifest in many things is either different from them or not different from them.

original: de yang gsal ba so so la thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir me'i gsal ba gcig kho na la mthong ba 'thad cing /
analyzed: de yang gsal ba so so la thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir me'i gsal ba gcig kho na la mthong ba 'thad cing /
translated: Moreover, because each manifestation is complete in itself, it is tenable that the manifestation of fire is seen in just one thing.

original: de'i phyir thams cad la ma mthong ba'i phyir rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di mi rigs so zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad la ma mthong ba'i phyir rab tu gsal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di mi rigs so zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say that because it is not seen in everything, it is not clearly manifest.

original: gal te yang spyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩgal te yang zhes pa 'dis ni de med pa kho na mod /
analyzed: gal te yang spyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste / gal te yang zhes pa 'dis ni de med pa kho na mod /
translated: If a universal is different from the manifestation,

original: khas blangs nas skyon brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di ston to //
analyzed: khas blangs nas skyon brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di ston to //
translated: it would be perceived separately by the mind.üîΩIf a universal is not different from the manifestation,

original: re zhig me nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes pa gal te gsal ba las gzhan pa'i spyir 'gyur na /
analyzed: re zhig me nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes pa gal te gsal ba las gzhan pa'i spyir 'gyur na /
translated: it would not be permanent.

original: blo la tha dad par snang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: blo la tha dad par snang bar 'gyur la /
translated: If a universal is different from the manifestation, it would be perceived separately by the mind.

original: snang ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba yang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not perceived as separate.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin mi dmigs pas bsal bar byas pa'i yod pa nyid de ni med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin mi dmigs pas bsal bar byas pa'i yod pa nyid de ni med do //
translated: Therefore, that existence which is eliminated by the non-apprehension of intrinsic reality does not exist.

original: gal te gzhan ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan ma yin na /
translated: If it is not different,

original: de lta na yang gsal ba bzhin du /
analyzed: de lta na yang gsal ba bzhin du /
translated: then, in that case, like a manifestation,

original: de spyi kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de spyi kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not be a universal.

original: de lta na yang khas blangs nas /
analyzed: de lta na yang khas blangs nas /
translated: Even so, having accepted that,

original: de mthong ba mi srid par sgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de mthong ba mi srid par sgrub pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: in order to prove that the perception of it is impossible, he says,

original: de yod na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yod na yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúEven if it exists,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang rten du ma'i thun mong ba rten mtha' dag ma bzung ba de ni mthong bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rten du ma'i thun mong ba rten mtha' dag ma bzung ba de ni mthong bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is common to many supports, and which is not apprehended as all the supports, is not capable of being perceived,

original: dper na rten mtha' dag ma bzung ba'i gnyis nyid la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na rten mtha' dag ma bzung ba'i gnyis nyid la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: just like a duality, etc., which is not apprehended as all the supports.

original: me nyid kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: me nyid kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Fire is also like that. This is a contradiction of the pervasion.

original: 'dra ba'i yang ma yin zhes pa rten las tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir 'dra ba ni tha dad pa nye bar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i yang ma yin zhes pa rten las tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir 'dra ba ni tha dad pa nye bar bkod pa'o //
translated: Nor is it similar, because it is not different from the support. Similarity is the arrangement of the different.

original: 'dir yang sbyor ba de kho na brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sbyor ba de kho na brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here also, that very syllogism should be stated.

original: ci ste rten gcig bzung na yang mtha' dag gzung bar bya na /
analyzed: ci ste rten gcig bzung na yang mtha' dag gzung bar bya na /
translated: But if you maintain that the one substratum is apprehended, then all of them are apprehended.

original: de ltar gyur na de'i so so la bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan bzhin du du ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na de'i so so la bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir yon tan bzhin du du ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then, because each would be completely perfect in itself, it would follow that it is manifold, like the qualities.

original: gang gcig la bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs shing de gzhan la yang yod do zhes pa 'di ni srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gcig la bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs shing de gzhan la yang yod do zhes pa 'di ni srid pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible that one thing is completely perfect in itself and that it also exists in another.

original: gang du ma la so sor bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa de ni du ma ste /
analyzed: gang du ma la so sor bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa de ni du ma ste /
translated: That which is manifold is completely perfect in each individual part.

original: yon tan bzhin /
analyzed: yon tan bzhin /
translated: Like the qualities.üîΩThe universal is also like that.

original: spyi yang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin gyis thal 'gyur ro //üîΩyan lag can yang 'di nyid kyis khegs pa'i phyir ma nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi yang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin gyis thal 'gyur ro // yan lag can yang 'di nyid kyis khegs pa'i phyir ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: This is a natural reductio.üîΩAnd because the whole is also refuted by this same argument, it is not indeterminate.

original: du ma nyid kyi phyir yang de spyi kho nar yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: du ma nyid kyi phyir yang de spyi kho nar yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And because it is manifold, it cannot be a universal,

original: rten bzhin no //
analyzed: rten bzhin no //
translated: like the substratum.

original: spyi yang gcig tu 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi yang gcig tu 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the universal is also accepted as one.

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs @102b pas sngar dam bcas pa'i rtags la rnam par dpyod par ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs @102b pas sngar dam bcas pa'i rtags la rnam par dpyod par ston par mdzad do //
translated: Thus and so forth shows the analysis of the previously stated reason.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba 'dis yan lag tu rtogs par bya'o zhes pa yan lag ste rtags su brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba 'dis yan lag tu rtogs par bya'o zhes pa yan lag ste rtags su brjod par bya'o //
translated: The inferable is to be understood as a part, and so the reason is to be stated.

original: 'da' min zhes pa 'khrul pa ma yin pa zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: 'da' min zhes pa 'khrul pa ma yin pa zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The word non-transgression means non-error.

original: chos du ma yang zhes pa /
analyzed: chos du ma yang zhes pa /
translated: The word many means

original: spyi'i khyad par gyi chos rnams kyis so //
analyzed: spyi'i khyad par gyi chos rnams kyis so //
translated: the general and particular properties.üîΩThe word smoke-ness and so on means

original: du ba nyid dang skya bo nyid la sogs pas zhes pa la /
analyzed: du ba nyid dang skya bo nyid la sogs pas zhes pa la /
translated: smoke-ness and whiteness and so on.

original: skya bo nyid ni 'dir du ba dang 'brel pa can kho na brjod par 'dod kyi /
analyzed: skya bo nyid ni 'dir du ba dang 'brel pa can kho na brjod par 'dod kyi /
translated: Here, only that which is related to smoke is intended to be expressed as smoke-ness.

original: zho dang ka ra la sogs pa 'jug pa ni ma yin te de 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zho dang ka ra la sogs pa 'jug pa ni ma yin te de 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the case that milk, sugar, and so on are included, because that would be erroneous.

original: 'o na rdzas la sogs pa du ba'i khyad par rnams kyang gang gi tshe gzung bar bya ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'o na rdzas la sogs pa du ba'i khyad par rnams kyang gang gi tshe gzung bar bya ba de'i tshe /
translated: Well then, when substances and so on, which are the particulars of smoke, are apprehended,

original: de rnams kyis kyang ci'i phyir rtogs par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang ci'i phyir rtogs par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: why are they not also the cause of understanding?

original: rtogs par byed pa kho na ste 'di rnam pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa kho na ste 'di rnam pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is only the realization of that, and it does not exist in any other form.

original: khyad par med pa'i spyi 'dzin pa la mngon par dgongs nas 'di skad bshad de /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i spyi 'dzin pa la mngon par dgongs nas 'di skad bshad de /
translated: With the intention of expressing a generality that is not differentiated, this is explained.

original: rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not by substance-ness, etc.

original: du ba nyid dang skya bo nyid la sogs pas zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras tshab nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: du ba nyid dang skya bo nyid la sogs pas zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras tshab nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams gzung bar bya'o //
translated: By smoke-ness, paleness, etc. The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù should be understood to include the differences of substitution, etc.üîΩIn order to easily understand the very meaning that has been explained, the verses that summarize it are:

original: bshad zin pa'i don kho na bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i ched du rtags las de rnams kyang rtogs bya zhes pa /üîΩde rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i don kho na bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i ched du rtags las de rnams kyang rtogs bya zhes pa / de rnams kyang ste /
translated: Those also are to be understood from the evidence.

original: rjes su 'brel pa can rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams rtogs par bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'brel pa can rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams rtogs par bya ba ste /
translated: Those also, which are related, such as substance-ness, are to be understood.

original: me nyid la sogs pa'i chos gang de'i tshe rtogs par 'dod pa kho na ni ma yin no zhes pa kyang gi sgra'i don te /
analyzed: me nyid la sogs pa'i chos gang de'i tshe rtogs par 'dod pa kho na ni ma yin no zhes pa kyang gi sgra'i don te /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is that when the property of fire, etc. is to be understood, it is not only that which is desired to be understood.

original: 'khrul phyir ro zhes pa rtags las so //
analyzed: 'khrul phyir ro zhes pa rtags las so //
translated: Because of error. This is the reason.

original: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par la ltos nas 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par la ltos nas 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: It is error itself, in dependence upon the distinctions of burning, etc.

original: rtags dang rjes su 'brel pa'i don //
analyzed: rtags dang rjes su 'brel pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of the connection with the reason is as follows.

original: zhes pa khyad par du byas pa ma yin pa'i rdzas la sogs pa spyi'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa khyad par du byas pa ma yin pa'i rdzas la sogs pa spyi'i chos rnams so //
translated: The general properties of substance, etc., which are not distinguished by particularities.

original: khyad par rnams ni zhes pa du ba nyid la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: khyad par rnams ni zhes pa du ba nyid la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The particularities are smoke, etc.

original: de rnams kyang khyad par du byas pa ma yin pa'i rdzas nyid la sogs pa'i spyi la ltos pas khyad par zhes brjod kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo la ltos pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang khyad par du byas pa ma yin pa'i rdzas nyid la sogs pa'i spyi la ltos pas khyad par zhes brjod kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo la ltos pas ni ma yin no //
translated: And they are called particularities because they depend upon the general properties of substance, etc., which are not distinguished by particularities. But they are not called particularities because they depend upon a unique essence.

original: 'o na gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'brel pa thams cad ni gnyis la gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: 'o na gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa 'brel pa thams cad ni gnyis la gnas pa yin la /
translated: Now, if it is said that the reason is inconclusive because it is based on both, all relations are based on two things.

original: de'i yang 'brel pa can dag la khyad par med par 'jug cing /
analyzed: de'i yang 'brel pa can dag la khyad par med par 'jug cing /
translated: And the relation of inherence occurs in the relata without distinction.

original: de las kyang ji ltar yang dag par ldan pa can nyid la ldan pa can dag la khyad par med pa de ltar rtags dang rtags @103a * //
analyzed: de las kyang ji ltar yang dag par ldan pa can nyid la ldan pa can dag la khyad par med pa de ltar rtags dang rtags @103a * //
translated: Moreover, just as there is no difference between those who possess something and those who are said to possess it, so there is no difference between the sign and the signifier.üîΩ

original: can dag gi yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: can dag gi yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, just as the possessor of the universal is not different from the possessor of the particular, so the sign and the signified would not be different.

original: de lta na yang rtags kyi spyi yang go bar byed par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta na yang rtags kyi spyi yang go bar byed par 'gyur la /
translated: And even if that were so, the universal of the sign would be the revealer,

original: rtags can gyi bye brag kyang go bar bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtags can gyi bye brag kyang go bar bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: and the particular of the signified would be the revealed.

original: 'brel pa khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because there would be no difference in the relation.

original: gang dag 'brel pa gcig gi rten can de dag ni chos tha mi dad pa dag yin te /
analyzed: gang dag 'brel pa gcig gi rten can de dag ni chos tha mi dad pa dag yin te /
translated: Those that have the same basis for a single relation are not different things,

original: ldan pa can bzhin /
analyzed: ldan pa can bzhin /
translated: like the possessor of the universal and the possessor of the particular.

original: rtags dang rtags can dag de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can dag de lta bu'o //
translated: The sign and the signified are like that.

original: rang bzhin ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ltar snang ba'o //
translated: It is a false nature.

original: gal te 'brel ba gnyis gnas kyang //
analyzed: gal te 'brel ba gnyis gnas kyang //
translated: Even if the relation were to exist,

original: zhes pa 'brel pa ni gnyis pa gnas pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: zhes pa 'brel pa ni gnyis pa gnas pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: the relation would not exist in a second.

original: de ltar ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'brel pa yin la /
translated: Non-existence without is the relation,

original: de yang rtags kho na la 'jug gi / rtags can la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rtags kho na la 'jug gi / rtags can la ni ma yin no //
translated: and that occurs only in the sign, not in the signified.

original: gnyis la gnas pa de khas blangs nas lhan cig 'byung ba nyid yod pa la lan brjod par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: gnyis la gnas pa de khas blangs nas lhan cig 'byung ba nyid yod pa la lan brjod par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: Having accepted that it exists in two, he shows that an answer must be given for the existence of co-occurrence.

original: rten dang brten pa bzhin zhes pa /
analyzed: rten dang brten pa bzhin zhes pa /
translated: Like the supported and the support.

original: rtags dang rtags can gyi 'brel ba de na rten dang brten pa bzhin du 'jug gi / ldan pa can dag bzhin ma yin //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can gyi 'brel ba de na rten dang brten pa bzhin du 'jug gi / ldan pa can dag bzhin ma yin //
translated: The relation of the sign and the possession of the sign is like the relation of the supported and the support, not like the relation of the possessors.

original: nam gyi tshe yang rten zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nam gyi tshe yang rten zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: When it is said the supported and the support, etc.,

original: brten par bya ba'i chos ni rten la rag las pas gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: brten par bya ba'i chos ni rten la rag las pas gnas pa nyid do //
translated: the phenomenon to be supported exists in dependence on the support.

original: rten gyi chos ni brten pa gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rten gyi chos ni brten pa gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: The phenomenon of the support supports the supported.

original: rten dang brten pa dag 'brel pa'i gzhi gcig pa nyid na yang chos tha dad med pa nyid ma yin no zhes pas ma nges pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa dag 'brel pa'i gzhi gcig pa nyid na yang chos tha dad med pa nyid ma yin no zhes pas ma nges pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: Even when the support and the supported have the same basis for connection, it is not the case that there is no difference between the phenomena. Thus he states that it is not definite.

original: de bzhin du nam yang med ces pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du nam yang med ces pa la sogs pa /
translated: Similarly, it is said never, etc.

original: rtags dang rtags can dag phan tshun gyi chos su 'gyur ba dag ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can dag phan tshun gyi chos su 'gyur ba dag ma yin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The sign and the possession of the sign are not mutually phenomena. This is the meaning.

original: yang dag par ldan pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas yang dag par ldan pa can dag dang rtags can dag mi mtshungs pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: yang dag par ldan pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas yang dag par ldan pa can dag dang rtags can dag mi mtshungs pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthose that are endowed with the correct evidence‚Äù and so on states that those who possess the correct evidence are not the same as those who possess the evidence.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúin this way‚Äù and so on makes it clear that the basis of a single relation is not established. It establishes the relationship between the object that is to be understood and the object that is the means of understanding, as was explained earlier.

original: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'brel pa gcig gi rten can nyid ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed cing sngar bshad pa kho na'i go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po gzhung 'dzugs so //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'brel pa gcig gi rten can nyid ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed cing sngar bshad pa kho na'i go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po gzhung 'dzugs so //
translated: The relation between the evidence and the property to be proven is that the evidence is the cause of the property to be proven. The relation between the evidence and the subject is that the evidence is the basis of the property to be proven. The relation between the evidence and the correct application is that the evidence is the cause of the correct application. The relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.

original: de ltar ni rtags dang rtags can dag med na mi 'byung ba 'brel ba dang / de yang rtags kho na la 'jug gi rtags can la ni ma yin no zhes pa'i nges par bzung ba gnyis po 'dis rtogs par bya ba'o //üîΩci ltar byas nas she na /
analyzed: de ltar ni rtags dang rtags can dag med na mi 'byung ba 'brel ba dang / de yang rtags kho na la 'jug gi rtags can la ni ma yin no zhes pa'i nges par bzung ba gnyis po 'dis rtogs par bya ba'o // ci ltar byas nas she na /
translated: The relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.

original: gang gi phyir rtags can 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes nges par gzung ba ci ltar rigs /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtags can 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes nges par gzung ba ci ltar rigs /
translated: The relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.

original: gal te gang dang gang du rtags yin pa de dang der rtags can 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te gang dang gang du rtags yin pa de dang der rtags can 'gyur la /
translated: The relation between the evidence and the correct effect is that the evidence is the cause of the correct effect.üîΩThe relation between the evidence

original: rtags can ni gzhan du 'jug pa 'dis dgag par bya ba ma @103b yin te /
analyzed: rtags can ni gzhan du 'jug pa 'dis dgag par bya ba ma @103b yin te /
translated: The possession of a sign is not to be refuted by this engagement with something else.

original: nges par bzung ba ni rtags la de med ba tsam rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par bzung ba ni rtags la de med ba tsam rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the definite description has the effect of excluding the mere absence of that in the sign.

original: de las kyang rtags can la ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'jug pa ma yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang rtags can la ni med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'jug pa ma yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: And from that, it is said that the possession of a sign does not engage in the absence of invariable concomitance.

original: rtags las gzhan du yang de yod pa gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags las gzhan du yang de yod pa gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it makes it clear that it exists elsewhere than the sign.

original: ji ltar me nyid du ba la 'gyur ba kho na yin pa de ltar rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: ji ltar me nyid du ba la 'gyur ba kho na yin pa de ltar rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang ste /
translated: Just as smoke is only a transformation of fire, so too are substance and so on.

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyi yang du ba go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyi yang du ba go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, their smoke is also what makes it understood.

original: 'bar ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bar ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
translated: But not of burning and so on,

original: de rnams du ba la yod pa kho na ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de rnams du ba la yod pa kho na ma yin pas so //
translated: because they do not exist in smoke.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: de'i phyir rigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the statement beginning with ‚Äúreason‚Äù and so on.

original: cig shos rtags can nyid la yod //
analyzed: cig shos rtags can nyid la yod //
translated: The other exists in the possession of a sign.

original: ces pa 'dis kyang rtags kho na la med na mi 'byung bar rab tu 'jug go zhes gsal bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces pa 'dis kyang rtags kho na la med na mi 'byung bar rab tu 'jug go zhes gsal bar bya ba ste /
translated: This also makes it clear that the reason alone is the invariable concomitance.

original: rtags can las gzhan la rtags 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags can las gzhan la rtags 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood that the meaning of ‚Äúthe reason does not occur apart from the one possessing the reason‚Äù is that the reason does not occur apart from the one possessing the reason.

original: rtags can ni rtags las gzhan du yod pa dgag par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags can ni rtags las gzhan du yod pa dgag par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The one possessing the reason is not to be negated as existing apart from the reason.

original: ji ltar yang me la du ba nyid 'gyur ba kho na yin pa de ltar skya bo nyid la sogs pa khyad par rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: ji ltar yang me la du ba nyid 'gyur ba kho na yin pa de ltar skya bo nyid la sogs pa khyad par rnams kyang ste /
translated: Just as smoke is only in fire, so too the attributes such as pallor are in the one possessing the reason.

original: de'i phyir de rnams kyang go bar byed pa rnams yin gyi rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams kyang go bar byed pa rnams yin gyi rdzas nyid la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, they are also the things that are understood, but not substance and so on,

original: de rnams me la yod pa kho na ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de rnams me la yod pa kho na ma yin pas so //
translated: because they are not only in fire.

original: gang gsungs pa de'i phyir rigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gsungs pa de'i phyir rigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because it is stated thus, the verse says, ‚Äúreason,‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar na zhes pa la sogs pas phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel to //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes pa la sogs pas phyed phyi ma rnam par 'grel to //
translated: The latter half of the verse is explained by ‚Äúthus,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'o na sngar de mtshungs yod pa //
analyzed: 'o na sngar de mtshungs yod pa //
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúBut previously it was said that the similar instance does not exist,‚ÄùüîΩthe response is, ‚ÄúThe similar instance is not a real entity.‚Äù

original: zhes pa'i tshig la rtags rtags can la yod par bshad la /
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig la rtags rtags can la yod par bshad la /
translated: The words of the root text explain that the reason is in the property exemplification.

original: 'dir ni rtags can la rtags su 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa'i tshig las rtags can rtags la yod pa nyid du brjod par bya na /
analyzed: 'dir ni rtags can la rtags su 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa'i tshig las rtags can rtags la yod pa nyid du brjod par bya na /
translated: But here, the words ‚Äúonly the reason is in the property exemplification‚Äù should be stated as ‚Äúonly the property exemplification is in the reason.‚Äù

original: de ci ltar mi 'gal zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar mi 'gal zhe na /
translated: How is this not a contradiction?

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: rtags dang rtags can dag gzhi gcig pa nyid na /
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can dag gzhi gcig pa nyid na /
translated: If the reason and the property exemplification are the same basis,

original: ji ltar rtags la rtags can du 'gyur ba de ltar rtags kyang cig shos la'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rtags la rtags can du 'gyur ba de ltar rtags kyang cig shos la'o //
translated: then just as the reason is in the property exemplification, so the property exemplification is in the reason.

original: nges par gzung ba bzlog pa nyid kyis rtags kho na la 'brel pa 'jug go zhes rtogs par bya ba'i ched du 'di brjod pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba bzlog pa nyid kyis rtags kho na la 'brel pa 'jug go zhes rtogs par bya ba'i ched du 'di brjod pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: This is stated only to make it understood that the relation is in the reason alone, by reversing the definite description.

original: gal te 'o na rtags kho na la 'jug na ci ltar rtags can dag gi 'brel pa'o zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na rtags kho na la 'jug na ci ltar rtags can dag gi 'brel pa'o zhes brjod ce na /
translated: If the relation is in the reason alone, how can it be said that it is the relation of the property exemplification?

original: 'di rtags kho na la 'jug kyang rtags can gyi ngor sbyor ba la ltos nas 'jug go zhes bas 'di skad brjod kyi /
analyzed: 'di rtags kho na la 'jug kyang rtags can gyi ngor sbyor ba la ltos nas 'jug go zhes bas 'di skad brjod kyi /
translated: Although it is in the reason alone, it is said in this way because it is engaged in relation to the application from the perspective of the property exemplification.

original: gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: But it is not because of abiding in the two. Therefore, there is no fault.

original: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pas /üîΩgang bshad pa'i nges pa bzlog pa las rtags dang rtags can @104a * //
analyzed: 'o na yang zhes pa la sogs pas / gang bshad pa'i nges pa bzlog pa las rtags dang rtags can @104a * //
translated: Now, if someone says, ‚ÄúIf the reason is not established, the thesis is not established,‚ÄùüîΩthe response is, ‚ÄúThe relation between the reason and the property to be proven is reversed.‚ÄùüîΩThus, it is not tenable. If the property to be proven does not exist, the pervasion does not apply.üîΩIf someone says, ‚ÄúIf the reason is not established, the thesis is not established,‚Äù

original: dag gi 'brel pa'o zhes pas de 'thad pa ma yin zhing rtags can la yang med na mi 'byung ba 'jug go zhes ston to //
analyzed: dag gi 'brel pa'o zhes pas de 'thad pa ma yin zhing rtags can la yang med na mi 'byung ba 'jug go zhes ston to //
translated: the response is, ‚ÄúEven if the reason is not established, the property to be proven is established.‚ÄùüîΩThus, even though the reason is not established, the property to be proven is established.üîΩIf someone says, ‚ÄúEven if the reason is not established, the property to be proven is established, the reason is not established,‚Äù

original: 'dod ces pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: 'dod ces pa la sogs pas /
translated: the response is, ‚ÄúThe reason is established.‚ÄùüîΩThus, even though the property to be proven is established, the reason is established.

original: gal te yang rtags kyang cung zad rtags can la 'gyur ba de lta na yang rtags can gyi ngo bo kho nas so //üîΩde lta na yang byas pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la ltos pas rtags su gyur pa kho na mi rtag pa nyid la med na mi 'byung ba 'jug go zhes ston cing rang gi phyogs kho na 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: gal te yang rtags kyang cung zad rtags can la 'gyur ba de lta na yang rtags can gyi ngo bo kho nas so // de lta na yang byas pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba la ltos pas rtags su gyur pa kho na mi rtag pa nyid la med na mi 'byung ba 'jug go zhes ston cing rang gi phyogs kho na 'jog par byed do //
translated: If someone says, ‚ÄúEven if the reason is established, the property to be proven is established, the reason is not established,‚ÄùüîΩthe response is, ‚ÄúThe reason is established.‚Äù

original: rtags kyang khyab ces pa khyab par byed pas na khyab pa ste /
analyzed: rtags kyang khyab ces pa khyab par byed pas na khyab pa ste /
translated: Thus, even though the property to be proven is established, the reason is established.üîΩIf someone says, ‚ÄúEven if the reason is established, the property to be proven is established, the reason is not established,‚Äù

original: rtags can la zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: rtags can la zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid la'o //
translated: the response is, ‚ÄúThe reason is established.‚ÄùüîΩThus, even though the property to be proven is established, the reason is established.

original: gang de'i khyab pa nyid de rtags can gyi yul can no zhes pas /
analyzed: gang de'i khyab pa nyid de rtags can gyi yul can no zhes pas /
translated: The pervasion of that is the subject that has the reason.

original: rtags can la khyab pa'o zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rtags can la khyab pa'o zhes brjod do //
translated: Thus, it is said that the subject is pervaded by the reason.

original: dper na aaksha rnams la dhu dha zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na aaksha rnams la dhu dha zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the letters ‚Äúdhu‚Äù and ‚Äúdha.‚Äù

original: yan lag can ni de de las //
analyzed: yan lag can ni de de las //
translated: The whole is that in relation to that.

original: khyab byed phyir zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid la yod pa kho na byas pa nyid kyi khyab pa nyid de /
analyzed: khyab byed phyir zhes pa mi rtag pa nyid la yod pa kho na byas pa nyid kyi khyab pa nyid de /
translated: Because it is the pervader. Impermanence is pervaded by only that which is produced.

original: de'i phyir khyab pa nyid kyi phyir byas pa nyid go bar byas pa kho nar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab pa nyid kyi phyir byas pa nyid go bar byas pa kho nar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, because of the pervasion, it is only the produced that is understood.

original: go byed min /
analyzed: go byed min /
translated: It is not the understander.

original: ci dang 'dra zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is it like? It is said:

original: pa lang gi rva bzhin zhes pa /
analyzed: pa lang gi rva bzhin zhes pa /
translated: Like the cow‚Äôs horn.

original: ji ltar rva ba lang gi khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir go bar bya ba kho nar rtogs par bya'i /
analyzed: ji ltar rva ba lang gi khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir go bar bya ba kho nar rtogs par bya'i /
translated: Just as the horn is understood to be only the thing to be understood because it is the pervader of the cow,

original: go bar byed pa ni ma yin pa de dang 'dra'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: go bar byed pa ni ma yin pa de dang 'dra'o zhes pa'o //
translated: it is not the understander. It is like that.

original: gang zhig gang kho na la de ni de'i go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang kho na la de ni de'i go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: That which is the understander of that is that.

original: dper na ba lang nyid rva can nyid kyi bzhin /
analyzed: dper na ba lang nyid rva can nyid kyi bzhin /
translated: For example, it is like cowness in relation to the horn.

original: byas pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid la yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid la yod pa kho na'o //
translated: And the fact of being produced exists only in impermanence.

original: rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes khyab pa mi srid par dri bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na zhes khyab pa mi srid par dri bar byed pa'o //
translated: Why? is the question about the impossibility of the pervasion.

original: dgag par bya la mi rgyu bas //
analyzed: dgag par bya la mi rgyu bas //
translated: Not operating in the object of negation,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: dgag bya ni bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun phyogs so //
analyzed: dgag bya ni bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun phyogs so //
translated: The object of negation is the opposite of the probandum.

original: de la gtan tshigs mi rgyu ba ni med pa'o //
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs mi rgyu ba ni med pa'o //
translated: The non-operation of the reason in that is non-existence.

original: des rtags kyi khyab pa gang yin pa de la ltos par bya zhing brten par bya ste /
analyzed: des rtags kyi khyab pa gang yin pa de la ltos par bya zhing brten par bya ste /
translated: That which is the pervasion of the reason should be relied upon, should be depended upon,

original: de kho na las go bar byed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na las go bar byed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it alone is the reason for the understanding.

original: de'i phyir rtags kyi ni rtags can gyi yul can gyi gang khyab pa de yod pa yin yang rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtags kyi ni rtags can gyi yul can gyi gang khyab pa de yod pa yin yang rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even though the existence of the pervasion of the reason in the possessor of the reason is the object of the inferential cognition, it is not the cause,

original: go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: because it is not the reason for the understanding.

original: byas pa nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The fact of being produced, and so on.

original: gal te yang mi rtag pa nyid mtha' dag la byas pa nyid khyab pa de lta na yang des khyab pa nyid kyis de'i go bar byed pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rtag pa nyid bkag pas so //
analyzed: gal te yang mi rtag pa nyid mtha' dag la byas pa nyid khyab pa de lta na yang des khyab pa nyid kyis de'i go bar byed pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rtag pa nyid bkag pas so //
translated: If impermanence is taken as a universal, then although it is pervaded by being a product, it is not understood by that pervasion, but rather by the negation of permanence.

original: rtag pa nyid la dgag pa ni rab tu mi rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la dgag pa ni rab tu mi rgyu ba ste /
translated: The negation of permanence is not a non-pervading reason,

original: de kho nas go bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de kho nas go bar byed pa'o //
translated: but rather it is understood by that alone.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa'i gtan tshigs @104b ni bsgrub par bya ba go bar byed pa ma yin pas te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa'i gtan tshigs @104b ni bsgrub par bya ba go bar byed pa ma yin pas te /
translated: A reason that does not exclude the discordant class is not a means of understanding the probandum,

original: gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
translated: like being an object of knowledge.

original: de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Similarly, with ‚Äúimpermanence‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi tshe byas pa nyid 'grub pa'i ched du mi rtag pa nyid gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar blang bar bya ba de'i tshe yang mi rtag pa nyid byed pa ma lus pa la khyab pa nyid na'ang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byas pa nyid 'grub pa'i ched du mi rtag pa nyid gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar blang bar bya ba de'i tshe yang mi rtag pa nyid byed pa ma lus pa la khyab pa nyid na'ang /
translated: When impermanence is taken up as a reason for the sake of establishing being a product, then at that time, even if impermanence pervades all agents,

original: de khyab pa nyid kyis go bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de khyab pa nyid kyis go bar byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: it is not understood by that pervasion.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: ma byas pa nyid bkag pa ste /
analyzed: ma byas pa nyid bkag pa ste /
translated: The non-performance of that is refuted.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma byas pa nyid la med pas so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma byas pa nyid la med pas so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Since the non-performance of the discordant side does not exist, that is the meaning.

original: de ltar gang gi phyir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun phyogs las ldog pas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun phyogs las ldog pas gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, because the reason is understood by the exclusion from the discordant side of one‚Äôs own probandum, it is the indicator of that.

original: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa'i don la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa nyid gang yin pa des na ma byas pa nyid kyi skabs med pa'i phyir dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyi ma byas pa nyid la skabs med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa'i don la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa nyid gang yin pa des na ma byas pa nyid kyi skabs med pa'i phyir dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyi ma byas pa nyid la skabs med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Since it is not otherwise, by that very pervasion of the meaning of impermanence by performance, there is no opportunity for non-performance, and there is no opportunity for non-performance in impermanence.

original: gnas pa med pa'i phyir dang mi srid pa'i phyir dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyis ma byas pa nyid dgag pas te ma byas pa bsal bas go bar bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas pa med pa'i phyir dang mi srid pa'i phyir dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyis ma byas pa nyid dgag pas te ma byas pa bsal bas go bar bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of non-abiding, because of impossibility, and because of the refutation of non-performance by impermanence, that is, because of the exclusion of non-performance, it is only the understood.

original: ma byas pa nyid dgag pas zhes pa'i tshig ni sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa rnam par bcad pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa nyid dgag pas zhes pa'i tshig ni sgrub pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa rnam par bcad pa'i don du'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúby the negation of non-production‚Äù are for the purpose of eliminating the understanding that it is an affirmation.

original: go bar byed pa nyid ni ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid ni ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not the reason for understanding.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir mi mthun phyogs la rab tu mi rgyu bas na gang khyab pa yin pa de go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi mthun phyogs la rab tu mi rgyu bas na gang khyab pa yin pa de go bar byed pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin na /
translated: Because it does not pervade the discordant side, whatever pervades is the reason for understanding.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa i /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa i /
translated: Impermanence is not pervaded by being produced.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la rab tu rgyu ba med pas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la rab tu rgyu ba med pas kyang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it that it does not pervade the discordant side.

original: de ltar ni gang mi rtag pa de byas pa'o zhes khyab pa nye bar bstan pa na rtag pa las byas pa nyid ldog par rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni gang mi rtag pa de byas pa'o zhes khyab pa nye bar bstan pa na rtag pa las byas pa nyid ldog par rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: When the pervasion ‚ÄúWhatever is impermanent is produced‚Äù is demonstrated, it is not that one understands the reversal of being produced from permanence.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: ma byas pa'i nyid las mi rtag pa nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa'i nyid las mi rtag pa nyid kyi'o //
translated: It is the reversal of non-production from impermanence.

original: de'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid kho na ma byas pa nyid la skabs med pa'o zhes ma byas pa nyid dgag pas go bar bya ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid kho na ma byas pa nyid la skabs med pa'o zhes ma byas pa nyid dgag pas go bar bya ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, by the negation of non-production, impermanence alone is the reason for understanding, since it is impossible for non-production to exist.

original: byas pa nyid kyi mi rtag pa nyid la sbyor ba ma yin la /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi mi rtag pa nyid la sbyor ba ma yin la /
translated: It is not the case that the impermanence of what is produced is not established.

original: go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that it is not the reason.

original: bshad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pa dag gis sdud par byed de /
analyzed: bshad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pa dag gis sdud par byed de /
translated: The meaning of the explanation is summarized in verses.

original: byas pa nyid kyis 'jig pa la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyis 'jig pa la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said that ‚Äúbecause of being produced, there is destruction,‚Äù and so on.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa las mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir de ma byas pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don 'di skabs su bab pa ma yin pa kho nar rtogs par bya zhes byed pa phyis pas nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa nyid kyis khyab pa las mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir de ma byas pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don 'di skabs su bab pa ma yin pa kho nar rtogs par bya zhes byed pa phyis pas nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbecause of impermanence, it is not unproduced‚Äù should be understood as not fitting in this context. This is the definite teaching of the later commentary.

original: gang skabs su bab pa rtag pa nyid med pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang skabs su bab pa rtag pa nyid med pa ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: What fits the context is the absence of permanence, which is impermanence.

original: de ni des khyab pas byas pa nyid kyi don la ma @105a * //
analyzed: de ni des khyab pas byas pa nyid kyi don la ma @105a * //
translated: Since that is pervaded by it, the meaning of ‚Äúbecause of being produced‚Äù is not taught.

original: bstan to // don 'di kho na bsal bar bya ba'i ched du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas dpe gsungs so //
analyzed: bstan to // don 'di kho na bsal bar bya ba'i ched du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas dpe gsungs so //
translated: For the sake of clarifying this very meaning, the second verse states the example.

original: rva can min pa nyid zlog byed //
analyzed: rva can min pa nyid zlog byed //
translated: The negation of being hornless is the reason.

original: ces pa rva can nyid go bar byed do zhes pa'i don to //üîΩba lang min don ldog byed min //
analyzed: ces pa rva can nyid go bar byed do zhes pa'i don to // ba lang min don ldog byed min //
translated: The word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is understood to be the cause of the exclusion of non-cow.üîΩThe word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is not the cause of the exclusion of non-cow.

original: zhes pa ba lang gi don gyi sgrub byed ma yin zhes pa'i don to /
analyzed: zhes pa ba lang gi don gyi sgrub byed ma yin zhes pa'i don to /
translated: The word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is not the cause of the exclusion of non-cow.

original: // / med na mi 'byung ba'i don mthong ba de rigs pa rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa la /
analyzed: // / med na mi 'byung ba'i don mthong ba de rigs pa rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa la /
translated: The seeing of the object that is invariably concomitant is inference.

original: don gang zhig gang med par mi 'byung ba de ni de'i med na mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: don gang zhig gang med par mi 'byung ba de ni de'i med na mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: That object which does not occur without something else is invariably concomitant with that something else.

original: dper na me'i du ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na me'i du ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, smoke is invariably concomitant with fire.

original: des ma mthong ba de ni rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: des ma mthong ba de ni rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: The seeing of that which is invariably concomitant is inference.

original: 'dis rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'dis rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúThis should be inferred from that.‚Äù

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don shes pa ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i don shes pa ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The knowledge of the object to be inferred is the result.

original: 'dis ni 'khrul pa'i mthong ba bsal to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khrul pa'i mthong ba bsal to //
translated: This eliminates the possibility of mistaken perception.

original: rtags mthong ba ni 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pa nyid bstan pa'i ched du de rig pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: rtags mthong ba ni 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pa nyid bstan pa'i ched du de rig pa zhes bshad do //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthat awareness‚Äù is made in order to show that the seeing of the reason depends on the recollection of the relation.

original: gang zhig de rig pa med na mi 'byung ba 'di'o zhes pa de'i rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig de rig pa med na mi 'byung ba 'di'o zhes pa de'i rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: That which is invariably concomitant with that awareness is inference.

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: But not of another.
