original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho nas zhes pa /üîΩde med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na rang gi rnam par 'gyur na de rig brjod min zhes pa 'di ni shugs kyis thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho nas zhes pa / de med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na rang gi rnam par 'gyur na de rig brjod min zhes pa 'di ni shugs kyis thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By the mere fact of its not occurring without that,üîΩit is understood by implication that this is not the awareness of that, since it is not expressed.

original: de rig pa ma yin pa med na mi 'byung ba 'di'o zhes ston pa srid pa ma yin pas so zhes pa'i byed pa phyis pas nges par bstan pa'o zhes pas de med par rang gi ngo bo'i dngos po nyid rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin
analyzed: de rig pa ma yin pa med na mi 'byung ba 'di'o zhes ston pa srid pa ma yin pas so zhes pa'i byed pa phyis pas nges par bstan pa'o zhes pas de med par rang gi ngo bo'i dngos po nyid rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin
translated: Since it is not possible to indicate that this is the non-occurrence of awareness without that, the statement ‚Äúit is not known‚Äù is made clear by the addition of the word ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: pas so // des na gzhan kho na cung zad cig de rig pa brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pas so // des na gzhan kho na cung zad cig de rig pa brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is understood that only something else is not expressed as the awareness of that.

original: nges par bstan pa ni nges par ston pa ste /
analyzed: nges par bstan pa ni nges par ston pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúMade clear‚Äù means ‚Äúmade known.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyis pa nges par bstan pa yin pa de de skad brjod do //
analyzed: gang gi phyis pa nges par bstan pa yin pa de de skad brjod do //
translated: That which is made clear by the addition of the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is referred to by that phrase.

original: dbyi ba ni dag de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs par byed pa brjod par 'dod pa na rab tu 'brel pa'i mi mthong pa kho na ste /
analyzed: dbyi ba ni dag de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs par byed pa brjod par 'dod pa na rab tu 'brel pa'i mi mthong pa kho na ste /
translated: When one wishes to express the understanding of the intrinsic reality of that, one does not see a connection.

original: rab tu 'brel pa'i mi mthong ba ni dbyi ba'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: rab tu 'brel pa'i mi mthong ba ni dbyi ba'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: Not seeing a connection is exclusion.

original: 'dis 'di gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: 'dis 'di gsal bar byed de /
translated: This makes it clear that

original: rang gi ngo bo'i tshig gi don can du de rig pa zhes pa 'di rig par bya'o zhes pa'i yi ge ni de'i don du bstan par 'os na'ang sdeb sbyor 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa las ma bstan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'i tshig gi don can du de rig pa zhes pa 'di rig par bya'o zhes pa'i yi ge ni de'i don du bstan par 'os na'ang sdeb sbyor 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa las ma bstan zhes pa'o //
translated: the meaning of the word intrinsic reality is to be understood as that which is known. Although the syllable is suitable to be taught for that meaning, it is not taught out of fear of destroying the meter.

original: gzhan gyis ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni /
translated: Another says:

original: gal te brjod na ci ltar cir zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te brjod na ci ltar cir zhes pa /
translated: If it is expressed, how and what?

original: de'i brjod par bya ba rnam pa mang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i brjod par bya ba rnam pa mang ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because its object of expression is manifold.

original: rnam pa cis dang gnas cir mthong ba yin /
analyzed: rnam pa cis dang gnas cir mthong ba yin /
translated: By what aspect and what place is it seen?

original: de brjod par bya ba ma yin na ni gnas nges par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de brjod par bya ba ma yin na ni gnas nges par mi 'gyur la /
translated: If it is not to be expressed, the place is not ascertained.

original: de las kyang bum pa las mig gis gzung bya nyid mthong ba la @105b sgra la yang mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang bum pa las mig gis gzung bya nyid mthong ba la @105b sgra la yang mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, in the case of a pot, when the eye sees the object to be seen, sound is also understood to be impermanent.

original: 'o na rnam par rtog pa snga ma la yang ci zhig tu mthong ba zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di brtsad par rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na rnam par rtog pa snga ma la yang ci zhig tu mthong ba zhes brjod par bya'o zhes pa 'di brtsad par rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: In that case, is it not reasonable to debate the former conception, asking, ‚ÄúWhat is seen?‚Äù

original: 'di kho nar brtsad par bya ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'di kho nar brtsad par bya ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the point of debating this alone?

original: 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /
translated: The thought is as follows.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis bstan pa ni /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis bstan pa ni /
translated: That which is taught by the principle of invariable co-occurrence

original: gang med na de 'gyur ba ma yin pa de kho na la mthong ba'o zhes ma brjod kyang rtogs par bya ba kho na ste /
analyzed: gang med na de 'gyur ba ma yin pa de kho na la mthong ba'o zhes ma brjod kyang rtogs par bya ba kho na ste /
translated: is understood as ‚Äúthat without which this would not occur,‚Äù even though it is not stated explicitly that ‚Äúthis is seen.‚Äù

original: de nye ba'i phyir zhes pa'o //üîΩdon zhes pa ni lhag ma ste zhes pa /
analyzed: de nye ba'i phyir zhes pa'o // don zhes pa ni lhag ma ste zhes pa /
translated: This is because it is close at hand.üîΩThe term ‚Äúobject‚Äù is the remainder.

original: don smos pa ni shin tu lhag go zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: don smos pa ni shin tu lhag go zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The mention of the object is the remainder.üîΩThis means that it is a remainder.

original: de ltar med na mi 'byung ba ni don kho nar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de ltar med na mi 'byung ba ni don kho nar 'gyur bas /
translated: Since the object is the invariable concomitant,

original: don smros pas ci yin /
analyzed: don smros pas ci yin /
translated: what is the point of mentioning the object?

original: de'i phyir mthong ba'i khyad par gyi don du de'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba'i khyad par gyi don du de'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that it is for the sake of the special object of seeing.

original: des na rtags kyi don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: des na rtags kyi don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: Thus, the apprehension of the aspect of the object of the reason is inference.

original: 'o na rtags kyi rnam pa ni 'khrul pa'i phyir des rjes su dpag pa mi srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rtags kyi rnam pa ni 'khrul pa'i phyir des rjes su dpag pa mi srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Well, since the aspect of the reason is mistaken, it is impossible for it to be inference.

original: 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /
translated: It is thought as follows.

original: du ba la sogs pa'i ngo bos 'dzin pa ni don 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i ngo bos 'dzin pa ni don 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The apprehension by the nature of smoke, etc. is the apprehension of the object.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na spyi'i rdzas su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dzin pa tsam du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na spyi'i rdzas su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dzin pa tsam du 'gyur zhing /
translated: Otherwise, it would be a mere apprehension, because it would be a universal substance.

original: de las kyang don smos pa don med par 'gyur te don gyi 'dzin pa tsam ni med na mi 'byung ba smos pa kho nas 'thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o//
analyzed: de las kyang don smos pa don med par 'gyur te don gyi 'dzin pa tsam ni med na mi 'byung ba smos pa kho nas 'thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o//
translated: Moreover, the mention of the object would be pointless, because the mere apprehension of the object is obtained just by mentioning the invariable concomitance.

original: bsgrub par bya ba skabs su bab pa yang zhes pa /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba skabs su bab pa yang zhes pa /
translated: The probandum is also relevant.

original: rnam par dpyad pa na /
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa na /
translated: When analyzed,

original: 'dod pa'i don ni phyogs zhes par ram /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don ni phyogs zhes par ram /
translated: the desired object is called the subject.

original: yang na bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa dam bca' zhes pa 'dir ro //
analyzed: yang na bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa dam bca' zhes pa 'dir ro //
translated: Or else, the thesis is the statement of the probandum.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba'i zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the probandum is understood to be ‚Äúseeing the reason.‚Äù

original: snga mas ni ci zhes pa don mthong ba med na mi 'byung ba nyid rig pa zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: snga mas ni ci zhes pa don mthong ba med na mi 'byung ba nyid rig pa zhes brjod pa na /
translated: The former [statement] is ‚Äúif there is no seeing of the object, there is no cognition.‚Äù

original: gang zhig me la sogs pa med par du ba la sogs pa 'di byung ba ni ma yin no zhes rig pa de'i de ltar rig pa'i med na mi 'byung ba'i don mthong ba kho na der 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig me la sogs pa med par du ba la sogs pa 'di byung ba ni ma yin no zhes rig pa de'i de ltar rig pa'i med na mi 'byung ba'i don mthong ba kho na der 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is said that ‚Äúif there is no fire, this smoke does not occur,‚Äù the cognition of that is the cognition of the pervasion that ‚Äúif there is no fire, there is no smoke.‚Äù

original: yang na don mthong ba med na mi 'byung ba rig pa zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: yang na don mthong ba med na mi 'byung ba rig pa zhes brjod pa na /
translated: Or else, the statement is ‚Äúif there is no seeing of the object, there is no cognition.‚Äù

original: don gang gi bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba de med na mi 'byung ba nyid rig pa'o zhes pa'i don du rtogs par bya la /
analyzed: don gang gi bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba de med na mi 'byung ba nyid rig pa'o zhes pa'i don du rtogs par bya la /
translated: The meaning is understood to be ‚Äúif there is no seeing of the object, there is no cognition of the probandum.‚Äù

original: de las kyang snga ma med na mi 'byung ba smos pas ci zhig / me sogs la'ang zhes pa /
analyzed: de las kyang snga ma med na mi 'byung ba smos pas ci zhig / me sogs la'ang zhes pa /
translated: And from that, what is the point of mentioning the former pervasion? ‚ÄúAlso with respect to fire, etc.‚Äù

original: me dang sa bon dang mi rtag pa nyid rnams rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du dper brjod pa'i phyir chos tsam rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du mngon par 'dod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: me dang sa bon dang mi rtag pa nyid rnams rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du dper brjod pa'i phyir chos tsam rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du mngon par 'dod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the mere property is held to be the object of inference, because the three examples are given: fire, seed, and impermanence.

original: de ltar ni da ltar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis dper brjod pa gsum po 'di @106a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni da ltar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis dper brjod pa gsum po 'di @106a * //
translated: In this way, the three examples are explained by the distinction of present, etc.

original: bshad la / chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa la ni dbye ba 'di srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bshad la / chos kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa la ni dbye ba 'di srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But in the case of the probandum, the subject qualified by a property, this distinction is not possible,

original: thams cad du chos can 'jug bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du chos can 'jug bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because in all cases the subject is engaged.

original: de las kyang me la sogs pa la du ba la sogs pa mthong ba na me la sogs pa rnams nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pas de rigs pas rjes su dpag par bya ba gzhan ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de las kyang me la sogs pa la du ba la sogs pa mthong ba na me la sogs pa rnams nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes pas de rigs pas rjes su dpag par bya ba gzhan ci zhig yin /
translated: And in that case, when smoke, etc. is seen in fire, etc., fire, etc. is certainly ascertained. What other object of inference is there that is to be inferred by reasoning?

original: 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba zhes gang brjod pa de yang mi rigs par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba la mthong ba zhes gang brjod pa de yang mi rigs par gsungs so //
translated: This shows that it is not correct to say that what is to be established is seen.

original: ci ltar ma brjod ces pa 'dis kyang byed pa mi gsal ba'i skyon yang ngo zhes pa'o /üîΩ// / rigs pa can rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ci ltar ma brjod ces pa 'dis kyang byed pa mi gsal ba'i skyon yang ngo zhes pa'o / // / rigs pa can rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: This also shows the fault of the agent being unclear in ‚Äúnot expressed.‚Äù

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang nye bar 'jal ba dang sgra rnams tshad ma rnams so zhes mdor bstan nas /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang nye bar 'jal ba dang sgra rnams tshad ma rnams so zhes mdor bstan nas /
translated: The logicians‚Äô ‚Äúvalid cognitions‚Äù are direct perception, inference, analogy, and testimony.üîΩHaving briefly taught that,

original: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bshad zin pa na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bshad zin pa na /
translated: he explained the definition of direct perception.

original: de ma thag tu skabs su bab pa rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: de ma thag tu skabs su bab pa rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa /
translated: Immediately after that, he explained the definition of inference, which is the topic at hand.

original: de sngon du 'gro ba can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩde'i bar mchod pa'i skabs kyis mngon sum gang gi sngon du yin pa de de skad bshad do //
analyzed: de sngon du 'gro ba can zhes pa la sogs pa'o // de'i bar mchod pa'i skabs kyis mngon sum gang gi sngon du yin pa de de skad bshad do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which has that as its antecedent‚Äù and so on.üîΩThe word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to direct perception, which is the topic at hand.

original: gang gi sngon du mngon sum gyis rtags dang rtags can rab tu grub pa dag gam de'i 'brel pa yang ste /
analyzed: gang gi sngon du mngon sum gyis rtags dang rtags can rab tu grub pa dag gam de'i 'brel pa yang ste /
translated: The definition of inference is ‚Äúthat which has direct perception as its antecedent.‚ÄùüîΩDirect perception is the first of the four valid cognitions.

original: de kho na dus phyis rtags tsam mthong bas rtags can rjes su dpag par bya ba'o zhes pas /
analyzed: de kho na dus phyis rtags tsam mthong bas rtags can rjes su dpag par bya ba'o zhes pas /
translated: The definition of inference is ‚Äúthat which has direct perception as its antecedent.‚Äù

original: de mngon sum snga ma can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mngon sum snga ma can du 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be a direct percept.

original: snga ma dang mtshungs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: snga ma dang mtshungs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: Similar to the former is similar to the former direct percept.

original: ji ltar 'brel pa'i dus na mngon sum gyi dngos po rtogs pa de lta kho nar dus phyis rtags mthong ba las kyang de la shes pa nye bar skye ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'brel pa'i dus na mngon sum gyi dngos po rtogs pa de lta kho nar dus phyis rtags mthong ba las kyang de la shes pa nye bar skye ste /
translated: Just as the object of direct perception is realized at the time of contact, in just the same way, later, when the sign is seen, knowledge of it arises.

original: de'i phyir de snga ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de snga ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore it is similar to the former.

original: lhag ma ste mngon sum dang mtshungs pa ni lhag ma dang 'dra ba ste dngos po yin la /
analyzed: lhag ma ste mngon sum dang mtshungs pa ni lhag ma dang 'dra ba ste dngos po yin la /
translated: Similar to the remainder is similar to the remainder. The remainder is the object.

original: de'i yul can gyi shes pa yang lhag ma dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi shes pa yang lhag ma dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: The consciousness that has that as its object is similar to the remainder.

original: ji ltar 'bras bu gcig ro'i sgo nas mngon sum du byas nas /
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras bu gcig ro'i sgo nas mngon sum du byas nas /
translated: Having made one effect manifest through its taste,

original: lhag ma rnams kyang ro 'di lta bu can rnams te /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang ro 'di lta bu can rnams te /
translated: the remainder also have that taste.

original: mngon sum pa'i ro dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mngon sum pa'i ro dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because they are similar to the taste of the manifest.

original: de bzhin no zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin no zhes so //
translated: It is just so.

original: rjes su dpog pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like inference.

original: 'o na mngon sum las cig shos lhag mar 'gyur gyi lhag ma dang mtshungs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na mngon sum las cig shos lhag mar 'gyur gyi lhag ma dang mtshungs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But then the other would be a remainder, not similar to a remainder.

original: de'i phyir de'i yul can gyi shes pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i yul can gyi shes pa /
translated: Therefore, how could the consciousness that has that as its object

original: ci ltar lhag ma dang 'dra ba'i yul can du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar lhag ma dang 'dra ba'i yul can du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: be an object similar to a remainder?

original: 'di rnams kyi phan tshun ltos pa lhag ma nyid do zhes pas mngon sum yang cig shos la ltos pas lhag ma ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi phan tshun ltos pa lhag ma nyid do zhes pas mngon sum yang cig shos la ltos pas lhag ma ste /
translated: The mutual dependence of these is remainder itself. Since direct perception also depends on the other, it is a remainder.

original: des na cig @106b shos kyang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir lhag ma dang 'dra ba nyid do zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: des na cig @106b shos kyang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir lhag ma dang 'dra ba nyid do zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, since the other is also similar, there is no error in saying that it is similar to a remainder.

original: yang na sngon ma ni rgyu ste /
analyzed: yang na sngon ma ni rgyu ste /
translated: Or, the former is the cause.

original: de 'di la yang yod do zhes pa sngon ma dang ldan pa ste 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de 'di la yang yod do zhes pa sngon ma dang ldan pa ste 'bras bu'o //
translated: That which has that is the former possessor, which is the effect.

original: de'i yul can gyi shes pa yang snga ma dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi shes pa yang snga ma dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The consciousness that has that as its object is also the former possessor.

original: gang rgyu las 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa'o //
analyzed: gang rgyu las 'bras bu rjes su dpog pa'o //
translated: That which infers the effect from the cause.

original: lhag ma ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: lhag ma ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: The remainder is the effect.

original: de 'di la yod do zhes pa lhag ma dang ldan pa ste rgyu'o //
analyzed: de 'di la yod do zhes pa lhag ma dang ldan pa ste rgyu'o //
translated: That which has that is the remainder possessor, which is the cause.

original: de'i yul can gyi shes pa yang lhag ma dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi shes pa yang lhag ma dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The cognition that has it as its object is also associated with a remainder.

original: gang 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpog pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpog pa'o //
translated: The cause is inferred from the effect.

original: spyi mthong ba ni gang gzhan dang 'dra ba las gzhan shin tu lkog tu gyur pa las shes pa ste /
analyzed: spyi mthong ba ni gang gzhan dang 'dra ba las gzhan shin tu lkog tu gyur pa las shes pa ste /
translated: The perception of a universal is the cognition of something else from something similar to it, when the other is completely hidden.

original: dper na nag po'i bgrod pa sngon ma can yul gzhan thob pa nye bar dmigs nas /
analyzed: dper na nag po'i bgrod pa sngon ma can yul gzhan thob pa nye bar dmigs nas /
translated: For example, having observed the sun's movement in the past in one place,

original: de dang mtshungs pa nyid kyis nyi ma'ang bgrod pa sngon ma can ri la rgas pa thob par rjes su dpag par bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa nyid kyis nyi ma'ang bgrod pa sngon ma can ri la rgas pa thob par rjes su dpag par bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: one infers that the sun, being similar to that, has reached the other side of the mountain in the past.

original: rgyas par bstan pa kho na las gsum nyid du grub pa la /
analyzed: rgyas par bstan pa kho na las gsum nyid du grub pa la /
translated: The three are established from the extensive explanation itself.

original: rnam pa gsum zhes smos pa ni snga ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dang ga pa gcig pu dus gsum gyi yul can nyid kyis rnam pa gsum pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum zhes smos pa ni snga ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dang ga pa gcig pu dus gsum gyi yul can nyid kyis rnam pa gsum pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: The mention of three aspects is for the purpose of understanding the threefold nature by the single subsequent cognition associated with the past, having the three times as its object.

original: de la chu klung rgyas pa las char pa zhes pa 'das pa la rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: de la chu klung rgyas pa las char pa zhes pa 'das pa la rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: Among them, rain from the swelling of the river is an inference from the past.

original: grog ma'i sgo nga 'pho ba las char par 'gyur ro zhes pa ma 'ongs pa la'o //
analyzed: grog ma'i sgo nga 'pho ba las char par 'gyur ro zhes pa ma 'ongs pa la'o //
translated: The statement, Rain will come from the migration of ants' eggs, is about the future.

original: rma bya'i sgra grag pa'i phyir 'di na rma bya'o zhes pa da ltar pa la'o //
analyzed: rma bya'i sgra grag pa'i phyir 'di na rma bya'o zhes pa da ltar pa la'o //
translated: The statement, Here is a peacock because of the sound of a peacock, is about the present.

original: 'dir ma tu sa'i snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes pa ti yis sbyar bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ma tu sa'i snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes pa ti yis sbyar bar bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the statement, It is not possible that the past of matura is like matura itself, is connected with ti.

original: 'brel pa dbang po'i gzung bya min //
analyzed: 'brel pa dbang po'i gzung bya min //
translated: The statement, The relation is not an object of the senses,

original: zhes pa 'byung ba'i yon tan bzhin du 'brel pa can rnams las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'byung ba'i yon tan bzhin du 'brel pa can rnams las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: means that, like the qualities of the elements, the relation does not appear as different from the relata.

original: gang dbang po'i shes pa la snang ba ma yin pa de dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dbang po'i shes pa la snang ba ma yin pa de dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Whatever does not appear to the sense consciousness is not an object of the senses,

original: dbang po bzhin 'brel pa yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbang po bzhin 'brel pa yang de lta bu'o //
translated: just as the sense faculty is not. The relation is like that.

original: khyab byed med pa'o //
analyzed: khyab byed med pa'o //
translated: There is no pervasion.

original: thams cad du yang ma yin zhes pa /
analyzed: thams cad du yang ma yin zhes pa /
translated: The statement, It is not in everything,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang dbang po la sogs pa rnams dbang pos 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang dbang po la sogs pa rnams dbang pos 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: means that it is not possible for the eye consciousness and the sense faculties, etc., to be apprehended by the sense faculties.

original: thams cad du zhes smos pa ni me dang du ba la sogs pa rnams mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes smos pa ni me dang du ba la sogs pa rnams mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúalways‚Äù is used because it is possible that fire and smoke, etc. are apprehended by perception.

original: 'dis ni ma khyab pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni ma khyab pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: This shows that the reason is not inconclusive.

original: yang na thams cad du 'brel pa can dag mngon sum ma yin pa dag go zhes pa'i don 'di ste /
analyzed: yang na thams cad du 'brel pa can dag mngon sum ma yin pa dag go zhes pa'i don 'di ste /
translated: Or, the meaning of ‚Äúalways‚Äù is that the reason and the property to be established are not perceived.

original: spyi'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de yang mngon sum ma yin par bsgrub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩde las kyang mi srid pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshan @107a * //
analyzed: spyi'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de yang mngon sum ma yin par bsgrub pa nyid kyi phyir ro // de las kyang mi srid pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshan @107a * //
translated: Because the nature of a universal is not perceived, it is being established that it is not perceived.

original: nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: nyid ma yin no //
translated: Since it is impossible for a universal to be perceived, this is not a correct characteristic.

original: rtags dang rtags can dag mngon sum ma yin pa dag go zhes pa 'di tsam kho nas brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs pa yin na yang thams cad du smos pa ni 'ga' zhig me dang du ba la sogs pa rnams la mngon sum du mngon par 'dodüîΩpa bsal ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can dag mngon sum ma yin pa dag go zhes pa 'di tsam kho nas brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs pa yin na yang thams cad du smos pa ni 'ga' zhig me dang du ba la sogs pa rnams la mngon sum du mngon par 'dod pa bsal ba'i don du'o //
translated: If the mere statement ‚ÄúThe reason and the property to be established are not perceived‚Äù is intended to convey the meaning, then the word ‚Äúalways‚Äù is used to eliminate the possibility that someone might think that fire and smoke, etc. are perceived.

original: kun la srid phyir lta bu min //
analyzed: kun la srid phyir lta bu min //
translated: Because it is possible in all cases, it is not like that.

original: zhes pa thams cad snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid yin bzhin du gcig kho na snga ma dang 'dra bar smra bas /
analyzed: zhes pa thams cad snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid yin bzhin du gcig kho na snga ma dang 'dra bar smra bas /
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: cig shos dag la de med do zhes dam bcas te /
analyzed: cig shos dag la de med do zhes dam bcas te /
translated: But one of them says that it is just like the former, and the other says that it does not exist in the other.

original: de la yang snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid grub pas gnang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid grub pas gnang ngo //
translated: And since the former is established, it is accepted.

original: 'brel pa gzhan gyis kyang 'di zhes pa la /
analyzed: 'brel pa gzhan gyis kyang 'di zhes pa la /
translated: By another relation, it is this.

original: 'brel pa gzhan ni 'brel pa'i bye brag med na mi 'byung pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa gzhan ni 'brel pa'i bye brag med na mi 'byung pa ste /
translated: Another relation is that which does not occur without a particular relation.

original: de'i stobs kyis snga ma dang 'dra bar don rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis snga ma dang 'dra bar don rtogs pa'o //
translated: By its power, the object is understood as before.

original: de nges par bstan pa med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par nges par bstan pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de nges par bstan pa med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par nges par bstan pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Since that is not taught, it is not taught that it is ascertained by inference.

original: 'o na 'di ma tus su 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'o na 'di ma tus su 'gyur mod /
translated: Well then, it would be meaningless.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i skyon 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i skyon 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: But the previously explained fault does not occur,

original: rjes su dpag pa thams cad ni rgyu las 'bras bu'i yul can du 'gyur ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa thams cad ni rgyu las 'bras bu'i yul can du 'gyur ba ma yin pas so //
translated: because not all inferences have a result that is the object of a cause.

original: 'brel pa yang 'dir bstan pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa yang 'dir bstan pa kho na ste /
translated: And the relation is taught here.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the nature of effect and cause is well taught.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir na lhan skyon min //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir na lhan skyon min //
translated: Because of error, it is not simultaneous.

original: zhes pa / 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos pos ni 'bras bu kho na'i med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: zhes pa / 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos pos ni 'bras bu kho na'i med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: By the nature of effect and cause, only the effect is the non-separation of the cause,

original: rgyu'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the cause.

original: de ltar ni rgyu yod na yang lhan cig byed pa mtshang ba'i phyir 'bras bur 'gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ni rgyu yod na yang lhan cig byed pa mtshang ba'i phyir 'bras bur 'gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: For even when the cause exists, the effect does not occur because the simultaneous factors are incomplete.

original: dper na sprin yod na yang zhing pa rnams kyi ches med pa'i phyir char pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sprin yod na yang zhing pa rnams kyi ches med pa'i phyir char pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, even when there are clouds, rain does not occur for farmers because the simultaneous factors are incomplete.

original: rgyu gzhan tshogs pa yod na yang //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan tshogs pa yod na yang //
translated: Even when the assemblage of other causes exists,

original: chos ma yin pa la sogs pa 'gal bas gags byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa la sogs pa 'gal bas gags byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the effect does not occur because non-dharmic factors and so on obstruct it.

original: 'o na khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas skabs thos pa'i sa bon la sogs pa ni rgyu dngos nyid de /
analyzed: 'o na khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas skabs thos pa'i sa bon la sogs pa ni rgyu dngos nyid de /
translated: Well then, the seed of the stage of hearing and so on that is transformed is the actual cause,

original: de la gags bya bar yang mi nus so //
analyzed: de la gags bya bar yang mi nus so //
translated: and it cannot be obstructed.

original: de ci'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it just error?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de mthong ba las 'brel ba dran pa la ltos pa las rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs par 'dod pa na /
analyzed: de mthong ba las 'brel ba dran pa la ltos pa las rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs par 'dod pa na /
translated: When one desires to understand the object of inference from the memory of the relation seen,

original: 'brel pa dran pa las sngon du 'bras bu skyes pa kho na mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa dran pa las sngon du 'bras bu skyes pa kho na mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: the effect must be produced first, and only then will it be perceived from the memory of the relation.

original: 'bras bu mngon sum ma yin pa la rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyu rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon sum ma yin pa la rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyu rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And the cause is not understood in that way when the effect is not perceived,

original: gang gis rgyu las de rtogs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis rgyu las de rtogs par bya ba'o //
translated: by which the cause would be understood.

original: de'i phyir rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the effect is not produced from the cause.

original: lhag ldan la yang lta bu na//
analyzed: lhag ldan la yang lta bu na//
translated: In the case of the remainder, it is similar.

original: @107b zhes pa la sogs pas 'di la yang de ma thag tu brjod pa kho na'i skyon gsungs so //
analyzed: @107b zhes pa la sogs pas 'di la yang de ma thag tu brjod pa kho na'i skyon gsungs so //
translated: Here also, the fault just stated applies.

original: gdon mi za bar ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is not certain, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa mtshungs pa rnams kyi ro mtshungs par 'byung ba'i nges pa sbyor ba 'di ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa mtshungs pa rnams kyi ro mtshungs par 'byung ba'i nges pa sbyor ba 'di ni ma yin no //
translated: This application of the certainty that the taste of similar forms, etc. arises similarly is not correct.üîΩ

original: 'di tsam zhig tu ni 'gyur te 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'di dang rgyu mtshungs pa rnams ni ro 'di lta bu can rnams so zhes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'di tsam zhig tu ni 'gyur te 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'di dang rgyu mtshungs pa rnams ni ro 'di lta bu can rnams so zhes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: It would be like this: ‚ÄúThis has such and such a nature, and those that are similar to it have such and such a taste.‚Äù

original: gzugs mtshungs pa tsam las rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs mtshungs pa tsam las rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not an inference from mere similarity of form, because that would be erroneous.

original: ldan pas zhe na ma rtogs na //
analyzed: ldan pas zhe na ma rtogs na //
translated: If you say that it is through possession, then it is not understood.

original: mi 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa la ma rtogs pa ni ma go ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa la ma rtogs pa ni ma go ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not so‚Äù and so on. Not understood means not comprehended.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What?

original: gang las 'bras bu la rgyu rjes su dpog pa 'di yin pa 'bras bu nyid do //
analyzed: gang las 'bras bu la rgyu rjes su dpog pa 'di yin pa 'bras bu nyid do //
translated: This is the effect from which the cause is inferred.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu'i ngo bo kho nar rtogs pa med par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu'i ngo bo kho nar rtogs pa med par gyur pa na /
translated: Therefore, when there is no comprehension of the nature of the effect,

original: rtags ni rjes su dpag par bya pa rgyu la med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'dzin pa las rtogs pa med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: rtags ni rjes su dpag par bya pa rgyu la med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'dzin pa las rtogs pa med par 'gyur na /
translated: the reason, which is the apprehension of the invariable concomitance of the inferable object with the cause, would not be comprehended.

original: de yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: de yang mthong ngo //
translated: But that is seen.

original: 'o na don gzhan 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos por grub pa kho na'i med na mi 'byung ba nges pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na don gzhan 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos por grub pa kho na'i med na mi 'byung ba nges pa ma yin nam /
translated: Well then, is it not ascertained that the invariable concomitance of the other object established as the effect and cause is not understood?

original: de la ci ltar na 'bras bu nyid du ma bzung nas med na mi 'byung ba nyid nges par nus she na /
analyzed: de la ci ltar na 'bras bu nyid du ma bzung nas med na mi 'byung ba nyid nges par nus she na /
translated: But how can one ascertain the invariable concomitance of the effect without accepting the effect?

original: bstan bcos la mthong ba'i 'bras bu nyid 'dzin pa las 'das pa 'dir brjod par 'dod kyi /
analyzed: bstan bcos la mthong ba'i 'bras bu nyid 'dzin pa las 'das pa 'dir brjod par 'dod kyi /
translated: We are not denying the effect as it is accepted in the treatises.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa'i 'bras bu nyid du 'dzin pa las 'das pa ni ma yin zhes pas skyon med do //üîΩbstan bcos su ni chu'i rgyun gyi yan lag can rnams /
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa'i 'bras bu nyid du 'dzin pa las 'das pa ni ma yin zhes pas skyon med do // bstan bcos su ni chu'i rgyun gyi yan lag can rnams /
translated: We are denying the effect as it is accepted in the world.

original: chu la byung ba'i rdul phra rab ris mthun pa rnams kho nas rtsom par byed cing /
analyzed: chu la byung ba'i rdul phra rab ris mthun pa rnams kho nas rtsom par byed cing /
translated: In the treatises, the members of the stream of water are said to be produced by the homogeneous particles of water that arise from the cloud.üîΩThe cloud is said to be the cause of the rain because it is the reason for the attraction of the particles.

original: sprin rnams ni rdul phra rab rnams 'gugs pa'i ngor rgyu mtshan nyid du nye bar gyur pa rnams char pa'i rgyur tha snyad du bstan pa bsten par 'gyur ba zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: sprin rnams ni rdul phra rab rnams 'gugs pa'i ngor rgyu mtshan nyid du nye bar gyur pa rnams char pa'i rgyur tha snyad du bstan pa bsten par 'gyur ba zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: This is the presentation.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po 'jig rten gyis rtogs par yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po 'jig rten gyis rtogs par yang ma yin gyi /
translated: The world does not understand the relation of cause and effect in this way.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: sprin rnams yod pa na char 'bab pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / de med pa na yang ma mthong ba'i phyir sprin rnams kho na char 'bab pa'i rgyu dngos so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sprin rnams yod pa na char 'bab pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / de med pa na yang ma mthong ba'i phyir sprin rnams kho na char 'bab pa'i rgyu dngos so zhes pa ste /
translated: Because rain is seen when clouds exist, and because rain is not seen when they do not exist, clouds are the actual cause of rain.

original: de ltar mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos por rtogs so //
analyzed: de ltar mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos por rtogs so //
translated: Thus, the existence of cause and effect is understood from seeing and not seeing.üîΩThe treatise attainment of knowledge states:

original: bstan bcos las mthong ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rnams ni mi 'thad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos las mthong ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rnams ni mi 'thad pa kho na ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe existence of cause and effect that is seen is untenable.

original: rdul phra rab rtag pa rnams ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rtag pa rnams ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because permanent subtle particles are not established.

original: grub tu chug kyang rnam par 'gyur ba med pa nyid kyi phyir na dgug par mi @108a * //
analyzed: grub tu chug kyang rnam par 'gyur ba med pa nyid kyi phyir na dgug par mi @108a * //
translated: Even if they were established, because they are unchanging, they cannot be drawn together.

original: nus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bkug pa rnams la yang rim dang cig car nyid dag gis 'bras bu rtsom pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bkug pa rnams la yang rim dang cig car nyid dag gis 'bras bu rtsom pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is illogical for results to commence in those drawn together, either sequentially or simultaneously.‚Äù

original: 'du ba can gyi 'bras bu yang dngos por yod pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzhan du rgya cher bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa shin tu 'phros pas chog go //
analyzed: 'du ba can gyi 'bras bu yang dngos por yod pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzhan du rgya cher bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa shin tu 'phros pas chog go //
translated: The result of an assembly also is refuted extensively elsewhere by those who possess the intelligence that things exist.

original: de bzhin du gang byas pa la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pas ldan pa'i phyogs la ma khyab pa nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang byas pa la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pas ldan pa'i phyogs la ma khyab pa nyid gsungs te /
translated: Thus, in the same way, the statement ‚Äúby those such as the produced‚Äù indicates that the position of inherence is not pervaded by the reason.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa rnams mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po yod pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa rnams mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po yod pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: This is because the produced and so on do not exist as the effect and cause of impermanence and so on.

original: gzhan rnams na re lus po la sogs pa'i yan lag can gcig mthong ba ni lto ba la sogs pa'i yan lag mngon sum gyis rtogs pa gcig las gzhan pa'i yan lag rgyab la sogs pa gang yin pa de lhag ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gzhan rnams na re lus po la sogs pa'i yan lag can gcig mthong ba ni lto ba la sogs pa'i yan lag mngon sum gyis rtogs pa gcig las gzhan pa'i yan lag rgyab la sogs pa gang yin pa de lhag ma yin zhing /
translated: Others say: When one sees a whole such as a body, one directly perceives its parts such as the belly. The parts other than that are the remaining parts, such as the back.

original: de'i yul can gyi shes pa ni lhag ma dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi shes pa ni lhag ma dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The consciousness that possesses that object possesses the remaining parts.

original: 'di 'khrul pa yang ma yin te lto ba ni rgyab la sogs pa med par nam gyi tshe yang nye bar dmigs pa snga ma ma yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: 'di 'khrul pa yang ma yin te lto ba ni rgyab la sogs pa med par nam gyi tshe yang nye bar dmigs pa snga ma ma yin no zhe'o //
translated: This is not a mistake, because the belly is never perceived without the back, etc.

original: 'di la yang thams cad 'byung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di la yang thams cad 'byung ba kho na ste /
translated: Here, too, everything is possible,

original: gang phyir rjes su dpag pa thams cad la ni mngon sum gyi don las tha dad pa kho na'i don la yang dag par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang phyir rjes su dpag pa thams cad la ni mngon sum gyi don las tha dad pa kho na'i don la yang dag par rtogs pa ste /
translated: because in all inferences, the object of understanding is only something different from the object of perception,

original: rtags ma bzung ba las 'gar yang rjes su dpag pa nye bar skye ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: rtags ma bzung ba las 'gar yang rjes su dpag pa nye bar skye ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because an inference is never produced from the apprehension of a reason.

original: /'khrul pa yang yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: /'khrul pa yang yod pa kho na ste /
translated: Mistakenness also exists,

original: rva la sogs pa'i yan lag yang dag par yod pa la yang rnga ma la sogs pa'i yan lag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rva la sogs pa'i yan lag yang dag par yod pa la yang rnga ma la sogs pa'i yan lag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even when the parts such as horns exist, the parts such as the tail do not.

original: snga ma dang ldan pa la yang zhes pa snga ma wat ces pa 'di la 'dra ba'i phyogs la rva la sogs pa'i rtags kyi ba lang gi don rjes su dpog pa na /
analyzed: snga ma dang ldan pa la yang zhes pa snga ma wat ces pa 'di la 'dra ba'i phyogs la rva la sogs pa'i rtags kyi ba lang gi don rjes su dpog pa na /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the line ‚Äúin the case of the one possessing the former‚Äù means that when the object of inference, a cow, is inferred from the reason, horns, etc.,

original: du ba'i 'brel pa yin zhing /
analyzed: du ba'i 'brel pa yin zhing /
translated: the relation is that of effect to cause.

original: de yang 'dir blo'i rtags las nges par bya bar bshad na /
analyzed: de yang 'dir blo'i rtags las nges par bya bar bshad na /
translated: Moreover, if it is explained that ascertainment is made from the evidence of cognition,

original: 'dir blo yang de dang 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir dang / so sor 'ching ba med pa'i phyir yang /
analyzed: 'dir blo yang de dang 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir dang / so sor 'ching ba med pa'i phyir yang /
translated: then cognition is not established as related to that, and because there is no individual binding,

original: rtags su mi rung zhes pas de las de 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags su mi rung zhes pas de las de 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not suitable as evidence, and so that is not established from that.

original: de las kyang lkog shal la sogs pa'i rtags las ba lang gi don rjes su dpog par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang lkog shal la sogs pa'i rtags las ba lang gi don rjes su dpog par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of cow is not inferred from the evidence of dewlap, etc.

original: de yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: de yang mthong ngo //
translated: That is also seen.

original: de ltar ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i lkog shal la sogs pa'i yan lag gi bdag nyid can ba lang ngo zhes rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa rnams ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i lkog shal la sogs pa'i yan lag gi bdag nyid can ba lang ngo zhes rigs pas rnam par dpyod pa rnams ni /
translated: In that way, those who analyze by reasoning, ‚ÄúA cow is the identity of the parts, such as the dewlap, which depend on a single collection,‚Äù

original: med na mi 'byung ba des nas lkog shal la sogs pa'i rtags las @108b ba lang gi don la rjes su dpag par byed pas so //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba des nas lkog shal la sogs pa'i rtags las @108b ba lang gi don la rjes su dpag par byed pas so //
translated: infer the meaning of cow from the evidence of dewlap, etc., by the invariable concomitance of that.

original: du ba las me rjes su dpog pa na ldan pa'i 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: du ba las me rjes su dpog pa na ldan pa'i 'brel pa ste /
translated: When inferring fire from smoke, it is the relation of inherence.

original: de yang ma bzung ba na rtogs par mi 'gyur na de yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: de yang ma bzung ba na rtogs par mi 'gyur na de yang mthong ngo //
translated: Moreover, if that is not apprehended, it is not understood, and that is also seen.

original: de ltar ni du ba tsam mthong nas me med na mi 'byung bar nges pa sngon ma can gyis rjes su dpog par byed pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni du ba tsam mthong nas me med na mi 'byung bar nges pa sngon ma can gyis rjes su dpog par byed pas so //
translated: Thus, having seen just the smoke, one infers the fire, which is ascertained to be invariably concomitant with the smoke.

original: de'i tshe rten mtha' dag ma bzung ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe rten mtha' dag ma bzung ba ni /
translated: At that time, the entire basis is not grasped,

original: don du ma'i thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir na gnyis nyid la sogs pa ltar ldan pa yongs su gcod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: don du ma'i thun mong ba nyid kyi phyir na gnyis nyid la sogs pa ltar ldan pa yongs su gcod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: because it is common to many objects, and it does not determine the possession like duality, etc.

original: ldan pa'i rkyen gyi phyogs la ni sprin la sogs pa rnams char pa la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa'i rkyen gyi phyogs la ni sprin la sogs pa rnams char pa la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: In the case of the condition of possession, clouds, etc. are related to rain, etc. as effect and cause.

original: lhag ma dang ldan 'dra la yang //
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan 'dra la yang //
translated: In the case of similarity, also

original: 'dra ba'i phyogs la yang gzugs ni ro la don gcig la 'du ba ma yin zhes pas 'di rnams ji skad bshad pa'i 'brel pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i phyogs la yang gzugs ni ro la don gcig la 'du ba ma yin zhes pas 'di rnams ji skad bshad pa'i 'brel pa rnams so //
translated: In the case of similarity, form is not combined with taste for a single purpose, so these are the relations explained above.

original: phyi ma la bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: phyi ma la bstan pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because there is no teaching in the latter.

original: lhag ma dang ldan pa la ldan pa'i phyogs ni rnam par dpyad pa'i phyi ma ste /
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan pa la ldan pa'i phyogs ni rnam par dpyad pa'i phyi ma ste /
translated: In the case of possession, the latter is the analysis of possession.

original: de la 'di bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'di bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because this is taught in that.

original: rgyu nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi yang 'brel pa can nyid ces pa /
analyzed: rgyu nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi yang 'brel pa can nyid ces pa /
translated: Also, the connection of causes and so forth is stated.

original: rgyu la sogs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos por 'brel pa 'dod pa na /
analyzed: rgyu la sogs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos por 'brel pa 'dod pa na /
translated: When the effect and so forth of causes and so forth are asserted to be the entity of the sign and the possession of the sign in connection,

original: rgyu nyid la sogs pa ni 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa tsam la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rgyu nyid la sogs pa ni 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa tsam la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because causes and so forth depend on the effect and so forth,

original: de la rtags can la 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa can kho na shes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de la rtags can la 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa can kho na shes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: the cognition of the possession of the sign will be only in the aspect of the effect and so forth.

original: char pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: char pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can du ni ma yin no //
translated: It will not be in the aspect of rain and so forth.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: 'brel pa tsam gyi sgo nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa tsam gyi sgo nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Through mere connection and so forth.

original: 'brel pa med par ni rtags las rtags can la shes pa skye ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'brel pa med par ni rtags las rtags can la shes pa skye ba ma yin zhing /
translated: A cognition of the possession of the sign does not arise from a sign without a connection.

original: rtags kyang ji ltar gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa de ltar de kho na rtogs par byed kyi /
analyzed: rtags kyang ji ltar gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa de ltar de kho na rtogs par byed kyi /
translated: Also, a sign makes one understand only that with which it is connected.

original: gzhan rnam pa gzhan du ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan rnam pa gzhan du ma yin te /
translated: Not in any other way.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo zhes pas so //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo zhes pas so //
translated: Because it would be too much.

original: rgyu nyid la sogs pas sprin la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu nyid la sogs pas char pa la sogs pa rnams 'brel pa'o zhes pas de tsam rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid la sogs pas sprin la sogs pa rnams 'bras bu nyid la sogs pas char pa la sogs pa rnams 'brel pa'o zhes pas de tsam rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the cause itself, etc., the clouds, etc. are related to the effect itself, etc., the rain, etc. Thus, that much is understood.

original: de 'gyur med do //
analyzed: de 'gyur med do //
translated: That is not so.

original: bdag nyid thams cad kyis de rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po la sogs pa rnams 'brel pa yin gyi cha shas kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad kyis de rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po la sogs pa rnams 'brel pa yin gyi cha shas kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: By their entire nature, those effects and causes, etc. are related, not by a part.

original: de'i phyir thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur te /üîΩkhyad par rnams kyang 'brel pa can @109a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur te / khyad par rnams kyang 'brel pa can @109a * //
translated: Therefore, this consequence does not arise.

original: yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhe na /
translated: Because the distinctions are also related.üîΩIf you say that,

original: gsungs pa / rnam pa thams cad 'dzin pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: gsungs pa / rnam pa thams cad 'dzin pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: it is said: ‚ÄúIf all aspects are grasped,‚Äù etc.

original: thigs pa chen po can gyi char pa myur du 'bab pa zhes pa la sogs pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thigs pa chen po can gyi char pa myur du 'bab pa zhes pa la sogs pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: Even the rain with great drops falling quickly, etc. is grasped.

original: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams dang yang lhan cig rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams dang yang lhan cig rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of being a cause and effect, etc., with these aspects and so on.

original: kho bo cag la ni gal te yang rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin pa de lta na yang thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag la ni gal te yang rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po yin pa de lta na yang thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ma yin te /
translated: But for us, even if it is the case that there is an object that is produced and a producer, this consequence does not follow,

original: de ltar nges par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar nges par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to ascertain it in that way.

original: pha rol pos ni mngon sum nges pa'i bdag nyid du 'dod de /
analyzed: pha rol pos ni mngon sum nges pa'i bdag nyid du 'dod de /
translated: The opponent asserts that perception has the nature of ascertainment,

original: de'i yul yang cha shas med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yul yang cha shas med pa'o //
translated: and its object is partless.

original: de'i phyir gal te de 'dzin na des de rnam pa thams cad du gzung bar bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te de 'dzin na des de rnam pa thams cad du gzung bar bya zhing /
translated: Therefore, if it apprehends that, it must apprehend it in all aspects,

original: yang na ji ltar yang ma yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar yang ma yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: or else it does not apprehend it at all.

original: de'i phyir de kho na la skyon 'di'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na la skyon 'di'o //
translated: Therefore this fault applies only to you.

original: snga ma la gang mngon par brjod pa'i skyon 'brel pa gzhan las rtogs pa dang 'bras bu tsam la sogs pa'i rjes su dpog pa dang rnam pa thams cad 'dzin par zhes pa la sogs pa de rnams spyi las mthong ba la yang bsgre bar bstan pa'i ched
analyzed: snga ma la gang mngon par brjod pa'i skyon 'brel pa gzhan las rtogs pa dang 'bras bu tsam la sogs pa'i rjes su dpog pa dang rnam pa thams cad 'dzin par zhes pa la sogs pa de rnams spyi las mthong ba la yang bsgre bar bstan pa'i ched
translated: The first is taught in order to show that the faults of expression, such as the understanding of the connection with something else, the inference of mere effect, and the apprehension of all aspects, and so on, are also to be applied to seeing through the universal.

original: du gsungs pa /
analyzed: du gsungs pa /
translated: For that reason, it is said:

original: spyi las mthong ba'ang de bzhin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: spyi las mthong ba'ang de bzhin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Seeing through the universal is also like that.üîΩHow is it so?

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: That is also like that, and so on.

original: 'o na snga ma dang / las de'i khyad par ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na snga ma dang / las de'i khyad par ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Now, what is the difference between the former and the latter? It is said:

original: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la zhes pa'o //üîΩthams cad du yang zhes pa snga ma dang ldan pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ste /
analyzed: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la zhes pa'o // thams cad du yang zhes pa snga ma dang ldan pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ste /
translated: With regard to that which is extremely hidden.üîΩAlso, everywhere means in the case of the former and so on, that is, in the case of the former being similar and the latter being similar.

original: snga ma 'dra ba dang phyi ma 'dra ba'o zhes smra bas rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa tshad mar brjod la /
analyzed: snga ma 'dra ba dang phyi ma 'dra ba'o zhes smra bas rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa tshad mar brjod la /
translated: Thus, the one who speaks of the object of inference is said to be a valid cognizer.

original: de kho na yang don rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na yang don rtogs pa ste /
translated: And that is the realization of the object.

original: 'bras bu gzhan pa yang med de /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan pa yang med de /
translated: Nor is there another effect.

original: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams so //
analyzed: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams so //
translated: And here too, your position is undermined.

original: der 'gyur mod /
analyzed: der 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so.

original: yang na nye bar len pa la ltos pa'i blo rnams 'bras bu ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yang na nye bar len pa la ltos pa'i blo rnams 'bras bu ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Or, the cognitions that depend on appropriation are not effects.

original: de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not the case,

original: de rnams ni phan pa dang mi phan pa dran pa'i rgyu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni phan pa dang mi phan pa dran pa'i rgyu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are caused by the memory of benefit and harm.

original: de kho na dang 'di ni phan pa dang mi phan pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa dran pa med pa de rnams ni 'ga' zhig la yang nye bar skye ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de kho na dang 'di ni phan pa dang mi phan pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa dran pa med pa de rnams ni 'ga' zhig la yang nye bar skye ba ma yin pas so //
translated: Those who do not have the memory, ‚ÄúThat is the real one,‚Äù ‚ÄúThis is beneficial,‚Äù and so on, do not generate them in any way.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod 'bras bu khas blangs pa med pa kho na'o zhe na gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod 'bras bu khas blangs pa med pa kho na'o zhe na gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is so. But the effect is not accepted at all.

original: gang byed pa yin pa de las la bya ba'i 'bras bu can te /
analyzed: gang byed pa yin pa de las la bya ba'i 'bras bu can te /
translated: Whatever is an action has an effect that is the object of the action,

original: sta re bzhin rjes su dpag pa yang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: sta re bzhin rjes su dpag pa yang de lta bu'o //
translated: like an axe. Inference is like that.

original: rang @109b bzhin no //
analyzed: rang @109b bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature.

original: grub ba la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du dogs par byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: grub ba la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du dogs par byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Fearing that it would be established as the object of establishment, he says:

original: rtags shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtags shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The reason is the cognition, etc.

original: tha snyad bstan pa 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: tha snyad bstan pa 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: The teaching of convention would not be established.

original: zhes pa gang gi phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba kho na snga ma dang ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa gtso bo ste /
analyzed: zhes pa gang gi phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba kho na snga ma dang ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa gtso bo ste /
translated: Because the object of inference alone is primary in possessing the prior and the remainder.

original: shes pa ni nye bar brtags pas te /
analyzed: shes pa ni nye bar brtags pas te /
translated: The cognition is secondary, because it is imputed.

original: de'i yul can nyid kyi phyir de ltar rnam par bstan to zhes bsgrags na gang las de ltar 'di tha snyad du bstan par 'gyur ba rtags kyi shes pa ni de'i yul can yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i yul can nyid kyi phyir de ltar rnam par bstan to zhes bsgrags na gang las de ltar 'di tha snyad du bstan par 'gyur ba rtags kyi shes pa ni de'i yul can yang ma yin te /
translated: Thus, if it is proclaimed that the object is taught in that way, then the reason-cognition is not even the subject of that, from which this would be taught as a convention in that way.

original: rtags ni snga ma dang ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa nyid du bstan bcos su yang dag par ma bsgrags pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
analyzed: rtags ni snga ma dang ldan pa dang lhag ma dang ldan pa nyid du bstan bcos su yang dag par ma bsgrags pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
translated: Because the reason is not proclaimed in the treatise as possessing the prior and the remainder. Thus, the assertion is undermined.

original: gang yang zhes pa la sogs pas kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa kho na gsungs so //
analyzed: gang yang zhes pa la sogs pas kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa kho na gsungs so //
translated: Also, the statement beginning with ‚ÄúMoreover,‚Äù only states the undermining of the assertion.

original: de ltar ni de nyid du bshad pa /
analyzed: de ltar ni de nyid du bshad pa /
translated: In this way, it is explained in that very text:

original: re re'i yang rnam pa gsum nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du rnam pa gsum zhes so //
analyzed: re re'i yang rnam pa gsum nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du rnam pa gsum zhes so //
translated: The word ‚Äúthree‚Äù is for the purpose of understanding that each of those is also threefold.

original: gtan tshigs ci zhe na 'di kho na dus gsum nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ci zhe na 'di kho na dus gsum nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: What is the reason? Because they are grasped as the three times.

original: 'di yang ldan pa'i phyogs la mi 'thad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'di yang ldan pa'i phyogs la mi 'thad pa kho na ste /
translated: This is also untenable in the context of inherence.

original: rgyu la 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa kho na 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa kho na 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the future effect is grasped in the cause.

original: lhag ma dang ldan pa'i yang ma yin te /
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan pa'i yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that it is associated with the remainder,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rjes su dpag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rjes su dpag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because inference of the future is impossible.

original: rgyu las sngar 'bras bu srid pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu las sngar 'bras bu srid pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for the effect to exist prior to the cause.

original: phyogs can pas smras pa /
analyzed: phyogs can pas smras pa /
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ika says:

original: rdzas la sogs pa'i tshig gi don bkag pa las sgra la yon tan nyid yang dag par sgrub pa lhag ma dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas la sogs pa'i tshig gi don bkag pa las sgra la yon tan nyid yang dag par sgrub pa lhag ma dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The remainder is associated with the correct establishment of sound as an attribute of space, because the meaning of the words substance and so on are refuted.

original: 'dir yang 'brel pa bstan ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'brel pa bstan ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Here also, because the connection is not taught,

original: de'i rjes su dpag pa nyid kho na yang rnyed par dka' na /
analyzed: de'i rjes su dpag pa nyid kho na yang rnyed par dka' na /
translated: it is difficult to find the inference of that.

original: rnam pa gsum nyid lta ci smos //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum nyid lta ci smos //
translated: How much less so the three-part [syllogism]?

original: rab tu spros pas sgra yang yon tan nyid bsgrubs pa ni lung las grub pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu spros pas sgra yang yon tan nyid bsgrubs pa ni lung las grub pa ste /
translated: As for the establishment of sound as a quality by means of a scriptural citation, this is established by scripture.üîΩAs it is said in the authoritative scripture, the VƒÅkyapadƒ´ya:

original: yid ches pha'i ming rnam par sgrub pas zhas pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yid ches pha'i ming rnam par sgrub pas zhas pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe establishment of the name of the trustworthy person . . .‚Äù

original: de'i phyir sgra la yon tan nyid sgrub pa ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra la yon tan nyid sgrub pa ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the establishment of sound as a quality is not inference.

original: de la ni lta bu yang lam yin na zhes pa snga ma lta bu'i rjes su dpag pa la rang gi 'brel pa bstan ba kho na med de /
analyzed: de la ni lta bu yang lam yin na zhes pa snga ma lta bu'i rjes su dpag pa la rang gi 'brel pa bstan ba kho na med de /
translated: In that case, if the three-part [syllogism] is not inference, then the previously stated inference, ‚ÄúIf sound is a quality, it must be eternal,‚Äù does not have the stated relation.

original: de'i phyir de rjes su dpag pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di'i rnam pa gsum nyid ga las yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir de rjes su dpag pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di'i rnam pa gsum nyid ga las yin /
translated: Therefore, it is not taught to be inference. How then could it be the three-part [syllogism]?

original: snga ma dang mtshungs pa zhes rnam pa tsam ston pa las bstan bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: snga ma dang mtshungs pa zhes rnam pa tsam ston pa las bstan bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúlike the previous one‚Äù merely indicates the form [of the three-part syllogism] but does not teach it.

original: dran pa la sogs pa rnams la yang snga ma dang 'dra bar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin @110a * //
analyzed: dran pa la sogs pa rnams la yang snga ma dang 'dra bar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin @110a * //
translated: This is because memory and so on are also like the previous one.

original: du lhag ma dang ste mngon sum dang mtshungs pa'o zhes 'dir yang 'brel pa bstan pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: du lhag ma dang ste mngon sum dang mtshungs pa'o zhes 'dir yang 'brel pa bstan pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The remainder is similar to direct perception. Here, the connection is not taught at all.

original: bye brag pa rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ikas‚Äô is stated by ‚Äúand so on.‚Äù

original: 'di'i 'brel ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i sgrub par brjod la /
analyzed: 'di'i 'brel ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i sgrub par brjod la /
translated: The connection of this is stated as the proof of the yogis‚Äô direct perception.

original: rtags las skyes pa nyid du de 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtags las skyes pa nyid du de 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That it arises from a reason will be explained.

original: 'o na rtags las skyes pa zhes pa 'di ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rtags las skyes pa zhes pa 'di ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is this ‚Äúarising from a reason‚Äù?

original: brjod par bya ba ste /üîΩkun nas bltas shing lhag par zhen pa ni /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ste / kun nas bltas shing lhag par zhen pa ni /
translated: It is the object of expression.üîΩThose who look all around and are attached

original: kun nas bltas pa rnams te /
analyzed: kun nas bltas pa rnams te /
translated: are those who look all around.

original: rjes su rtogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rjes su rtogs pa yang ngo //
translated: They are also those who understand.

original: de la gang dngos su don rnams kun nas lta ba /
analyzed: de la gang dngos su don rnams kun nas lta ba /
translated: Among them, that which directly looks at objects

original: dper na 'di ni ba lang kho na'o //
analyzed: dper na 'di ni ba lang kho na'o //
translated: is, for example, ‚ÄúThis is just an ox.‚Äù

original: 'di ni rta kho na'o zhes pa de mngon sum mo //
analyzed: 'di ni rta kho na'o zhes pa de mngon sum mo //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is just a horse.‚Äù That is direct perception.

original: gang gzhan blta bar bya ba rnams 'di'i rjes su rtogs pa de ni rtogs pa las byung ba ha nag thal bar bya bzhin pa de ni rtags dang rtags can nges pa'i ched du brda las byung ba can gyi mtshan nyid nges par bstan par bya ba steüîΩ/ brda la yod pa ni brda las byung ba ste /
analyzed: gang gzhan blta bar bya ba rnams 'di'i rjes su rtogs pa de ni rtogs pa las byung ba ha nag thal bar bya bzhin pa de ni rtags dang rtags can nges pa'i ched du brda las byung ba can gyi mtshan nyid nges par bstan par bya ba ste / brda la yod pa ni brda las byung ba ste /
translated: This is the definition of the one that is to be inferred, which is taught for the purpose of ascertaining the sign and the one that is to be inferred.üîΩThat which exists in the sign is the one that arises from the sign.

original: brda byas pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: brda byas pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of that which is made by the sign is the one that arises from the sign.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: 'di'i 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This of this and so on.

original: 'di'i zhes pas rtags gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes pas rtags gsungs so //
translated: This refers to the sign.

original: 'di ni zhes pa ni rjes su dpag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa ni rjes su dpag par bya ba'o //
translated: This of this refers to the one that is to be inferred.

original: gang gi tshe 'di'i 'di rab tu grub pa dang / the tshom med par yang 'gyur ba'o //üîΩ'di'i ste shes par byed pa'am 'byung bar byed pa la nus pa can gyi rgyu'i /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di'i 'di rab tu grub pa dang / the tshom med par yang 'gyur ba'o // 'di'i ste shes par byed pa'am 'byung bar byed pa la nus pa can gyi rgyu'i /
translated: When this of this is well established and also free from doubt,üîΩthis of this is the cause that has the ability to make known or produce.

original: 'di lta ste gsal bar bya ba'am 'grub par bya ba 'bras bu'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste gsal bar bya ba'am 'grub par bya ba 'bras bu'o zhes pa'o //
translated: This of this is the effect that is to be made known or established.

original: ci ste 'di'i rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu gzung bar bya ba ma yin na yang rjes su nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste 'di'i rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu gzung bar bya ba ma yin na yang rjes su nges par 'gyur te /
translated: But even if the effect is not apprehended from seeing its cause, it is ascertained subsequently.

original: dper na nyin mor byed pa shar bar mthong ba las bum pa mngon par gsal ba la bzhin dang / snal ma rnams bres shing brkyang bar gnas pa rnams dang tha ga pa lhag par gnas pa rnams mthong nas 'byung ba'i snam bu la bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nyin mor byed pa shar bar mthong ba las bum pa mngon par gsal ba la bzhin dang / snal ma rnams bres shing brkyang bar gnas pa rnams dang tha ga pa lhag par gnas pa rnams mthong nas 'byung ba'i snam bu la bzhin no //
translated: For example, from seeing the sun rise, a pot becomes manifest, and from seeing the threads extended and the weaver present, a cloth is produced.

original: de ltar gang gi tshe 'di'i 'di rab tu grub pa dang the tshom med par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar gang gi tshe 'di'i 'di rab tu grub pa dang the tshom med par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Thus, when this is well established and there is no doubt,

original: gsal bar bya ba'am 'grub par bya ba'i 'bras bu 'di'i yang 'di rgyu'o zhes pa yin pa na /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba'am 'grub par bya ba'i 'bras bu 'di'i yang 'di rgyu'o zhes pa yin pa na /
translated: this is the cause of the effect that is to be manifested or established.

original: de nas 'di'i 'bras bu lta ba'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di'i 'bras bu lta ba'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, in order to see the effect of this, etc., it should be stated as appropriate.

original: 'brel pa can rnam pa gnyis te yang dag par ldan pa can yang dper na du ba me las lta bu ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa can rnam pa gnyis te yang dag par ldan pa can yang dper na du ba me las lta bu ste /
translated: There are two kinds of related objects: those that are endowed, like smoke from fire,üîΩand those that are not endowed, like a pot from a lump of clay.

original: yang dag par 'du ba can yang dper na ba lang gi rva lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang dag par 'du ba can yang dper na ba lang gi rva lta bu'o //
translated: The second is like the horn of a cow.

original: don gcig la 'du ba can yang rnam pa gnyis @110b te /üîΩ'bras bu gzhan gyi 'bras bu dang / rgyu gzhan gyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba can yang rnam pa gnyis @110b te / 'bras bu gzhan gyi 'bras bu dang / rgyu gzhan gyi rgyu'o //
translated: The third is twofold:

original: de la rgyu'i don gcig la 'du ba ste /üîΩgcig gi don rnams la 'du ba'o //
analyzed: de la rgyu'i don gcig la 'du ba ste / gcig gi don rnams la 'du ba'o //
translated: the effect of another effect and the cause of another cause.üîΩThe first is the effect of another effect.

original: 'bras bu yang gcig tu don rnams kyi 'du ba zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ba tha dang pa las so //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang gcig tu don rnams kyi 'du ba zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ba tha dang pa las so //
translated: The second is the cause of another cause.

original: de la 'bras bu las 'bras bu gzhan la rjes su dpog pa ni dper na gzugs las reg pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la 'bras bu las 'bras bu gzhan la rjes su dpog pa ni dper na gzugs las reg pa lta bu'o //
translated: The effect of another effect is like the contact of form.

original: rgyu las rgyu gzhan la ni dper na rkang pa las lag pa dag lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyu las rgyu gzhan la ni dper na rkang pa las lag pa dag lta bu'o //
translated: The cause of another cause is like the hand of a foot.

original: 'gal ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The fourth is contradictory.

original: byung ba'i ma byung ba ni dper na yod pa ma yin pa'i char pa'i las ni yod pa rlung dang sprin yang dag par sbyor ba'i ste /
analyzed: byung ba'i ma byung ba ni dper na yod pa ma yin pa'i char pa'i las ni yod pa rlung dang sprin yang dag par sbyor ba'i ste /
translated: The non-arising of the arisen is like the non-existence of rain from the conjunction of the wind and clouds,

original: de yod na char pa'i las med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na char pa'i las med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when they exist, rain does not exist.

original: byung ba ma byung ba'i ni /
analyzed: byung ba ma byung ba'i ni /
translated: The non-arisen does not arise.üîΩ

original: char pa'i las yod bzhin pa de kho na rlung dang char pa yang dag par sbyor ba de kho na'i ste /üîΩshin tu 'jug pa nyid dang rab tu 'jug pa med pa nyid rtogs par byed do //üîΩbyung ba byung ba'i ni gsher ba nyid chu lon 'ching ba'i ste /
analyzed: char pa'i las yod bzhin pa de kho na rlung dang char pa yang dag par sbyor ba de kho na'i ste / shin tu 'jug pa nyid dang rab tu 'jug pa med pa nyid rtogs par byed do // byung ba byung ba'i ni gsher ba nyid chu lon 'ching ba'i ste /
translated: The effect of the non-arisen arisen is the dam of wetness,

original: gsher ba nyid kyi 'bras bu rlan pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir gsher ba nyid dang 'ga' bar bstan to //
analyzed: gsher ba nyid kyi 'bras bu rlan pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir gsher ba nyid dang 'ga' bar bstan to //
translated: because the effect of wetness is the opposite of moisture.

original: ma byung ba ma byung ba'i ni mngon par grub pa ljang gu nyid kyi bum pa tshos tha las skyes pa'i ngo bor byung ba la /
analyzed: ma byung ba ma byung ba'i ni mngon par grub pa ljang gu nyid kyi bum pa tshos tha las skyes pa'i ngo bor byung ba la /
translated: The effect of the non-arisen non-arisen is the arising of the nature of the pot from the clay,

original: mngon par grub pa'i bum pa me dang yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par grub pa'i bum pa me dang yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
translated: due to the conjunction of the non-arisen arisen pot with fire.

original: rgyus 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa'i gtan tshigs dag go zhes brjod do zhes pa pha rol po'i mngon par 'dod pa la zhen pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyus 'bras bu rjes su dpag pa'i gtan tshigs dag go zhes brjod do zhes pa pha rol po'i mngon par 'dod pa la zhen pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intended meaning of the opponent's explicit assertion that these are the reasons for inferring the effect from the cause.

original: 'o na bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid dag ste /
analyzed: 'o na bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid dag ste /
translated: But the characteristics of the produced and the producer are not refuted.

original: de la 'bras bu dang rgyu dag bkag gi / gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid dag ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu dang rgyu dag bkag gi / gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid dag ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The effect and cause are refuted, but not the characteristics of the manifestor and the manifested.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po kho na'o //
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po kho na'o //
translated: The entity of the manifested and the manifestor is just the entity of the produced and the producer.

original: de ltar ni lhan cig byed pa po gsal bar byed pa las /
analyzed: de ltar ni lhan cig byed pa po gsal bar byed pa las /
translated: Thus, the manifestor is not a co-creator.
